Нам удалось восстановить связь с контактом, у которого есть выход на местных партизан. Это небольшая ячейка, часть крупной сети Сопротивления на материке Алтиса. Они называют себя FIA.%1%1В ожидании атак AAF наш контакт - его зовут Никос - устроил тайник с боеприпасами где-то рядом с %4ВПП "Коннор"%2. Теперь он предлагает, так сказать, поделиться им с нами. Мы согласились встретиться %5к югу отсюда%2.%1%1Встретьтесь с ними, возьмите припасы и возвращайтесь на базу. Не теряйте бдительности. Удачи вам.
Key.German: Wir haben einige deutliche Schläge gegen die AAF geführt. Sie sind jetzt geschwächt.%1%1Allerdings bleibt uns nur wenig Zeit, diesen Umstand auszunutzen, bevor sie Verstärkung erhalten. Außerdem hat sich herausgestellt, dass es uns an Munition und Nachschub fehlt. Wir kommen deshalb langsam in Bedrängnis.%1%1Zum Glück hat sich nun eine Gelegenheit aufgetan. Es ist uns gelungen, die Kommunikation zu einem Kontakt mit Verbindungen zu den Guerillas wiederherzustellen. Es handelt sich um eine kleine Zelle, Teil eines größeren Netzwerks des Widerstands auf der Hauptinsel Altis. Sie nennen sich selbst F-I-A.%1%1Nach dem AAF-Angriff hat unser Kontakt - er heißt Nikos - ein Munitionslager eingerichtet. Es befindet sich irgendwo in der Nähe von %4LZ Connor%2. Er hat uns angeboten, es sozusagen mit ihm zu teilen. Wir haben zugestimmt, uns %5direkt südlich von hier%2 mit ihm zu treffen.%1%1Wir bekommen etwas Nachschub und kehren zur Basis zurück. Seien Sie wachsam - und viel Glück.
Key.Czech: Uštědřili jsme jednotkám AAF několik závažných úderů. Jsou teď oslabeny.%1%1Máme však jen krátký časový interval na to, abychom této výhody využili, než jim dorazí posily. Také nám pomalu dochází munice a zásoby. Začínáme mlít z posledního.%1%1Naštěstí se nám naskytla nová příležitost. Dokázali jsme znovu navázat komunikaci se spojkou, která má vazby na místní partyzány. Jedná se o malou buňku. Část větší sítě odporu na pevnině Altisu. Říkají si F-I-A. 'Fía'.%1%1V návaznosti na útok AAF naše spojka - říká si Nikos - shromáždila zásoby munice poblíž %4přistávací plochy Connor%2. Teď nám nabízí, že se o ně s námi, hm, podělí, v jistém slova smyslu. Dohodli jsme se na setkání %5nedaleko odsud na jihu%2.%1%1Setkejte se se spojkou, zajistěte zásoby a vraťte se na základnu. Buďte ve střehu a hodně štěstí.
Key.English: We've struck some fairly significant blows against the AAF. They've been weakened.%1%1We only have a small window of opportunity to exploit that fact, though, before they're reinforced. It's also become clear that we're running short on ammo and supplies. We're beginning to stretch ourselves thin.%1%1Fortunately, an opportunity has presented itself. We've managed to re-establish communication with a contact that has ties to the local guerillas. It's a small cell. Part of a larger network of resistance on the Altis mainland. They call themselves the F-I-A. 'Fee-ah'.%1%1In the wake of the AAF attack, our contact - goes by the name Nikos - set up an ammunition dump somewhere near %4LZ Connor%2. Now he's offering to, well, share it, in a manner of speaking. We've agreed to link up %5just south of here%2.%1%1Meet with him, secure some supplies, and RTB. Be on your guard and good luck.
Key.Portuguese: Lançamos alguns ataques cruciais contra a AAF. Eles foram enfraquecidos.%1%1Mas temos pouco tempo para aproveitar antes que eles se reforcem. Também ficou evidente que estamos ficando com baixa de munição e de suprimentos. Estamos quase no limite.%1%1Felizmente surgiu uma oportunidade. Conseguimos restabelecer comunicações com um contato que tem ligações com as guerrilhas locais. É uma célula pequena que faz parte de uma rede maior de resistência no continente de Altis. Eles se autodenominam F-I-A. %1%1Depois do ataque da AAF, nosso contato, que atende por Nikos, preparou um depósito de munição em algum lugar peto da %4zona de pouso Connor%2. Agora ele está se oferendo a “dividir” conosco. Concordamos em nos juntar a ele a %5sul daqui%2.%1%1A missão é se encontrar com ele, pegar alguns suprimentos e voltar à base. Fiquem de olhos abertos e boa sorte.
Key.Korean: AAF에게 꽤나 심각한 타격을 입혔다. 놈들은 약화됐지.%1%1하지만 놈들이 병력을 증원시키기 전까지 이런 절호의 기회는 그리 오래 가지 않을 거다. 게다가 시간이 갈 수록 우리 탄약과 보급품이 점점 부족해지고 있다는 점도 있고, 병력도 전선 유지에 부족하기도 하다.%1%1다행히, 기회가 제 발로 찾아왔다. 지역게릴라와 연줄이 닿아있는 연락책과 교신 재개에 성공했지. 규모는 작아도 알티스 본토의 저항군 네트워크 중 일부인 조직이다. 이들은 자기들을 F, I, A, '피아'라고 부르고 있지.%1%1니코스라는 연락책이 AAF의 공세 속에서도 %4코너 착륙지대%2 근처에 탄약집적소를 구축해놨다. 그리고 이제 그는 그걸, 음, 공유해주겠다고 하더군. %5이곳의 남쪽%2에서 만나기로 했다.%1%1그와 만나, 보급품을 확보한 후 복귀하라. 경계를 늦추지 말고, 행운을 빈다.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们对 AAF 实施了几次重大打击。他们的实力已经削弱。%1%1不过，在他们的增援部队到来之前，我们只有很小的机会利用这个事实。同样明显的是我们的弹药和补给短缺。我们的资源开始缺乏。%1%1幸运的是，出现了一个机会。我们设法重新联系上了一位与当地游击队有联系的联络人。那是一支小型武装，是 Altis 大陆上的一个更大型抵抗力量网络的一部分。他们自称 F-I-A。“Fee-ah”。%1%1在 AAF 的攻击之后，我们的联络人 - 姑且称他为 Nikos - 在%4 Connor 着陆区%2 附近设了一个弹药库。目前他提议，嗯，在某种意义上，分享它。我们已同意在%5这儿的南面%2会合。%1%1与他会合，获得补给，再返回基地。保持警惕，祝你们好运。
Key.Japanese: 我々はAAFに対して大規模な打撃を加え、弱体化に成功した。%1%1しかしこの好機につけ込めるチャンスは、連中が増援されるまでのごくわずかしかない。我々の弾薬と物資が不足しつつあるのも明らかだ。状況は徐々に厳しくなりつつある。%1%1そんな中、幸運にもチャンスが到来した。地元ゲリラにつながる連絡員と、再度コンタクトが取れたのだ。小さな組織だが、アルティス本島にあるレジスタンスネットワークの一部だ。彼らは自らをF-I-Aと呼ぶ。「フィー・アー」というわけだ。%1%1AAFの攻撃を受け、「ニコス」と呼ばれる連絡員が%4LZコナー%2付近に火薬庫を設置した。 彼はそこを、言わば「シェア」しようと言っている。我々は%5ここのすぐ南%2で合流することに合意した。%1%1彼と接触し、物資を確保して基地へ戻るのだ。慎重に行け。幸運を祈る。
Key.Turkish: AAF'ye çok ağır darbeler indirdik. Zayıfladılar.%1%1Ancak takviye almadan önce bu gerçeği keşfetmek için çok kısa bir süremiz oldu. Ayrıca mühimmat ve ikmal malzemelerimiz de tükeniyor. Zayıflamaya başlıyoruz.%1%1Neyse ki bir fırsat çıktı. Yerel gerillalarla bağlantısı olan bir temasla yeniden bağlantı kurmayı başardık. Küçük bir hücre. Altis anakarasındaki daha büyük direniş ağının bir parçası. Kendilerini F-I-A olarak adlandırıyorlar. "Fi-a".%1%1AAF saldırısının ardından temasımız - Nikos adıyla anılıyor - %4Connor İniş Bölgesi%2 yakınlarında bir mühimmat yığını oluşturdu. Şimdi tabiri caizse onu paylaşmayı teklif ediyor. %5Buranın hemen güneyinde%2 buluşmayı kabul ettik.%1%1Onunla buluş, bazı ikmal malzemelerini ele geçir ve üsse dön. Gardını al, iyi şanslar.

Key.Original: REGROUP
Key.Chinese: 整隊
Key.French: SE REGROUPER
Key.Spanish: REAGRUPAMIENTO
Key.Italian: RAGGRUPPATI
Key.Polish: PRZEGRUPUJ SIĘ
Key.Russian: ПЕРЕГРУППИРОВАТЬСЯ
Key.German: SAMMELN
Key.Czech: SETKAT SE
Key.English: REGROUP
Key.Portuguese: REAGRUPE-SE
Key.Chinesesimp: 重组
Key.Japanese: 合流
Key.Turkish: TEKRAR TOPLAN

Key.Original: Regroup
Key.Chinese: 整隊
Key.French: Se regrouper
Key.Spanish: Reagrúpese
Key.Italian: Raggruppati
Key.Polish: Przegrupuj się
Key.Russian: Перегруппироваться
Key.German: Sammeln
Key.Czech: Setkat se
Key.English: Regroup
Key.Portuguese: Reagrupe-se
Key.Chinesesimp: 重组
Key.Japanese: 合流
Key.Turkish: Tekrar toplan

Key.Original: Regroup with the rest of %3Alpha%1, who are waiting just outside %2Camp Maxwell%1.
Key.Chinese: 與剩下的 %3Alpha%1 隊員會合，他們在 %2Maxwell 營地%1外面等待。
Key.French: Faites la jonction avec le reste d'%3Alpha%1, qui vous attend aux abords du %2camp Maxwell%1.
Key.Spanish: Reagrúpese con el resto de %3Alpha%1, que espera fuera de %2Camp Maxwell%1.
Key.Italian: Raggruppati con il resto della squadra %3Alpha%1, in attesa appena fuori da %2Camp Maxwell%1.
Key.Polish: Przegrupuj się z resztą oddziału %3Alpha%1, która czeka w pobliżu %2Camp Maxwell%1.
Key.Russian: Объединитесь с остальными бойцами группы %3Альфа%1, ждущими вас рядом с %2лагерем Максвелл%1.
Key.German: Sammeln Sie sich mit dem Rest von %3Alpha%1, der direkt vor %2Camp Maxwell%1 wartet.
Key.Czech: Setkej se se zbytkem %3Alfy%1, který čeká vně %2tábora Maxwell%1.
Key.English: Regroup with the rest of %3Alpha%1, who are waiting just outside %2Camp Maxwell%1.
Key.Portuguese: Reagrupe-se com o resto da %3Alfa%1, que está aguardando na saída do %2Acampamento Maxwell%1.
Key.Korean: %2맥스웰 주둔지%1 외곽에서 대기 중인 %3알파%1의 나머지 병력과 재집결하라.
Key.Chinesesimp: 与 %3Alpha%1 剩余的人员重组，他们就在 %2Maxwell%1 营地外面等待。
Key.Japanese: %3アルファ%1の他の隊員と合流せよ。%2キャンプ・マクスウェル%1のすぐ外で待っている。
Key.Turkish: %2Maxwell Kampı%1'nın dışında bekleyen %3Alpha%1'nın geri kalanıyla buluş.

Key.Original: Crossing Paths
Key.Chinese: 狹路相逢
Key.French: Croisée des chemins
Key.Spanish: Cruce de caminos
Key.Italian: Strade che si incrociano
Key.Polish: Spotkanie
Key.Russian: Встреча
Key.German: Sich kreuzende Wege
Key.Czech: Zkřížené cesty
Key.English: Crossing Paths
Key.Portuguese: Caminhos entrecruzados
Key.Chinesesimp: 十字路口
Key.Japanese: 交差路
Key.Turkish: Kesişen Yollar

Key.Original: Link up with %5Nikos%2, secure the supplies located near %6LZ Connor%2, and return to %3Camp Maxwell%2.
Key.Chinese: 與 %5Nikos%2 會面，取得位在 %6Connor 降落區%2附近的補給品，之後返回 %3Maxwell 營地%2。
Key.French: Faites la jonction avec %5Nikos%2, prenez les ravitaillements situés près de la %6ZA Connor%2 et revenez au %3camp Maxwell%2.
Key.Spanish: Reúnase con %5Nikos%2, asegure los suministros cerca de la %6zona de aterrizaje Connor%2 y vuelva a %3Camp Maxwell%2.
Key.Italian: Incontrati con %5Nikos%2, prendi i rifornimenti nei pressi della %6zona di atterraggio Connor%2 e torna a %3Camp Maxwell%2.
Key.Polish: Dołącz do %5Nikosa%2, zabezpiecz zasoby znajdujące się w pobliżu %6SL Connor%2 i wróć do %3Camp Maxwell%2.
Key.Russian: Встретьтесь с %5Никосом%2, возьмите припасы, находящиеся у %6ВПП "Коннор"%2, и возвращайтесь в %3лагерь Максвелл%2.
Key.German: Treffen Sie %5Nikos%2, sichern Sie den Nachschub in der Nähe von %6LZ Connor%2, und kehren Sie zu %3Camp Maxwell%2 zurück.
Key.Czech: Setkej se s %5Nikosem%2, zajisti zásoby, které se nacházejí poblíž %6přistávací plochy Connor%2, a vrať se do %3tábora Maxwell%2.
Key.English: Link up with %5Nikos%2, secure the supplies located near %6LZ Connor%2, and return to %3Camp Maxwell%2.
Key.Portuguese: Encontre %5Nikos%2, obtenha os suprimentos localizados próximos à %6zona de pouso Connor%2 e volte ao %3Acampamento Maxwell%2.
Key.Korean: %5니코스%2와 합류해 %6코너 착륙지대%2 근처에 있는 보급품을 확보한 후, %3맥스웰 캠프%2로 복귀하라.
Key.Chinesesimp: 与 %5Nikos%2 碰面，在 %6Connor 着陆区%2 附近获取补给，并返回 %3Maxwell 营地%2。
Key.Japanese: %5ニコス%2と合流し、%6LZコナー%2付近にある物資を確保して%3キャンプ・マクスウェル%2へ帰投せよ。
Key.Turkish: %5Nikos%2 ile buluş, %6Connor İniş Bölgesi%2 yakınlarında bulunan ikmal malzemelerini ele geçir ve %3Maxwell Kampı'na%2 geri dön.

Key.Original: Meet up with Miller's contact, %2Nikos%1, to the south of %3Camp Maxwell%1.
Key.Chinese: 與 Miller 的關係人 %2Nikos%1 會面，會面位置在 %3Maxwell 營地%1南方。
Key.French: Retrouvez %2Nikos%1, le contact de Miller, au sud du %3camp Maxwell%1.
Key.Spanish: Reúnase con el contacto de Miller, %2Nikos%1, al sur de %3Camp Maxwell%1.
Key.Italian: Incontra il contatto di Miller, %2Nikos%1, a sud di %3Camp Maxwell%1.
Key.Polish: Spotkaj się z kontaktem Millera, %2Nikosem%1, w punkcie położonym na południu od %3Camp Maxwell%1.
Key.Russian: Встретьтесь с контактом Миллера по имени %2Никос%1 к югу от %3лагеря Максвелл%1.
Key.German: Treffen Sie Millers Kontakt %2Nikos%1 südlich von %3Camp Maxwell%1.
Key.Czech: Setkej se s Millerovým kontaktem, %2Nikosem%1, jižně od %3tábora Maxwell%1.
Key.English: Meet up with Miller's contact, %2Nikos%1, to the south of %3Camp Maxwell%1.
Key.Portuguese: Encontre o contato de Miller, %2Nikos%1, ao sul do %3Acampamento Maxwell%1.
Key.Chinesesimp: 在 %3Maxwell 营地%1的南面与 Miller 的联络人 %2Nikos%1 碰面。
Key.Japanese: ミラーの連絡員である%2ニコス%1と接触せよ。彼は%3キャンプ・マクスウェル%1の南にいる。
Key.Turkish: %3Maxwell Kampı%1'nın güneyinde Miller'ın teması %2Nikos%1 ile buluş.

Key.Original: Return with the supplies to %3Camp Maxwell%1.
Key.Chinese: 帶著補給品回到 %3Maxwell 營地%1。
Key.French: Rentrez au %3camp Maxwell%1 en possession des ravitaillements.
Key.Spanish: Vuelva con los suministros a %3Camp Maxwell%1.

Key.Russian: Вернитесь с припасами в %3лагерь Максвелл%1.
Key.German: Kehren Sie mit dem Nachschub zum %3Camp Maxwell%1 zurück.
Key.Czech: Vrať se i se zásobami do %3tábora Maxwell%1.

Key.Portuguese: Volte com os suprimentos ao %3Acampamento Maxwell%1.
Key.Chinesesimp: 带着补给返回 %3Maxwell 营地%1。
Key.Japanese: 物資を手に入れて%3キャンプ・マクスウェル%1へ戻れ。
Key.Turkish: İkmal malzemeleriyle birlikte %3Maxwell Kampı%1'na geri dön.

Key.Chinese: 保衛 Connor 降落區

Key.Chinese: 掃蕩屋內

Key.Spanish: Limpie casas

Key.Portuguese: Verifique as casas
Key.Chinesesimp: 确认房屋安全
Key.Japanese: 家々を一掃せよ
Key.Turkish: Evleri temizle

Key.Original: Sweep and clear the %2buildings%1 inside %3Agios Cephas%1.
Key.Chinese: 掃蕩 %3Agios Cephas%1 的%2建築物%1，確認安全。
Key.French: Quadrillez et nettoyez les %2bâtiments%1 d'%3Agios Cephas%1.
Key.Spanish: Barra y limpie los %2edificios%1 en el interior de %3Agios Cephas%1.
Key.Italian: Rastrella e libera gli %2edifici%1 all'interno di %3Agios Cephas%1.
Key.Polish: Przeszukaj i zabezpiecz %2budynki%1 w %3Agios Cephas%1.
Key.Russian: Зачистите %2здания%1 в %3Агиос Сефас%1.
Key.German: Durchsuchen und räumen Sie die %2Gebäude%1 in %3Agios Cephas%1.
Key.Czech: Pročeš a vyčisti %2budovy%1 uvnitř %3Agios Cephas%1.
Key.English: Sweep and clear the %2buildings%1 inside %3Agios Cephas%1.
Key.Portuguese: Faça uma varredura nas %2construções%1 dentro de %3Agios Cephas%1.
Key.Chinesesimp: 扫荡并确认 %3Agios Cephas%1 内的%2建筑物%1安全。
Key.Japanese: %3アギオス・シーファス%1内の%2建物%1を一掃せよ。
Key.Turkish: %3Agios Cephas%1'taki %2binaları%1 tara ve temizle.

Key.Original:
1. Rendezvous with %5Nikos%2.
2. Continue to %6LZ Connor%2.
3. Secure the promised supplies.
4. Deliver the supplies to %3Camp Maxwell%2.
Key.Chinese:
1.與 %5Nikos%2 會面。
2.繼續前往 %6Connor 降落區%2。
3.取得要交給我們的補給品。
4.將補給品送回 %3Maxwell 營地%2。
Key.French:
1. Retrouvez %5Nikos%2.
2. Avancez jusqu'à la %6ZA Connor%2.
3. Prenez les ravitaillements promis.
4. Livrez les ravitaillements au %3camp Maxwell%2.
Key.Spanish:
1. Reunión con %5Nikos%2.
2. Continúe a la %6zona de aterrizaje%2.
3. Asegure los suministros prometidos..4. Lleve los suministros a %3Camp Maxwell%1.
Key.Italian:
1. Incontrati con %5Nikos%2.
2. Prosegui verso la %6zona di atterraggio Connor%2.
3. Prendi i rifornimenti promessi.
4. Consegna i rifornimenti a %3Camp Maxwell%2.
Key.Polish:
1. Spotkaj się z %5Nikosem%2.
2. Udaj się do %6SL Connor%2.
3. Zabezpiecz zasoby.
4. Dostarcz zasoby do %3Camp Maxwell%2.
Key.Russian:
1. Встретьтесь с %5Никосом%2.
2. Выдвигайтесь к %6ВПП "Коннор"%2.
3. Заберите обещанные припасы.
4. Доставьте припасы в %3лагерь Максвелл%2.
Key.German:
1. Treffen Sie %5Nikos%2.
2. Begeben Sie sich zu %6LZ Connor%2.
3. Sichern Sie den zugesagten Nachschub.
4. Liefern Sie den Nachschub im %3Camp Maxwell%2 ab.
Key.Czech:
1. Setkej se s %5Nikosem%2.
2. Pokračuj na %6přistávací plochu Connor%2.
3. Zajisti slíbené zásoby.
4. Doruč zásoby do %3tábora Maxwell%2.
Key.English:
1. Rendezvous with %5Nikos%2.
2. Continue to %6LZ Connor%2.
3. Secure the promised supplies.
4. Deliver the supplies to %3Camp Maxwell%2.
Key.Portuguese:
1. Encontre-se com %5Nikos%2.
2. Prossiga para a %6zona de pouso Connor%2.
3. Obtenha os suprimentos prometidos.
4. Entregue os suprimentos no %3Acampamento Maxwell%2.
Key.Korean:
1. %5니코스%2와 합류하기
2. %6코너 착륙지대%2로 진행하기
3. 보급품 확보하기
4. %3맥스웰 주둔지%2로 보급품 운반하기
Key.Chinesesimp:
1. 与 %5Nikos%2 会合。
2. 继续前往 %6Connor 着陆区%2。
3. 获得所承诺的补给。
4. 将补给送到 %3Maxwell 营地%2。
Key.Japanese:
1.%5ニコス%2と合流せよ。
2. %6LZコナー%2へ向かえ。
3. 約束の物資を確保せよ。
4. %3キャンプ・マクスウェル%2に物資を運べ。
Key.Turkish:
1. %5Nikos%2 ile buluş.
2. %6Connor İniş Bölgesi%2'ne devam et.
3. Vadedilen ikmal malzemelerini ele geçir.
4. İkmal malzemelerini %3Maxwell Kampı%2'na teslim et.

Key.Original: Despite your intervention, LZ Connor was overrun. The supplies were destroyed and you suffered heavy casualties. Worse still, an unexpected attack has left Camp Maxwell decimated. It looks like we're fast out of options.
Key.Chinese: 雖然你很努力，不過 Connor 降落區被敵方佔據了。補給品毀了不說，你的隊伍還受到致命打擊。更慘的是，敵方奇襲了 Maxwell 營地， 我方元氣大傷。看來我們已經別無選擇。
Key.French: Votre intervention n'a pas empêché l'invasion de la ZA Connor. Les ravitaillements ont été détruits et vous avez subi de lourdes pertes. Pire encore, une attaque surprise a décimé le camp Maxwell. Nos options s'amenuisent à vue d'œil.
Key.Spanish: Pese a tu intervención, la zona de aterrizaje Connor fue arrasada. Los suministros fueron destruidos y usted sufrió graves bajas. Peor aún, un ataque inesperado ha diezmado Camp Maxwell. Parece que nos quedamos rápidamente sin opciones.
Key.Italian: Nonostante l'intervento, la zona di atterraggio Connor è stata conquistata. I rifornimenti sono stati distrutti e avete contato molte vittime. Ancora peggio, un attacco imprevisto ha decimato Camp Maxwell. Stiamo per esaurire le nostre opzioni.
Key.Polish: Pomimo twojej interwencji SL Connor została zaatakowana. Zasoby zostały zniszczone, a twój oddział poniósł ciężkie straty. Co gorsza, dokonano niespodziewanego ataku na Camp Maxwell. Chyba szybko kończą nam się możliwości.
Key.Russian: Несмотря на ваше вмешательство, ВПП "Коннор" была захвачена. Припасы уничтожены, а вы понесли тяжелые потери. Мало того, огромные потери понес после внезапной атаки и лагерь Максвелл. Похоже, вариантов у нас не осталось.
Key.German: LZ Connor wurde trotz Ihres Eingreifens überrannt. Der Nachschub wurde zerstört, und Sie haben schwere Verluste erlitten. Und was noch schlimmer ist, ein unerwarteter Angriff hat Camp Maxwell deutlich dezimiert. Anscheinend gehen uns rasend schnell die Optionen aus.
Key.Czech: I přes tvůj zásah byla přistávací plocha Connor ztracena. Zásoby byly zničeny a utrpěl jsi těžké ztráty. Co hůř, nečekaný útok zdecimoval samotný tábor Maxwell. Naše možnosti se povážlivě tenčí.
Key.English: Despite your intervention, LZ Connor was overrun. The supplies were destroyed and you suffered heavy casualties. Worse still, an unexpected attack has left Camp Maxwell decimated. It looks like we're fast out of options.
Key.Portuguese: Apesar da sua intervenção, a zona de pouso Connor foi invadida. Os suprimentos foram destruídos, e vocês tiveram muitas baixas. Para piorar, um ataque inesperado dizimou o Acampamento Maxwell. Parece que ficamos sem opções.
Key.Korean: 귀관의 노력에도 불구하고 코너 착륙지대는 적에게 넘어갔다. 보급품은 파괴되었고, 많은 사상자도 발생했지. 더 안 좋은 일은 뜻밖의 공격으로 맥스웰 주둔지가 심한 피해를 입었다는 것이다. 선택의 여지가 빠르게 사라지고 있는 것 같군.
Key.Chinesesimp: 尽管有你的干预，Connor 着陆区 仍然被袭。补给被毁，你方伤亡惨重。更糟糕的是，一次出人意料的攻击使 Maxwell 遭到严重破坏。看来我们很快就走投无路了。
Key.Japanese: 諸君の介入にも関わらず、LZコナーは蹂躙された。物資は破壊され、多数の負傷者が出た。さらに悪いことに、予期せぬ攻撃によりキャンプ・マクスウェルが大きな打撃を被った。打つ手は刻一刻と尽きつつある。
Key.Turkish: Müdahalene rağmen Connor İniş Bölgesi istila edildi. İkmal malzemeleri yok edildi ve ağır kayıplar verdin. Daha da kötüsü, beklenmedik bir saldırı Maxwell Kampı'nı hezimete uğrattı. Seçeneklerimiz hızla tükeniyor.

Key.Original: Despite your intervention, LZ Connor was overrun and the supplies were destroyed. Worse still, an unexpected attack has left Camp Maxwell decimated. It looks like we're fast out of options.
Key.Chinese: 雖然你很努力，不過 Connor 降落區被敵方佔據，補給品也沒了。更慘的是，敵方奇襲了 Maxwell 營地， 我方元氣大傷。看來我們已經別無選擇。
Key.French: Votre intervention n'a pas empêché l'invasion de la ZA Connor ni la destruction des ravitaillements. Pire encore, une attaque surprise a décimé le camp Maxwell. Nos options s'amenuisent à vue d'œil.
Key.Spanish: Pese a su intervención, la zona de aterrizaje Connor fue arrasada y los suministros destruidos. Peor aún, un ataque inesperado ha diezmado Camp Maxwell. Parece que nos quedamos rápidamente sin opciones.
Key.Italian: Nonostante l'intervento, la zona di atterraggio Connor è stata conquistata e i rifornimenti sono stati distrutti. Ancora peggio, un attacco imprevisto ha decimato Camp Maxwell. Stiamo per esaurire le nostre opzioni.
Key.Polish: Pomimo twojej interwencji SL Connor została zaatakowana, a zasoby zniszczone. Co gorsza, dokonano niespodziewanego ataku na Camp Maxwell. Chyba szybko kończą nam się możliwości.
Key.Russian: Несмотря на ваше вмешательство, ВПП "Коннор" была захвачена, а припасы уничтожены. Мало того, огромные потери понес после внезапной атаки и лагерь Максвелл. Похоже, вариантов у нас не осталось.
Key.German: LZ Connor wurde trotz Ihres Eingreifens überrannt, und der Nachschub ist zerstört. Und was noch schlimmer ist, ein unerwarteter Angriff hat Camp Maxwell deutlich dezimiert. Anscheinend gehen uns rasend schnell die Optionen aus.
Key.Czech: I přes tvůj zásah byla přistávací plocha Connor ztracena a zásoby zničeny. Co hůř, nečekaný útok zdecimoval samotný tábor Maxwell. Naše možnosti se povážlivě tenčí.
Key.English: Despite your intervention, LZ Connor was overrun and the supplies were destroyed. Worse still, an unexpected attack has left Camp Maxwell decimated. It looks like we're fast out of options.
Key.Portuguese: Apesar da sua intervenção, a zona de pouso Connor foi invadida, e os suprimentos foram destruídos. Para piorar, um ataque inesperado dizimou o Acampamento Maxwell. Parece que ficamos sem opções.
Key.Korean: 귀관의 노력에도 불구하고 코너 착륙지대는 적에게 넘어갔고, 보급품은 파괴되었다. 더 안 좋은 일은 뜻밖의 공격으로 맥스웰 주둔지가 심한 피해를 입었다는 것이다. 선택의 여지가 빠르게 사라지고 있는 것 같군.
Key.Chinesesimp: 尽管有你的干预，Connor 着陆区 仍然被袭，补给被毁。更糟糕的是，一次出人意料的攻击使 Maxwell 遭到严重破坏。看来我们很快就走投无路了。
Key.Japanese: 諸君の介入にも関わらずLZコナーは蹂躙され、物資は破壊された。さらに悪いことに、予期せぬ攻撃によりキャンプ・マクスウェルが大きな打撃を被った。打つ手は刻一刻と尽きつつある。
Key.Turkish: Müdahalene rağmen Connor İniş Bölgesi istila edildi ve ikmal malzemeleri yok edildi. Daha da kötüsü, beklenmedik bir saldırı Maxwell Kampı'nı hezimete uğrattı. Seçeneklerimiz hızla tükeniyor.

Key.Original: Your team left without you!
Key.Chinese: 你的隊伍拋下你離開了！
Key.French: Votre équipe est partie sans vous !
Key.Spanish: ¡Su equipo se ha ido sin usted!
Key.Italian: La tua squadra se n'è andata senza di te!
Key.Polish: Twoja drużyna oddaliła się bez ciebie!
Key.Russian: Ваш отряд ушел без вас!
Key.German: Ihr Team ist ohne Sie aufgebrochen!
Key.Czech: Tvůj tým tě nechal pozadu!
Key.English: Your team left without you!
Key.Portuguese: Sua equipe saiu sem você!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的小组离开了，没带上你！
Key.Japanese: チームに置き去りにされた！
Key.Turkish: Takımın sensiz ayrıldı!

Key.Original: %4Alpha%2 - Your squad.%1%5Nikos%2 - Miller's contact in the FIA.%1%3Falcon%2 - Camp Maxwell HQ.%1%3Bravo%2 - Camp Maxwell defence.%1%6Charlie%2 - North-east sector recon.%1%7Delta%2 - North-west sector recon.
Key.Chinese: %4Alpha%2－你的分隊。%1%5Nikos%2－Miller 在 FIA 的關係人。%1%3Falcon%2－Maxwell 營地總部。%1%3Bravo%2－Maxwell 營地守軍。%1%6Charlie%2－東北分區偵查兵。%1%7Delta%2－西北分區偵查兵。
Key.French: %4Alpha%2 - Votre groupe.%1%5Nikos%2 - Contact de Miller dans la FIA.%1%3Falcon%2 - PC du camp Maxwell.%1Bravo - Défense du camp Maxwell.%1Charlie - Éclaireur secteur nord-est.%1Delta - Éclaireur secteur nord-ouest.
Key.Spanish: %4Alpha%2: su escuadrón.%1%5Nikos%2: contacto de Miller en la FIA.%1%3Falcon%2: cuartel de Camp Maxwell.%1%3Bravo%2: defensa de Camp Maxwell.%1%6Charlie%2: reconocimiento del sector noreste.%17Delta%2: reconocimiento del sector noroeste.
Key.Italian: %4Alpha%2 - La tua squadra.%1%5Nikos%2 - Contatto di Miller presso la FIA.%1%3Falcon%2 - Quartier generale di Camp Maxwell.%1Bravo - Difesa di Camp Maxwell.%1Charlie - Ricognitori nel settore nord-est.%1Delta - Ricognitori nel settore nord-ovest.
Key.Polish: %4Alpha%2 - twój oddział.%1%5Nikos%2 - kontakt Millera w FIA.%1%3Falcon%2 - sztab w Camp Maxwell.%1Bravo - obrona Camp Maxwell.%1Charlie - zwiad w sektorze północno-wschodnim.%1Delta - zwiad w sektorze północno-zachodnim.
Key.Russian: %4Альфа%2 - ваш отряд.%1%5Никос%2 - контакт Миллера в FIA.%1%3Сокол%2 - штаб в лагере Максвелл.%1%3Браво%2 - оборона лагеря Максвелл.%1%6Чарли%2 - разведка в северо-восточном секторе.%1%7Дельта%2 - разведка в северо-западном секторе.
Key.German: %4Alpha%2 - Ihr Trupp.%1%5Nikos%2 - Millers Kontakt bei der FIA.%1%3Falcon%2 - Hauptquartier Camp Maxwell.%1Bravo - Verteidigung von Camp Maxwell.%1Charlie - Aufklärung nordöstlicher Sektor.%1Delta - Aufklärung nordwestlicher Sektor.
Key.Czech: %4Alfa%2 – vaše četa.%1%5Nikos%2 – Millerův kontakt ve FIA.%1%3Falcon%2 – velení v táboře Maxwell.%1%3Bravo%2 – obrana táboru Maxwell.%1%6Charlie%2 – průzkum v severovýchodním sektoru.%1%7Delta%2 – průzkum v severozápadním sektoru.
Key.English: %4Alpha%2 - Your squad.%1%5Nikos%2 - Miller's contact in the FIA.%1%3Falcon%2 - Camp Maxwell HQ.%1%3Bravo%2 - Camp Maxwell defence.%1%6Charlie%2 - North-east sector recon.%1%7Delta%2 - North-west sector recon.
Key.Portuguese: %4Alfa%2 – Seu grupo de combate.%1%5Nikos%2 – Contato de Miller na FIA.%1%3Falcão%2 – QG do Acampamento Maxwell.%1Bravo – Defesa do Acampamento Maxwell.%1Charlie – Reconhecimento do setor nordeste.%1Delta – Reconhecimento do setor noroeste.
Key.Korean: %4알파%2 - 플레이어의 분대%1%5니코스%2 - 밀러의 FIA 연락책%1%3팰컨%2 - 맥스웰 주둔지 본부%1브라보 - 맥스웰 주둔지 방어병력%1찰리 - 북동쪽 구역 수색대%1델타 - 북서쪽 구역 수색대
Key.Chinesesimp: %4Alpha%2 - 你的小队。%1%5Nikos%2 - Miller 在 FIA 的联络人。%1%3Falcon%2 - Maxwell 总部营地。%1%3Bravo%2 - Maxwell 营地防御部队。%1%6Charlie%2 - 东北防区的侦察兵。%1%7Delta%2 - 西北防区的侦察兵。
Key.Japanese: %4アルファ%2 - 自分の分隊。%1%5ニコス%2 - FIAに所属するミラーの連絡員。1%3ファルコン%2 - キャンプ・マクスウェル本部。%1%3ブラボー%2 - キャンプ・マクスウェル防衛。%1%6チャーリー%2 - 北東セクター偵察。%1%7デルタ%2 - 北西セクター偵察。
Key.Turkish: %4Alpha%2 - Senin mangan.%1%5Nikos%2 - Miller'ın FIA'daki teması.%1%3Falcon%2 - Maxwell Kampı Karargahı.%1%3Bravo%2 - Maxwell Kampı savunması.%1%6Charlie%2 - Kuzeydoğu mıntıkası keşif devriyesi.%1%7Delta%2 - Kuzeybatı mıntıkası keşif devriyesi.

Key.Original: TAKE
Key.Chinese: 拿取
Key.French: PRENDRE
Key.Spanish: COGER
Key.Italian: PRENDI
Key.Polish: ZABIERZ
Key.Russian: ВЗЯТЬ
Key.German: NEHMEN
Key.Czech: VZÍT
Key.English: TAKE
Key.Portuguese: PEGUE
Key.Chinesesimp: 拿取
Key.Japanese: 取る
Key.Turkish: AL

Key.Original: Take the backpack
Key.Chinese: 拿取背包
Key.French: Prendre le sac à dos
Key.Spanish: Coja la mochila
Key.Italian: Prendi lo zaino.
Key.Polish: Zabierz plecak
Key.Russian: Взять рюкзак
Key.German: Den Rucksack nehmen
Key.Czech: Vezmi batoh
Key.English: Take the backpack
Key.Portuguese: Pegue a mochila
Key.Chinesesimp: 拿取背包
Key.Japanese: バックパックを取れ
Key.Turkish: Sırt çantasını al.

Key.Original: Take the backpack and equip your night vision goggles.
Key.Chinese: 拿取背包並裝備夜視鏡。
Key.French: Prenez le sac à dos et équipez-vous des lunettes de vision nocturne.
Key.Spanish: Coja la mochila y póngase sus gafas de visión nocturna.
Key.Italian: Prendi lo zaino ed equipaggia gli occhiali notturni.
Key.Polish: Zabierz plecak i załóż gogle noktowizyjne.
Key.Russian: Возьмите рюкзак и наденьте прибор ночного видения.
Key.German: Nehmen Sie den Rucksack und setzen Sie das Nachtsichtgerät auf.
Key.Czech: Vezmi batoh a nasaď si brýle nočního vidění.
Key.English: Take the backpack and equip your night vision goggles.
Key.Portuguese: Pegue a mochila e se equipe com os óculos de visão noturna.
Key.Chinesesimp: 拿走背包，带上夜视镜。
Key.Japanese: バックパックを取り、ナイトビジョンゴーグルを装備せよ。
Key.Turkish: Sırt çantasını al ve gece görüş gözlüğünü tak.

Key.Original: SECURE
Key.Chinese: 保衛
Key.French: CAPTURER
Key.Spanish: ASEGURAR
Key.Italian: CONQUISTA
Key.Polish: ZABEZPIECZ
Key.Russian: ЗАХВАТИТЬ
Key.German: SICHERN
Key.Czech: ZAJISTIT
Key.English: SECURE
Key.Portuguese: PROTEJA
Key.Chinesesimp: 夺取
Key.Japanese: 確保
Key.Turkish: ELE GEÇİR

Key.Original: Secure Agios Ioannis
Key.Chinese: 保衛 Agios Ioannis
Key.French: Prendre Agios Ioannis
Key.Spanish: Asegure Agios Ioannis
Key.Italian: Conquista Agios Ioannis.
Key.Polish: Zabezpiecz Agios Ioannis
Key.Russian: Захватить Агиос Иоаннис
Key.German: Agios Ioannis sichern
Key.Czech: Zajisti Agios Ioannis
Key.English: Secure Agios Ioannis
Key.Portuguese: Proteja Agios Ioannis
Key.Chinesesimp: 夺取 Agios Ioannis
Key.Japanese: アギオス・イオアニスを確保せよ
Key.Turkish: Agios Ioannis'i Ele Geçir

Key.Original: Secure the village of %2Agios Ioannis%1.
Key.Chinese: 保衛 %2Agios Ioannis%1 的村莊。
Key.French: Prenez le village d'%2Agios Ioannis%1.
Key.Spanish: Asegure la localidad de %2Agios Ioannis%1.
Key.Italian: Conquista il villaggio di %2Agios Ioannis%1.
Key.Polish: Zabezpiecz wioskę %2Agios Ioannis%1.
Key.Russian: Захватите деревню %2Агиос Иоаннис%1.
Key.German: Sichern Sie das Dorf %2Agios Ioannis%1.
Key.Czech: Zajisti vesnici %2Agios Ioannis%1.
Key.English: Secure the village of %2Agios Ioannis%1.
Key.Portuguese: Proteja a vila de %2Agios Ioannis%1.
Key.Chinesesimp: 夺取 %2Agios Ioannis%1 的村庄。
Key.Japanese: %2アギオス・イオアニス%1の村を確保せよ。
Key.Turkish: %2Agios Ioannis%1 köyünü ele geçir.

Key.Original: Flanking
Key.Chinese: 側翼攻擊
Key.French: Contournement
Key.Spanish: Flanqueo
Key.Italian: Fiancheggiamento
Key.Polish: Oskrzydlanie
Key.Russian: Заход с флангов
Key.German: Flankieren
Key.Czech: Útok z boku
Key.English: Flanking
Key.Portuguese: Flanco
Key.Chinesesimp: 侧翼攻击
Key.Japanese: 側面攻撃
Key.Turkish: Kuşatma

Key.Original: Clear Houses
Key.Chinese: 掃蕩屋內
Key.French: Nettoyer les maisons
Key.Spanish: Limpiar casas
Key.Italian: Libera le case
Key.Polish: Zabezpiecz domy
Key.Russian: Зачистить дома
Key.German: Häuser räumen
Key.Czech: Vyčistěte domy
Key.English: Clear Houses
Key.Portuguese: Verifique as casas
Key.Chinesesimp: 确认房屋安全
Key.Japanese: 家々を一掃せよ
Key.Turkish: Evleri Temizle

Key.Original: Meet FIA soldiers and resupply at their depot.
Key.Chinese: 與 FIA 士兵會面，從他們的儲藏庫進行補給。
Key.French: Retrouvez les soldats de la FIA et ravitaillez-vous à leur dépôt.
Key.Spanish: Reúnase con soldados de la FIA y lleve suministros a su depósito.
Key.Italian: Incontra i soldati FIA e rifornisciti presso il loro deposito.
Key.Polish: Spotkaj się z żołnierzami FIA i uzupełnij zapasy, korzystając z ich magazynu.
Key.Russian: Встретьтесь с солдатами FIA и возьмите их запасы.
Key.German: Stoßen Sie zu FIA-Soldaten und nehmen Sie in deren Depot Nachschub auf.
Key.Czech: Sejděte se s vojáky FIA a doplňte si zásoby v jejich skladišti.
Key.English: Meet FIA soldiers and resupply at their depot.
Key.Portuguese: Encontre-se com os soldados da FIA e se reabasteça no depósito deles.
Key.Korean: FIA 병사와 만나, 그들의 보급창에서 재보급을 받습니다.
Key.Chinesesimp: 与 FIA 士兵会合，在他们的营地补充补给。
Key.Japanese: FIA兵士と接触し、補給所で再補給せよ。
Key.Turkish: FIA askerleriyle buluş ve depolarında yeniden ikmal yap.

Key.Original: Tensions grow as NATO peacekeepers prepare to leave the island of Stratis.
Key.Chinese: 由於 NATO 維和部隊準備撤離 Stratis 島，情勢漸形緊張。
Key.French: Les tensions s'exacerbent alors que les forces de paix de l'OTAN s'apprêtent à quitter l'île de Stratis.
Key.Spanish: Las tensiones crecen a medida que los pacificadores de la OTAN se preparan para dejar la isla de Stratis.
Key.Italian: La tensione aumenta mentre le forze di peacekeeping della NATO si preparano ad abbandonare Stratis.
Key.Polish: Rośnie napięcie, kiedy rozjemcy NATO przygotowują się do opuszczenia wyspy Stratis.
Key.Russian: Миротворческие силы НАТО готовятся покинуть остров Стратис. Напряжение растет.
Key.German: Die Spannungen nehmen zu, seit die NATO-Friedenstruppen ihren Abzug von der Insel Stratis vorbereiten.
Key.Czech: Napětí stoupá, mírové sbory NATO se připravují k opuštění ostrova Stratis.
Key.English: Tensions grow as NATO peacekeepers prepare to leave the island of Stratis.
Key.Portuguese: A tensão ficou ainda maior, pois as forças de paz da OTAN estão para sair da ilha de Stratis.
Key.Korean: NATO 평화유지군이 스트라티스 섬을 떠날 준비를 하면서, 지역의 긴장감이 높아지고 있습니다.
Key.Chinesesimp: 随着北约维和部队准备离开 Stratis 岛，局势日益紧张。
Key.Japanese: NATO平和維持部隊がストラティス島を離れる準備を進め、緊張が高まっている。
Key.Turkish: NATO arabulucuları Stratis adasından ayrılmaya hazırlanırken gerilim artıyor.

Key.Original: Drawdown 2035
Key.French: Déclin 2035

Key.Russian: Сокращение-2035

Key.Chinesesimp: 2035 年撤军

Key.Original: First Aid Kit
Key.Chinese: 急救包
Key.French: Kit de premiers secours
Key.Spanish: Kit de primeros auxilios
Key.Italian: Kit di pronto soccorso
Key.Polish: Zestaw pierwszej pomocy
Key.Russian: Перевязочный пакет
Key.German: Erste-Hilfe-Kasten
Key.Czech: Souprava první pomoci
Key.English: First Aid Kit
Key.Portuguese: Kit de primeiros socorros
Key.Chinesesimp: 急救包
Key.Japanese: 救急キット
Key.Turkish: İlk Yardım Çantası

Container.name: x10_MoveOn
Container.situation: player taking his sweet time at the checkpoint

Key.Original: When the angry looking gentleman with the gun tells you to drive on, Kerry, you drive on. Get a move on.
Key.Chinese: Kerry，要是有人很生氣地拿槍指著你叫你繼續開車，你就照做。繼續行動。
Key.French: Quand le monsieur pas sympa avec le flingue vous dit de circuler, vous circulez. Activez un peu, Kerry.
Key.Spanish: Cuando el caballero con pistola de aspecto enfadado le diga que conduzca, Kerry, ¡conduzca! Póngase en marcha.
Key.Italian: Kerry, quando il tizio con la faccia arrabbiata e la pistola ti dice di andare avanti, tu vai avanti. Datti una mossa.
Key.Polish: Kiedy groźnie wyglądający facet z bronią mówi ci, żeby jechać dalej, to jedziesz dalej, Kerry. Ruszaj.
Key.Russian: Керри, если злые люди с оружием говорят тебе ехать - значит, надо ехать. Жми давай быстрей.
Key.German: Wenn der unfreundliche Herr mit der Waffe Ihnen sagt, dass Sie fahren sollen, Kerry, dann fahren Sie einfach. Los jetzt!
Key.Czech: Kerry, když ti nějaký naštvaně vypadající gentleman se zbraní v ruce řekne, že máš jet dál, tak uděláš přesně to, co po tobě chce. Hni sebou.
Key.English: When the angry looking gentleman with the gun tells you to drive on, Kerry, you drive on. Get a move on.
Key.Portuguese: Kerry, quando armados furiosos disserem para continuar dirigindo, você continua dirigindo. Ande logo.
Key.Korean: 열 받은 것 같고, 총을 가진 사람이 운전하라고 하면 말이다, 케리. 운전을 해야 하는 거야. 빨리 가자고.
Key.Chinesesimp: 在看上去怒气冲冲的带枪男人让你继续开车的时候，Kerry，你就继续开。继续前进。
Key.Japanese: 銃を手にした強面の紳士に運転を続けろと言われたら、ケリー、運転を続けるんだ。急げ。
Key.Turkish: Elinde silah olan öfkeli bir centilmen sana sürmeye devam etmeni söylerse, sürmeye devam et, Kerry. Hızlan.

Container.name: x05_SlowItDown
Container.situation: player driving the truck a bit too fast

Key.Original: Ease up a bit on the gas, Kerry.
Key.Chinese: Kerry，油門別踩太狠。
Key.French: Mollo sur le champignon, Kerry.
Key.Spanish: Afloje un poco, Kerry.
Key.Italian: Non esagerare con l'acceleratore, Kerry.
Key.Polish: Zdejmij nogę z gazu, Kerry.
Key.Russian: Не надо так газовать, Керри.
Key.German: Gehen Sie mal ein bisschen vom Gas, Kerry.
Key.Czech: Nepřeháněj to s tím plynem, Kerry.
Key.English: Ease up a bit on the gas, Kerry.
Key.Portuguese: Não seja pé-de-chumbo, Kerry.
Key.Chinesesimp: 松点油门，Kerry。
Key.Japanese: もう少しゆっくり頼むよ、ケリー。
Key.Turkish: Gazı biraz bırak, Kerry.

Key.Original: This thing stops like an oil tanker.
Key.Chinese: 停這台跟停油輪沒兩樣。
Key.French: Ce camion a la distance de freinage d'un pétrolier.
Key.Spanish: Esto se detiene como un petrolero.
Key.Italian: Quest'affare si ferma come una petroliera.
Key.Polish: Ten pojazd ma drogę hamowania jak tankowiec.
Key.Russian: Смотри, он тормозит долго.
Key.German: Das Ding bremst wie ein Tanklaster.
Key.Czech: Tahle věc má brzdnou dráhu jako ropný tanker.
Key.English: This thing stops like an oil tanker.
Key.Portuguese: Parece um petroleiro freando.
Key.Korean: 이 차는 유조차처럼 제동거리가 길단 말이다.
Key.Chinesesimp: 这东西象油罐车那样停车。
Key.Japanese: こいつは石油タンカーなみに止まらない。
Key.Turkish: Bu şey akaryakıt tankeri gibi duruyor.

Container.name: x01_Offroading
Container.situation: player takes a crazy route out of rogain

Key.Original: Fuck, Kerry, what are you doing?!
Key.Chinese: 我操，Kerry，你在幹嘛！？
Key.French: Qu'est-ce que vous foutez, Kerry ?
Key.Spanish: ¡Joder, Kerry, ¿qué está haciendo?!
Key.Italian: Dannazione, Kerry, cosa combini?
Key.Polish: Cholera, Kerry, gdzie ty się wybierasz?!
Key.Russian: Блин, Керри, ты что творишь?!
Key.German: Verdammt, Kerry, was machen Sie denn?
Key.Czech: Kurva, Kerry, co to vyvádíš?
Key.English: Fuck, Kerry, what are you doing?!
Key.Portuguese: Que merda, Kerry! O que você está fazendo?!
Key.Chinesesimp: 见鬼，Kerry，你在干什么？！
Key.Japanese: おい、ケリー、何やってるんだ！？
Key.Turkish: Kahretsin, Kerry, ne yapıyorsun?!

Container.name: i10_Driving
Container.situation: leader gives the player some hints on how to drive

Key.Original: Just so we're clear, Kerry, this thing isn't exactly a sports car.
Key.Chinese: 先跟你說清楚，Kerry，這可不是跑車。
Key.French: Au risque d'enfoncer des portes ouvertes, c'est un camion, pas une voiture de course.
Key.Spanish: Para que quede claro, Kerry, esto no es exactamente un coche deportivo.
Key.Italian: Giusto per essere chiari, Kerry, questa non è un'auto sportiva.
Key.Polish: Wyjaśnijmy sobie coś, Kerry. To coś nie jest samochodem sportowym.
Key.Russian: Керри, я напомню на всякий случай - это не спорткар.
Key.German: Nur damit das klar ist, Kerry, dieses Ding ist nicht gerade ein Sportwagen.
Key.Czech: Jen aby bylo jasno, Kerry, tahle věc není zrovna sporťák.
Key.English: Just so we're clear, Kerry, this thing isn't exactly a sports car.
Key.Portuguese: Kerry, só para deixar bem claro. Isso não é um esportivo.
Key.Korean: 이거 하나만 확실히 해두자, 케리. 이 물건은 스포츠카가 아니거든?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你要明白，Kerry，这东西可不是跑车。
Key.Japanese: 言っておくがケリー、こいつはスポーツカーとは違うんだ。
Key.Turkish: Hepimizin bildiği gibi, Kerry, bu kesinlikle bir spor araba değil.

Key.Original: It's going to be heavier; it's going to be less responsive.
Key.Chinese: 它很笨重，反應也不靈敏。
Key.French: La conduite est lourde et pas très réactive.
Key.Spanish: Es más pesado, con peor respuesta.
Key.Italian: Sarà più pesante e meno reattiva.
Key.Polish: Jest znacznie cięższy i mniej zwrotny.
Key.Russian: Эта штука тяжелее, управления слушается хуже.
Key.German: Es wird schwerer, und es wird langsamer reagieren.
Key.Czech: Je mnohem těžší a nebude tak pohotově reagovat.
Key.English: It's going to be heavier; it's going to be less responsive.
Key.Portuguese: Claro que é mais pesado. Claro que a resposta é pior.
Key.Korean: 다른 차보다 무겁기도 하고, 반응도 느려.
Key.Chinesesimp: 它比较重，反应比较不灵敏。
Key.Japanese: ずっと重いし、反応も鈍くなる。
Key.Turkish: Daha ağır olacak; daha az duyarlı olacak.

Key.Original: Please don't flip us, and definitely don't run some poor SOB over. I, for one, am not interested in that paperwork.
Key.Chinese: 麻煩你別把我們甩來甩去，還有別輾過人。我不想為這種事情寫報告。
Key.French: Évitez de nous renverser et surtout, n'écrasez personne. Trop de paperasse.
Key.Spanish: No vuelque y, desde luego, no atropelle a ningún pobre hijo de puta. No tengo intención de rellenar esa clase de papeleo.
Key.Italian: Non mandarci a gambe all'aria, e soprattutto non investire qualche poveraccio. Non voglio infilarmi in pasticci burocratici.
Key.Polish: Przestań nami rzucać i nie rozjedź jakiegoś przeklętego biedaka. Nie interesuje mnie robota papierkowa.
Key.Russian: Пожалуйста, не переверни нас, и не раздави какого-нибудь бедолагу. Мне совсем не интересно потом отчеты писать.
Key.German: Ich will nicht umkippen, und überfahren Sie nicht irgendwelche armen Schweine. Ich kann auf den Papierkram bestens verzichten.
Key.Czech: A moc tě prosím, nepřevrať nás a nepřejeď tu žádného chudáka. Nevím jak ty, ale já na to papírování nejsem zvědavý.
Key.English: Please don't flip us, and definitely don't run some poor SOB over. I, for one, am not interested in that paperwork.
Key.Portuguese: Cuidado para não capotar nem passar por cima de algum filho da mãe. Não estou a fim de mexer com papelada.
Key.Korean: 제발 뒤집히지 말고, 불쌍한 행인도 들이받으면 안 돼. 그런 걸로 서류 작성하는 건 질색이란 말이다.
Key.Chinesesimp: 拜托别颠我们，千万别辗到什么人。我对那种文书工作不感兴趣。
Key.Japanese: 頼むから俺たちを放り出さないでくれよ。哀れな野郎をひき殺すのもやめてくれ。そういう事務仕事は好きじゃないんでね。
Key.Turkish: Lütfen bize takla attırma ve şu zavallı SOB'leri de sakın ezme. Özellikle belirtmeliyim ki evrak işleriyle ilgilenmiyorum.

Container.name: i05_Fatigue
Container.situation: leader tells player to catch his breath

Key.Original: Jesus fucking Christ, Kerry, you won't hit shit if you're fucking wheezing like that, ok?
Key.Chinese: 去你的，Kerry，你喘成這副德性，是能打中個屁啊？
Key.French: Bon Dieu, Kerry, vous ne servirez à rien si vous êtes à bout de souffle.
Key.Spanish: Dios mío, Kerry, resollando así no le va a dar a una mierda, ¿de acuerdo?
Key.Italian: Cristo santo, Kerry, non colpirai niente se continui ad ansimare così!
Key.Polish: Jezu Chryste, Kerry, nie strzeli ci pikawa, skoro tak rzęzisz?
Key.Russian: Боже мой, Керри. Хрен ты куда попадешь, если так хрипеть будешь. Спокойней, ладно?
Key.German: Grundgütiger, Kerry, Sie treffen gar nichts, wenn Sie so schnaufen, okay?
Key.Czech: Ježíšikriste, Kerry, jestli tu kurva budeš takhle popadat dech, tak netrefíš ani hovno, jasné?
Key.English: Jesus fucking Christ, Kerry, you won't hit shit if you're fucking wheezing like that, ok?
Key.Portuguese: Meu Deus, Kerry. Você não vai acertar nem um elefante ofegando desse jeito.
Key.Korean: 이런 세상에, 케리. 그렇게 헉헉 거리면 아무 것도 못 맞춘다. 알았냐?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的天哪，Kerry，如果你象那样喘气，你啥都打不中，明白吗？
Key.Japanese: おいおい、ケリー。そんなに息を荒げてたら、クソにだって当たらないぞ。
Key.Turkish: Aman Tanrım, Kerry, böyle hırlamaya devam edersen hiçbir şeye isabet ettiremeyeceksin, tamam mı?

Key.Original: Focus. Take a breather if you need it. Slow is smooth and smooth is fast.
Key.Chinese: 專心。先讓你喘一會。不疾不徐，順了就會快。
Key.French: Prenez un peu de repos, s'il le faut. Chi va piano va sano.
Key.Spanish: Céntrese. Inspire profundamente, si lo necesita. Lento es suave y suave es rápido.
Key.Italian: Concentrati. Respira profondamente se ti serve. Lento, movimento continuo e veloce
Key.Polish: Skup się. Weź głęboki oddech, jeśli tego potrzebujesz. Wolniej jest płynniej, a płynniej jest szybciej.
Key.Russian: Сосредоточься. Если надо, глубоко вздохни. Медленно - значит плавно, а плавно - значит быстро.
Key.German: Konzentration. Atmen Sie tief durch, falls nötig. Langsam ist problemlos, und problemlos ist schnell.
Key.Czech: Soustřeď se. Dej si pauzu, jestli ti to pomůže. Pomalu znamená hladce. A hladce znamená rychle.
Key.English: Focus. Take a breather if you need it. Slow is smooth and smooth is fast.
Key.Portuguese: Concentre-se. Descanse um pouco se precisar. Lento é suave, e suave é rápido.
Key.Korean: 집중해. 필요하면 심호흡도 좀 하고. 느릴 수록 부드럽고, 부드러울 수록 빠른 거야.
Key.Chinesesimp: 集中精神。如果需要，戴上呼吸器。慢就是稳，稳就是快。
Key.Japanese: 集中しろ。必要なら一息つくんだ。ゆっくりは滑らか、滑らかは素早いってやつさ。
Key.Turkish: Odaklan. İhtiyacın varsa bir mola ver. Yavaş gidersen sorun çıkmaz, sorun çıkmazsa hızlı gitmiş olursun.

Key.Original: Move carefully - cover to cover - conserve your energy.
Key.Chinese: 小心利用掩蔽移動，保留力氣。
Key.French: Avancez prudemment, d'abri en abri. Conservez votre énergie.
Key.Spanish: Avance con cuidado, de cobertura en cobertura. Conserve la energía.
Key.Italian: Muoviti con attenzione, di riparo in riparo. Conserva le energie.
Key.Polish: Poruszaj się ostrożnie - od osłony do osłony - oszczędzaj siły.
Key.Russian: Иди осторожно, от укрытия к укрытию. Сохраняй энергию.
Key.German: Bewegen Sie sich vorsichtig - von Deckung zu Deckung - und sparen Sie Ihre Energie auf.
Key.Czech: Pohybuj se opatrně - od krytu ke krytu – šetři si síly.
Key.English: Move carefully - cover to cover - conserve your energy.
Key.Portuguese: Mova-se devagar, de cobertura em cobertura. Economize sua energia.
Key.Korean: 조심스럽게 엄폐물 사이를 이동하면서 힘을 아껴.
Key.Chinesesimp: 小心前进 - 从一个掩体移到另一个掩体 - 保存精力。
Key.Japanese: 慎重に移動しろ。身を隠しながら。体力を温存しながら。
Key.Turkish: Dikkatli ilerle, siperden sipere, enerjini koru.

Container.name: i01_First_Aid_Kit
Container.situation: leader tells player to use his first aid kit

Key.Original: Kerry, you look like shit. Get those wounds looked at.
Key.Chinese: Kerry，你看起來糟透了。去治療傷口。
Key.French: Kerry, vous avez une gueule de déterré. Allez voir le toubib.
Key.Spanish: Kerry, parece hecho una mierda. Que le vean esas heridas.
Key.Italian: Kerry, hai un aspetto terribile. Fatti guardare quelle ferite.
Key.Polish: Kerry, wyglądasz paskudnie. Niech ktoś ci opatrzy te rany.
Key.Russian: Керри, хреново ты выглядишь. Подлечиться бы надо.
Key.German: Kerry, Sie sehen scheiße aus! Lassen Sie diese Wunden behandeln.
Key.Czech: Kerry, vypadáš jako řezník. Běž a nech si to ošetřit.
Key.English: Kerry, you look like shit. Get those wounds looked at.
Key.Portuguese: Kerry, você está todo acabado. Cuide desses ferimentos.
Key.Korean: 케리, 꼴이 참 가관이군. 그 상처들 좀 어떻게 해 봐.
Key.Chinesesimp: Kerry，你看起来糟透了。去处理一下那些伤口。
Key.Japanese: ケリー、ひどいザマだな。その傷を診てもらうんだ。
Key.Turkish: Kerry, berbat görünüyorsun. Şu yaralarına bir baktır.

Key.Original: If you have to, patch yourself up with your first aid kit.
Key.Chinese: 沒辦法的話就用急救包先包紮一下。
Key.French: Si besoin est, utilisez votre kit de 1ers secours.
Key.Spanish: Si es preciso, apáñese usted mismo con su botiquín.
Key.Italian: Devi farlo, datti una sistemata con il kit di pronto soccorso.
Key.Polish: Jeśli to potrzebne, skorzystaj z apteczki i opatrz sobie rany.
Key.Russian: Если нужно, возьми аптечку, залатай свои раны.
Key.German: Falls nötig, flicken Sie sich mit Ihrem Erste-Hilfe-Kasten zusammen.
Key.Czech: Když to je nutné, použij svou soupravu první pomoci a dej se trochu do kupy.
Key.English: If you have to, patch yourself up with your first aid kit.
Key.Portuguese: Se precisar, trate você mesmo com o kit de primeiros socorros.
Key.Korean: 어쩔 수 없으면, 네 구급상자로 치료를 해.
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果有必要，用你的急救包给自己包扎一下。
Key.Japanese: 必要なら自分の救急キットで処置するんだ。
Key.Turkish: Gerekirse ilk yardım çantanı kullanarak yaralarını sar.

Key.Original: Better now than when the bullets are flying; better yet once you're in hard cover.
Key.Chinese: 現在就做，早做比子彈飛過來才做好。但最好還是找個可靠的掩護再開始治療。
Key.French: Autant faire ça maintenant tant qu'on est au calme ; ou mieux, quand on sera à l'abri.
Key.Spanish: Mejor ahora que cuando vuelen las balas. Y mejor aún si lo hace tras una sólida cobertura.
Key.Italian: Meglio adesso che con i proiettili che volano. Meglio ancora se si è ben al riparo.
Key.Polish: Lepiej wiedzieć, z której strony strzelają. A najlepiej siedzieć wtedy za osłoną.
Key.Russian: Лучше сейчас, чем прямо под пулями. А всего лучше - в прочном укрытии.
Key.German: Besser jetzt, als wenn es Kugeln regnet. Noch besser, sobald Sie in sicherer Deckung sind.
Key.Czech: Furt lepší teď, než když kolem tebe budou hvízdat kulky, ale ideálně když jsi za pevnou překážkou.
Key.English: Better now than when the bullets are flying; better yet once you're in hard cover.
Key.Portuguese: Melhor agora do que quando as balas estiverem raspando nossas cabeças. Melhor ainda quando você estiver em uma cobertura sólida.
Key.Korean: 총알이 날아오기 전에 지금 치료해. 단단한 엄폐물 뒤에서 하면 더 좋고.
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在做好过在子弹乱飞的时候做；最好在安全的掩体里做。
Key.Japanese: 弾が飛んでる時より今がいいし、遮蔽物に隠れられたら文句なしだ。
Key.Turkish: Mermilerin havada uçuştuğu zamandan daha iyi, ama güçlü bir siper bulduğunda daha iyi olacak.

Container.name: 97_Tense
Container.participants: EPA B Player;EPA B Intro CO;EPA B Bravo Lead;
Container.situation: player and co acknowledge the tense situation en route to the checkpoint

Key.Original: Yes, Staff Sergeant! I'll put on my best smile, sir.
Key.Chinese: 是，上士！我會盡力保持和藹可親，長官。
Key.French: Oui, Sergent-chef ! Je vais leur faire un grand sourire.
Key.Spanish: ¡Sí, sargento! Pondré mi mejor sonrisa, señor.
Key.Italian: Sì, sergente capo! Sfoggerò il mio sorriso migliore, signore.
Key.Polish: Tak, sierżancie sztabowy! Postaram się o jak najlepszy uśmiech, sir.
Key.Russian: Так точно, штаб-сержант! Буду улыбаться что есть сил, сэр.
Key.German: Jawohl, Staff Sergeant! Ich werde mein schönstes Lächeln aufsetzen, Sir.
Key.Czech: Provedu, seržante! Nasadím svůj nejlepší úsměv.
Key.English: Yes, Staff Sergeant! I'll put on my best smile, sir.
Key.Portuguese: Sim, Sargento Operacional! Manterei as esperanças, senhor.
Key.Korean: 알겠습니다, 하사님! 최대한 멋진 미소를 보여주겠습니다.
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，上士！我会露出我最好的笑容，长官！
Key.Japanese: はい、曹長！最高の笑顔を作りますよ。
Key.Turkish: Evet, Başçavuş! En iyi gülümsememi göstereceğim, komutanım.

Key.Original: No kidding. I better give Lacey the heads up.
Key.Chinese: 這可不是開玩笑的。我最好提醒一下 Lacey。
Key.French: Sans blague. Je ferais mieux d'avertir Lacey.
Key.Spanish: No bromeo. Mejor aviso a Lacey.
Key.Italian: Niente scherzi. Meglio allertare Lacey.
Key.Polish: Bez żartów. Lepiej ostrzegę Laceya.
Key.Russian: Это точно. Предупрежу-ка я Лэйси.
Key.German: Ohne Witz. Ich informiere Lacey besser mal.
Key.Czech: To teda. Radši bych měl dát vědět Laceymu.
Key.English: No kidding. I better give Lacey the heads up.
Key.Portuguese: Não brinca. Melhor avisar Lacey.
Key.Chinesesimp: 别开玩笑。我最好提醒 Lacey。
Key.Japanese: 冗談じゃない。レイシーに情報を伝えた方がいいな。
Key.Turkish: Şaka değil. Lacey'e haber versem iyi olacak.

Key.Original: Jesus, the AAF seem really on edge, huh?
Key.Chinese: 哇，AAF 好像真的很緊張耶。
Key.French: L'AAF a l'air sur les nerfs, non ?
Key.Spanish: Dios, la AAF parece estar a la que salta, ¿eh?
Key.Italian: Gesù, l'AAF sembra davvero in agitazione, vero?
Key.Polish: Jezu, AAF nie odpuszcza, co?
Key.Russian: Бог ты мой... Разозлилась нынче AAF, да?
Key.German: Meine Gür, die AAF ist ganz schön nervös, was?
Key.Czech: Ježíši, ti z AAF vypadají pěkně nervní, co?
Key.English: Jesus, the AAF seem really on edge, huh?
Key.Portuguese: Nossa, a AAF parece estar no limite.
Key.Korean: 이런, 그린백 놈들이 꽤나 까칠하게 구는데요?
Key.Chinesesimp: 天啊，AAF 看起来真的很焦虑，呃？
Key.Japanese: 畜生AAFめ、マジでピリピリしてるって感じじゃないか？
Key.Turkish: Tanrım, AAF gerçekten gergin görünüyor, değil mi?

Key.Original: Sergeant Lacey, be advised, Greenbacks are really waving their dicks around today.
Key.Chinese: Lacey 中士，請注意，今天 Greenback 在到處耀武揚威。
Key.French: Sergent Lacey, pour info : les Altos jouent à qui a la plus grosse.
Key.Spanish: Sargento Lacey, sepa que hoy los Greenbacks andan enseñando el miembro viril.
Key.Italian: Sergente Lacey, i Greenback stanno davvero facendo i gradassi oggi.
Key.Polish: Sierżancie Lacey, uwaga, Zieloni są dziś nieźle wkurzeni.
Key.Russian: Сержант Лэйси, внимание, зеленые сейчас совсем с катушек сошли.
Key.German: Sergeant Lacey, Achtung, die Greenbacks machen heute ziemlich auf dicke Hose.
Key.Czech: Seržante Lacey, dávejte pozor, zdá se, že si dneska Zelenáči chtějí poměřovat čuráky.
Key.English: Sergeant Lacey, be advised, Greenbacks are really waving their dicks around today.
Key.Portuguese: Sargento Lacey, os Greenbacks estão se mostrando hoje.
Key.Korean: 레이시 병장, 그린백 놈들이 오늘 꽤나 얼빵하게 군다고 알림.
Key.Chinesesimp: Lacey 中士，请注意，Greenback 今天真的很猖狂。
Key.Japanese: レイシー軍曹、報告する。今日のグリーンバックどもはどうも調子に乗っている。
Key.Turkish: Çavuş Lacey, dikkatine, Çaylaklar bugün gerçekten sidik yarıştırıyor.

Key.Original: Be on your best behavior at the checkpoint, soldier, you got that?
Key.Chinese: 通過管制哨時，請拿出最好的表現，聽懂沒？
Key.French: Tenez-vous bien au point de contrôle, c'est compris, soldat ?
Key.Spanish: Muestre su mejor talante en el punto de control, soldado, ¿entendido?
Key.Italian: Comportati in modo impeccabile al checkpoint, soldato, hai capito?
Key.Polish: Zachowuj się w punkcie kontrolnym, żołnierzu, jasne?
Key.Russian: Солдат, на контрольной точке веди себя как следует, ясно?
Key.German: Benehmen Sie sich am Kontrollpunkt anständig, haben Sie das verstanden, Soldat?
Key.Czech: Na kontrolním stanovišti se chovejte slušně, vojáku, rozumíme si?
Key.English: Be on your best behavior at the checkpoint, soldier, you got that?
Key.Portuguese: Fique pianinho no ponto de verificação, soldado. Entendeu?
Key.Korean: 최대한 검문소에서 예의 바르게 행동해라, 병사. 알겠나?
Key.Chinesesimp: 在关卡表现出你最好的举止，明白吗？
Key.Japanese: チェックポイントでは精一杯行儀良くするんだ、わかったな？
Key.Turkish: Kontrol noktasında mümkün olduğunca uslu dur, asker, anlaşıldı mı?

Key.Original: You know, I don't think they even know what they're looking for, Kerry.
Key.Chinese: 跟你說，Kerry，我覺得他們根本不知道自己要找些什麼。
Key.French: Je ne sais même pas s'ils savent ce qu'ils cherchent, Kerry.
Key.Spanish: ¿Sabe, Kerry? No creo que ni sepan lo que están buscando.
Key.Italian: Non credo che sappiano nemmeno cosa stanno cercando, sai Kerry?
Key.Polish: Wiesz, Kerry, wydaje mi się, że oni nawet nie wiedzą, czego szukają.
Key.Russian: Я, Керри, даже не уверен, что они сами знают, что ищут.
Key.German: Wissen Sie, Kerry, ich glaube, die haben keine Ahnung, wonach sie suchen.
Key.Czech: Víte, myslím, že ani nevědí, co hledají, Kerry.
Key.English: You know, I don't think they even know what they're looking for, Kerry.
Key.Portuguese: Acho que eles não sabem o que estão procurando, Kerry.
Key.Korean: 있잖냐. 쟤들은 자기들이 뭘 찾는지도 모르는 것 같다, 케리.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你知道，我觉得他们甚至不知道他们要找什么，Kerry。
Key.Japanese: 連中、自分が何を探してるかさえわかってないだろうぜ、ケリー。
Key.Turkish: Bence ne aradıklarını bile bilmiyorlar, Kerry.

Container.name: 95_Inspect
Container.participants: EPA B Checkpoint Officer;EPA B Checkpoint Inspector;
Container.situation: checkpoint officer orders a soldier to inspect the truck

Key.Original: Yes, sir.
Key.Chinese: 是，長官。
Key.French: Oui, Sir.
Key.Spanish: Sí, señor.
Key.Italian: Sì, signore.
Key.Polish: Tak jest.
Key.Russian: Да, сэр.
Key.German: Jawohl, Sir!
Key.Czech: Ano, pane.
Key.English: Yes, sir.
Key.Portuguese: Sim, senhor.
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的，长官。
Key.Japanese: イエス、サー。
Key.Turkish: Evet, komutanım.

Key.Original: Private, check their truck.
Key.Chinese: 二等兵，檢查卡車。
Key.French: Soldat, inspectez le camion.
Key.Spanish: Soldado, revise ese camión.
Key.Italian: Soldato, controlla il loro camion.
Key.Polish: Szeregowy, sprawdź ich ciężarówkę.
Key.Russian: Рядовой, проверить грузовик.
Key.German: Private, überprüfen Sie den LKW.
Key.Czech: Vojíne, prohledejte ten náklaďák.
Key.English: Private, check their truck.
Key.Portuguese: Soldado, verifique o caminhão.
Key.Chinesesimp: 列兵，检查他们的卡车。
Key.Japanese: 二等兵、トラックを確認しろ。
Key.Turkish: Er, kamyonlarını kontrol et.

Container.name: 90_Stop
Container.situation: checkpoint officer orders the player to stop

Key.Original: Halt!
Key.Chinese: 暫停！
Key.French: Halte !
Key.Spanish: ¡Alto!
Key.Italian: Fermo!
Key.Polish: Stać!
Key.Russian: Стой!
Key.German: Halt!
Key.Czech: Stát!
Key.English: Halt!
Key.Portuguese: Pare!
Key.Chinesesimp: 停下！
Key.Japanese: 止まれ！
Key.Turkish: Dur!

Container.name: 80_Slow_Down
Container.situation: player's co tells the player to slow down

Key.Original: There's a checkpoint up ahead.
Key.Chinese: 前方有個管制哨。
Key.French: Point de contrôle droit devant.
Key.Spanish: Hay un punto de control delante.
Key.Italian: C'è un checkpoint più avanti.
Key.Polish: Przed nami punkt kontrolny.
Key.Russian: Впереди контрольная точка.
Key.German: Vor uns ist ein Kontrollpunkt.
Key.Czech: Před námi je kontrolní bod.
Key.English: There's a checkpoint up ahead.
Key.Portuguese: Há um ponto de verificação à frente.
Key.Chinesesimp: 前面有个关卡。
Key.Japanese: この先にチェックポイントがある。
Key.Turkish: İleride bir kontrol noktası var.

Key.Original: Slow it down, nice and easy.
Key.Chinese: 放慢速度，慢慢來。
Key.French: Tout doux, on ralentit.
Key.Spanish: Frene con cuidado.
Key.Italian: Rallenta, con calma.
Key.Polish: Zwolnij, spokojnie i bez nerwów.
Key.Russian: А теперь помедленней.
Key.German: Bremsen Sie ab, ganz ruhig und brav.
Key.Czech: Zpomal, pěkně plynule.
Key.English: Slow it down, nice and easy.
Key.Portuguese: Vá devagar, bem devagar.
Key.Chinesesimp: 放慢速度，慢慢来。
Key.Japanese: スピードを落とせ、ゆっくりだ。
Key.Turkish: Yavaşla, sakince.

Container.name: 76_Turn
Container.participants: EPA B Intro CO;EPA B Player;
Container.situation: player's co tells the player where to drive

Key.Original: Take a left at the T-junction.
Key.Chinese: T 字路口時左轉。
Key.French: Prenez à gauche à l'embranchement.
Key.Spanish: Gire a la izquierda en la bifurcación.
Key.Italian: Gira a sinistra all'incrocio.
Key.Polish: Na skrzyżowaniu skręć w lewo.
Key.Russian: На развилке налево.
Key.German: Biegen Sie an der T-Kreuzung links ab.
Key.Czech: Na příští křižovatce doleva.
Key.English: Take a left at the T-junction.
Key.Portuguese: Vire à esquerda no cruzamento.
Key.Chinesesimp: 在 T 字路口左转。
Key.Japanese: T字路を左だ。
Key.Turkish: T kavşağında sola dön.

Key.Original: And, Kerry, do try not to make roadkill of the local wildlife.
Key.Chinese: 還有，Kerry，別撞死路上的原生動物。
Key.French: Au fait, Kerry... Essayez de ne pas aplatir toute la faune.
Key.Spanish: Y Kerry, intente no hacer papilla a toda la fauna local.
Key.Italian: E Kerry, cerca di non far fuori la fauna locale con la tua guida.
Key.Polish: Kerry, postaraj się nie rozjechać żadnego przedstawiciela miejscowej fauny.
Key.Russian: Керри, постарайся только зверей не давить.
Key.German: Und, Kerry, lassen Sie die einheimischen Tiere in Ruhe.
Key.Czech: A Kerry, snaž se prosím tě nesrazit žádnou místní zvěř.
Key.English: And, Kerry, do try not to make roadkill of the local wildlife.
Key.Portuguese: Kerry, cuidado com os animais e as plantas.
Key.Korean: 그리고 케리, 차로 야생동물을 들이받지는 마라.
Key.Chinesesimp: 还有，Kerry，尽量别在路上撞死当地的野生动物。
Key.Japanese: それからケリー、野生動物をひかないように気をつけろよ。
Key.Turkish: Ayrıca, Kerry, yerel yabani hayvanları yolda ezmemeye çalış.

Key.Original: The AAF already hate our guts - we need to at least keep the goat population on side, you copy that, soldier?
Key.Chinese: AAF 對我們恨之入骨，所以我們至少要維持相當的山羊數量，聽懂沒，大兵？
Key.French: Déjà que l'AAF nous a pas à la bonne, faudrait pas décimer les chèvres locales, hein soldat ?
Key.Spanish: La AAF ya nos odia a muerte. Tengamos al menos a la población de cabras de nuestro lado, ¿entendido, soldado?
Key.Italian: L'AAF ci odia già abbastanza, dobbiamo almeno conquistarci il favore delle capre. Ricevuto, soldato?
Key.Polish: Wystarczy, że AAF nas nie cierpi. Lepiej niech populacja kóz będzie po naszej stronie. Jasne, żołnierzu?
Key.Russian: AAF нас и так ненавидят, не хватало нам еще тут всех козлов подавить. Понимаешь, да?
Key.German: Die AAF hasst und schon genug - da müssen wir nicht auch noch die Ziegen gegen uns aufbringen, ist das klar, Soldat?
Key.Czech: Už nás nesnáší AAF - potřebujem si udržet aspoň přízeň kozí populace, rozuměl jsi, vojáku?
Key.English: The AAF already hate our guts - we need to at least keep the goat population on side, you copy that, soldier?
Key.Portuguese: A AAF já não vai com a nossa cara. Precisamos ter ao menos as cabras do nosso lado. Copiou, soldado?
Key.Korean: 그린백 놈들은 이미 우리를 싫어하니, 최소한 염소들은 우리편으로 유지해야지. 알았냐, 병사?
Key.Chinesesimp: AAF 已经恨透了我们 - 我们至少得保持山羊的数量，你明白了吗，士兵？
Key.Japanese: AAFはもう俺たちのガッツにうんざりしてるさ。せめてヤギの群れをそばに置いておかないとな、いいか、ソルジャー？
Key.Turkish: AAF zaten bizden nefret ediyor - en azından keçi popülasyonunu kenarda tutmamız gerekiyor, anlaşıldı mı, asker?

Key.Original: Minimize collateral damage, sir. Hearts and minds, sir.
Key.Chinese: 正在將傷害減到最低，長官。全神貫注，長官。
Key.French: Minimiser les dégâts collatéraux, Sir. Je m'y emploie, Sir.
Key.Spanish: Daño colateral mínimo, señor. No lo olvidaré, señor.
Key.Italian: Ridurre al minimo i danni collaterali, signore. Cuori e menti, signore.
Key.Polish: Minimalne straty, sir. Wszystko jasne, sir.
Key.Russian: Минимизировать косвенный ущерб, сэр. Завоевать доверие местных, сэр.
Key.German: Minimiere Kollateralschäden, Sir. Mission Herz und Verstand, Sir.
Key.Czech: Minimalizovat druhotné ztráty, pane. Srdce a mysl, pane.
Key.English: Minimize collateral damage, sir. Hearts and minds, sir.
Key.Portuguese: Minimizar os danos colaterais, senhor. Corpo e alma, senhor.
Key.Korean: 부수적 피해 최소화. 잘 알아 모시겠습니다.
Key.Chinesesimp: 将附带损害降到最低限度，长官。完全明白，长官。
Key.Japanese: 巻き添え被害は最小限にしてください。人心掌握です。
Key.Turkish: Sivil zayiatını en aza indireceğiz, komutanım. Sevgi ve güven, komutanım.

Container.name: 75_Road
Container.situation: player's co tells the player where to drive

Key.Original: Alright, take the dirt road out of the camp.
Key.Chinese: 好，從泥土路離開營地。
Key.French: On va prendre le chemin de terre qui sort du camp.
Key.Spanish: Bien, tome el camino de tierra que sale del campamento.
Key.Italian: Va bene, prendi la sterrata fuori dal campo.
Key.Polish: Dobrze, możesz wyjechać z obozu.
Key.Russian: Езжай по грунтовке из лагеря.
Key.German: Nehmen Sie die unbefestigte Straße, die aus dem Lager hinausführt.
Key.Czech: Dobrá, tak po cestě ven z tábora.
Key.English: Alright, take the dirt road out of the camp.
Key.Portuguese: Certo. Saia do acampamento pela estrada de terra batida.
Key.Korean: 좋아, 주둔지 밖의 비포장도로를 타고 가자.
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，从土路离开营地。
Key.Japanese: よし、キャンプの外の未舗装道路に進め。
Key.Turkish: Pekâlâ, kamptan uzanan toprak yolu kullan.

Key.Original: Sergeant Lacey, grab the second truck. We're headed down to Kamino.
Key.Chinese: Lacey 中士，你開另一台卡車。我們要去 Kamino。
Key.French: Sergent Lacey, prenez le deuxième camion. Rendez-vous à Kamino.
Key.Spanish: Sargento Lacey, tome el segundo camión. Nos dirigimos a Kamino.
Key.Italian: Sergente Lacey, prenda il secondo camion. Siamo diretti a Kamino.
Key.Polish: Sierżancie Lacey, weź drugą ciężarówkę. Udamy się do Kamino.
Key.Russian: Сержант Лэйси, берите второй грузовик. Мы отправляемся в Камино.
Key.German: Sergeant Lacey, nehmen Sie den zweiten LKW. Wir wollen nach Kamino.
Key.Czech: Seržante Lacey, naskočte do druhého náklaďáku. Jedem dolů do Kamina.
Key.English: Sergeant Lacey, grab the second truck. We're headed down to Kamino.
Key.Portuguese: Sargento Lacey, pegue o segundo caminhão. Estamos seguindo para Kamino.
Key.Korean: 레이시 병장, 두 번째 트럭을 타고 와라. 카미노로 간다.
Key.Chinesesimp: Lacey 中士，夺取第二辆卡车，我们要前往 Kamino。
Key.Japanese: レイシー軍曹、2台目のトラックに乗るんだ。カミノに向かう。
Key.Turkish: Çavuş Lacey, ikinci kamyonu kap. Kamino'ya gidiyoruz.

Container.name: 73_Great_Service
Container.situation: helicopter gets out of the truck's path

Key.Original: You know, Kerry, the service here sure is excellent, sometimes.
Key.Chinese: 老實說，Kerry，這邊的服務有時候也是挺不錯。
Key.French: Franchement, Kerry, je trouve qu'on est accueillis comme des rois.
Key.Spanish: ¿Sabe, Kerry? A veces, el servicio aquí es excelente.
Key.Italian: Sai Kerry, il servizio da queste parti è eccellente, a volte.
Key.Polish: Wiesz, Kerry, służba tutaj jest doskonała, czasami.
Key.Russian: Знаете, Керри, а сервис здесь временами очень даже.
Key.German: Wissen Sie, Kerry, der Service hier ist ausgezeichnet ... manchmal.
Key.Czech: No, Kerry, služby tady občas fakt stojí za to.
Key.English: You know, Kerry, the service here sure is excellent, sometimes.
Key.Portuguese: Kerry, às vezes, o serviço aqui é excelente.
Key.Korean: 있잖냐, 케리. 가끔은 여기도 서비스가 꽤 좋단 말이지.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你知道，Kerry，这儿的服务有时真的很棒。
Key.Japanese: ほらケリー、ここのサービスは最高だろ。時々はな。
Key.Turkish: Biliyorsun, Kerry, buradaki hizmet mükemmeldir, yani bazen.

Container.name: 70_Fly_Away
Container.participants: EPA B November;EPA B Intro CO;
Container.situation: helicopter gets out of the truck's path

Key.Original: Sure, appreciated!
Key.Chinese: 好，感謝！
Key.French: Sympa, ça, merci !
Key.Spanish: ¡Claro, se lo agradezco!
Key.Italian: Sì, certo!
Key.Polish: Jasne, dziękuję!
Key.Russian: Конечно, спасибо!
Key.German: Natürlich, danke!
Key.Czech: Jasně, díky!
Key.English: Sure, appreciated!
Key.Portuguese: Muito obrigado!
Key.Chinesesimp: 当然，谢谢！
Key.Japanese: ああ、感謝だ！
Key.Turkish: Elbette, minnettarım!

Key.Original: Hold up a second there, Staff Sergeant, let us get out of your way.
Key.Chinese: 你等等，上士，我移個位讓你們走。
Key.French: Une petite seconde, Sergent-chef, qu'on vous dégage la voie.
Key.Spanish: Aguarde un momento, sargento, nos apartaremos de su camino.
Key.Italian: Fermati un momento, sergente capo, lascia che ci facciamo da parte.
Key.Polish: Chwileczkę, sierżancie sztabowy, zwolnimy ci drogę.
Key.Russian: Штаб-сержант, подождите минуточку, сейчас освободим вам дорогу.
Key.German: Warten Sie mal kurz, Staff Sergeant, damit wir Ihnen aus dem Weg gehen können.
Key.Czech: Dejte nám moment, seržante, uhneme vám z cesty.
Key.English: Hold up a second there, Staff Sergeant, let us get out of your way.
Key.Portuguese: Espere um pouco, Sargento Operacional. Vamos sair do seu caminho.
Key.Chinesesimp: 等一下，上士，我们给你让路。
Key.Japanese: 待ってくれ、曹長。今どくよ。
Key.Turkish: Bir saniye bekle, Başçavuş, biz yolunuzdan çekilelim.

Container.name: 65_Get_In
Container.participants: EPA B Intro CO;EPA B Player;
Container.situation: player's co asks what the new plan is

Key.Original: Well?
Key.Chinese: 呃？
Key.French: Alors ?
Key.Spanish: ¿Y bien?
Key.Italian: Allora?
Key.Polish: I jak?
Key.Russian: Ну?
Key.German: Und?
Key.Czech: No?
Key.English: Well?
Key.Portuguese: E então?
Key.Chinesesimp: 那么？
Key.Japanese: さて？
Key.Turkish: Yani?

Key.Original: You sure you can handle that?
Key.Chinese: 你確定沒問題？
Key.French: Ça va aller ? Pas trop dur ?
Key.Spanish: ¿Seguro que puede encargarse?
Key.Italian: Sei sicuro di farcela?
Key.Polish: Na pewno sobie z tym poradzisz?
Key.Russian: Вы с этим точно справитесь?
Key.German: Kriegen Sie das hin?
Key.Czech: Určitě to zvládneš?
Key.English: You sure you can handle that?
Key.Portuguese: Tem certeza de que dá conta?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你确定你能搞定吗？
Key.Japanese: 本当にできるかな？
Key.Turkish: Bunu yapabileceğinden emin misin?

Key.Original: Sounds like MacKinnon needs some heavy lifting done at Kamino. I'll drive.
Key.Chinese: 聽起來 MacKinnon 需要人手到 Kamino 搬重物。我來開。
Key.French: Apparemment, MacKinnon a besoin de routiers. Je conduis.
Key.Spanish: Parece que MacKinnon necesita mover muchas cosas en Kamino. Yo conduzco.
Key.Italian: Sembra che MacKinnon abbia bisogno di un bell'aiuto a Kamino. Guido io.
Key.Polish: Chyba MacKinnon potrzebuje pomocy w Kamino. Poprowadzę.
Key.Russian: Кажется, Маккиннону надо что-то тяжелое отвезти из Камино. Я поведу.
Key.German: Klingt, als ob MacKinnon in Kamino schwere Lasten heben muss. Ich fahre.
Key.Czech: To vypadá, že MacKinnon potřebuje v Kaminu nějakou těžkou techniku. Budu řídit.
Key.English: Sounds like MacKinnon needs some heavy lifting done at Kamino. I'll drive.
Key.Portuguese: Parece que MacKinnon precisa de um serviço pesado em Kamino. Eu dirijo.
Key.Korean: 사령관님이 카미노에서 뭘 좀 날라야 한다는 것 같습니다. 제가 운전하겠습니다.
Key.Chinesesimp: 听上去 MacKinnon 需要在 Kamino 做些重物搬运工作。我来开车。
Key.Japanese: カミノで揚重作業があるらしい。マキノンの仕事だ。自分が運転しよう。
Key.Turkish: Sanırım MacKinnon'ın Kamino'da kaldırması gereken bazı ağır yükler var. Ben süreceğim.

Key.Original: Fuck you, man.
Key.Chinese: 去你的。
Key.French: Connard.
Key.Spanish: Que le den.
Key.Italian: Vaffanculo.
Key.Polish: Odpieprz się.
Key.Russian: Отвали.
Key.German: Sie können mich mal!
Key.Czech: Naser si, vole.
Key.English: Fuck you, man.
Key.Portuguese: Vá à merda.
Key.Chinesesimp: 去你的。
Key.Japanese: 失せろ。
Key.Turkish: Canın cehenneme, dostum.

Container.name: 60_Understood
Container.situation: player confirms his new orders

Key.Original: Understood.
Key.Chinese: 了解。
Key.French: Compris.
Key.Spanish: Entendido.
Key.Italian: Ricevuto.
Key.Polish: Zrozumiałem.
Key.Russian: Вас понял.
Key.German: Verstanden.
Key.Czech: Rozumím.
Key.English: Understood.
Key.Portuguese: Entendido.
Key.Chinesesimp: 明白。
Key.Japanese: 了解。
Key.Turkish: Anlaşıldı.

Container.name: 55_Orders
Container.participants: EPA B Player;EPA B Logistics Officer;
Container.situation: player receives new orders from the logistics officer

Key.Original: Corporal Ben Kerry, reporting for duty.
Key.Chinese: Ben Kerry 下士，前來報到。
Key.French: Caporal Ben Kerry, au rapport.
Key.Spanish: Cabo Ben Kerry, presentándose para el servicio.
Key.Italian: Caporale Ben Kerry, a rapporto.
Key.Polish: Kapral Ben Kerry, zgłasza się na służbę.
Key.Russian: Капрал Бен Керри прибыл для прохождения службы.
Key.German: Corporal Ben Kerry meldet sich zum Dienst.
Key.Czech: Desátník Ben Kerry, dostavil jsem se na váš rozkaz.
Key.English: Corporal Ben Kerry, reporting for duty.
Key.Portuguese: Cabo Ben Kerry, apresentando-se para o serviço.
Key.Korean: 상병 벤 케리, 임무 투입 신고합니다.
Key.Chinesesimp: Ben Kerry 下士，前来报到。
Key.Japanese: ベン・ケリー伍長、任務に就きます。
Key.Turkish: Onbaşı Ben Kerry, görev için rapor veriyorum.

Key.Original: Any idea why, sir?
Key.Chinese: 知道原因嗎，長官？
Key.French: Vous savez pourquoi, Sir ?
Key.Spanish: ¿Alguna idea del porqué, señor?
Key.Italian: Ha idea del perché, signore?
Key.Polish: Czy wiadomo dlaczego, sir?
Key.Russian: А не знаете, почему, сэр?
Key.German: Kennen Sie den Grund, Sir?
Key.Czech: Máte tušení proč, pane?
Key.English: Any idea why, sir?
Key.Portuguese: Alguma ideia do motivo, senhor?
Key.Chinesesimp: 知道为什么吗，长官？
Key.Japanese: なぜかご存じで？
Key.Turkish: Nedeni hakkında bir fikrin var mı, komutanım?

Key.Original: At ease.
Key.Chinese: 稍息。
Key.French: Repos.
Key.Spanish: Descanse.
Key.Italian: Riposo.
Key.Polish: Spocznij.
Key.Russian: Вольно.
Key.German: Stehen Sie bequem.
Key.Czech: Pohov.
Key.English: At ease.
Key.Portuguese: Descansar.
Key.Chinesesimp: 放松点。
Key.Japanese: 休め。
Key.Turkish: Rahat ol.

Key.Original: Okay, there's been slight change of plan.
Key.Chinese: 好，計畫有點小變動。
Key.French: Il y a eu un léger changement de programme.
Key.Spanish: Bueno, ha habido un pequeño cambio de planes.
Key.Italian: Ok, c'è stato un piccolo cambiamento nei piani.
Key.Polish: Dobrze, nastąpiła drobna zmiana planu.
Key.Russian: Так, план немного изменился.
Key.German: Okay, wir haben eine kleine Planänderung.
Key.Czech: Fajn, došlo k malé změně plánu.
Key.English: Okay, there's been slight change of plan.
Key.Portuguese: Certo. Houve uma pequena mudança de planos.
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，计划略有变化。
Key.Japanese: オーケー、計画に少々変更があった。
Key.Turkish: Tamam, planda küçük bir değişiklik var.

Key.Original: Commander MacKinnon requires logistical support down at Kamino. He left just as you guys were coming in.
Key.Chinese: MacKinnon 指揮官下令大伙去 Kamino 支援後勤。你們到的時候他才剛離開。
Key.French: Le commandant MacKinnon a besoin d'un appui logistique à Kamino. Il est parti juste quand vous arriviez.
Key.Spanish: El comandante MacKinnon necesita ayuda logística en Kamino. Se marchó justo cuando llegaban ustedes.
Key.Italian: Il comandante MacKinnon ha bisogno di supporto logistico a Kamino. Se n'è andato proprio mentre voi stavate arrivando.
Key.Polish: Dowódca MacKinnon potrzebuje wsparcia logistycznego w Kamino. Wyruszył tuż przed waszym pojawieniem się.
Key.Russian: Коммандеру Маккиннону нужна помощь в Камино. Он отбыл как раз, когда вы прибыли.
Key.German: Kommandant MacKinnon braucht unten in Kamino logistische Unterstützung. Er ist gerade weg, als Sie ankamen.
Key.Czech: Velitel MacKinnon potřebuje dole v Kaminu logistickou podporu. Odešel, zrovna když jste dorazili.
Key.English: Commander MacKinnon requires logistical support down at Kamino. He left just as you guys were coming in.
Key.Portuguese: O Comandante MacKinnon requer apoio logístico em Kamino. Ele acabou de sair antes de vocês chegarem.
Key.Korean: 맥키넌 사령관님께서 카미노에 군수지원이 필요하시다더군. 너희들과 엇갈려서 방금 나가셨지.
Key.Chinesesimp: MacKinnon 指挥官要求在 Kamino 提供后勤支援。他在你们大家进来的时候刚离开。
Key.Japanese: マキノン中佐がカミノで兵站支援を必要としている。諸君と入れ替わりにここを離れたのだ。
Key.Turkish: Komutan MacKinnon'ın Kamino'da lojistik desteğe ihtiyacı var. Siz gelmeden az önce gitti.

Key.Original: No, Corporal. Now, take the trucks over there. You should probably get a move on.
Key.Chinese: 不，下士。好吧，去開那邊的卡車。你快點行動。
Key.French: Non, Caporal. Bon, prenez les camions là-bas. Vous feriez bien d'activer.
Key.Spanish: No, cabo. Lleve ahí los camiones. Probablemente debería seguir.
Key.Italian: No, caporale. Ora portate i camion laggiù. Vi conviene mettervi all'opera.
Key.Polish: Nie, kapralu. Zajmij się tymi ciężarówkami. Powinieneś już ruszać.
Key.Russian: Нет, капрал. Отгоните туда грузовики. И пожалуй что побыстрее.
Key.German: Nein, Corporal. Nehmen Sie jetzt die LKWs da drüben. Ich schlage vor, Sie beeilen sich.
Key.Czech: Ne, desátníku. Použijte támhlety náklaďáky. Měli byste si pohnout.
Key.English: No, Corporal. Now, take the trucks over there. You should probably get a move on.
Key.Portuguese: Não, Cabo. Use aqueles caminhões. Não perca tempo.
Key.Korean: 나야 모르지, 상병. 저쪽에 있는 트럭에나 타라. 슬슬 출발하는 게 좋을 거야.
Key.Chinesesimp: 不，下士。现在，夺取那儿的卡车。你也许该动手了。
Key.Japanese: いや、伍長。今すぐ、あそこのトラックを使え。急いだ方がいいだろう。
Key.Turkish: Hayır, Onbaşı. Şimdi, oradaki kamyonu al. Muhtemelen hızlanırsınız.

Container.name: 50_Report
Container.situation: the player's co orders him to go speak to the logistics officer

Key.Original: Kerry, go check in with the Lieutenant over there. He runs the show here at Rogain.
Key.Chinese: Kerry，去跟那邊的中尉報到。他負責 Rogain 這邊的大小事。
Key.French: Kerry, allez voir le lieutenant là-bas. C'est lui qui tire les ficelles à Rogain.
Key.Spanish: Kerry, vaya ahí a hablar con el teniente. Dirige el espectáculo aquí, en Rogain.
Key.Italian: Kerry, vai dal tenente laggiù. È lui che dirige i giochi qui a Rogain.
Key.Polish: Kerry, idź do porucznika. On rządzi tu w Rogain.
Key.Russian: Керри, свяжитесь там с лейтенантом. Он всем заправляет в Рогейне.
Key.German: Kerry, melden Sie sich bei dem Lieutenant da drüben. Er hat hier in Rogain das Sagen.
Key.Czech: Kerry, hlaste se támhle u poručíka. Ten tomu tady v Rogainu velí.
Key.English: Kerry, go check in with the Lieutenant over there. He runs the show here at Rogain.
Key.Portuguese: Kerry, fale com aquele Tenente. Ele é o manda-chuva aqui em Rogain.
Key.Korean: 케리, 저기 가서 중위님께 신고해라. 여기 로게인은 그 분 담당이야.
Key.Chinesesimp: Kerry，去向那儿的中尉报到。他是 Rogain 这儿作主的人。
Key.Japanese: ケリー、あっちにいる大尉のもとへ報告に出向いてくれ。ここロゲインの責任者だ。
Key.Turkish: Kerry, gidip oradaki teğmenle görüş. Rogain'deki gösteriyi o yönetiyor.

Key.Original: Lacey - I dunno - make yourself useful for a change. I've got to piss.
Key.Chinese: Lacey，至於你，隨便去找件有意義的事情做。我去撒泡尿。
Key.French: Lacey... Rendez-vous utile pour une fois. Moi, il faut que j'aille pisser.
Key.Spanish: Lacey, no sé... Sea útil para algo, para variar. Tengo que orinar.
Key.Italian: Lacey, renditi utile una volta tanto. Devo andare a pisciare.
Key.Polish: Lacey - nie wiem - może w końcu do czegoś byś się przydał. Muszę się wysikać.
Key.Russian: Лэйси, я не знаю, займитесь чем-нибудь полезным, что ли. А мне в сортир надо.
Key.German: Lacey - ich weiß nicht ... machen Sie sich zur Abwechslung mal nützlich. Ich muss pissen.
Key.Czech: Lacey vy... nevím, dělejte pro změnu něco užitečného. Potřebuju se vychcat.
Key.English: Lacey - I dunno - make yourself useful for a change. I've got to piss.
Key.Portuguese: Lacey, por favor. Seja útil, para variar. Preciso dar uma mijada.
Key.Korean: 레이시, 빈둥대지 말고 가끔은 일도 좀 해라. 난 화장실이나 갔다 오마.
Key.Chinesesimp: Lacey - 我不知道 - 拜托让你自己派点用场。我去上个厕所。
Key.Japanese: レイシー、知らんが、たまには役に立てよな。俺は小便がしたいんだ。
Key.Turkish: Lacey - bilmiyorum - bir işe yara da değişiklik olsun. Çişim var.

Container.name: 40_Landing
Container.situation: the helicopter comes in for landing

Key.Original: Alright, guys, I'm going to turn us around before bringing us in.
Key.Chinese: 嘿，各位，我要兜個圈進場。
Key.French: Bon, messieurs, je vais nous faire faire demi-tour avant qu'on se pose.
Key.Spanish: Muy bien, muchachos. Vamos a dar la vuelta antes de seguir.
Key.Italian: Va bene, ragazzi, vi faccio girare prima di entrare.
Key.Polish: Dobra, panowie, zakręcę, zanim wylądujemy.
Key.Russian: Так, мужики, я сейчас развернусь, а потом сажать буду.
Key.German: Also gut, dann drehe ich erst mal um, bevor wir landen.
Key.Czech: Fajn, chlapi, otočím nás, než půjdu na přistání.
Key.English: Alright, guys, I'm going to turn us around before bringing us in.
Key.Portuguese: Certo, homens. Vou dar a volta antes de pousar.
Key.Korean: 다 왔다, 친구들. 착륙 전에 한 바퀴 선회하겠다.
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，伙计们，我准备在带我们进去之前先掉头。
Key.Japanese: よろしい、到着前に方向転換と行くか。
Key.Turkish: Pekâlâ, beyler, bizi indirmeden önce döndüreceğim.

Key.Original: Try not to fall off.
Key.Chinese: 小心抓緊。
Key.French: Essayez de ne pas tomber.
Key.Spanish: Intenten no caerse.
Key.Italian: Cercate di non cadere.
Key.Polish: Spróbuj nie spaść.
Key.Russian: Постарайтесь не выпасть.
Key.German: Dass mir niemand rausfällt!
Key.Czech: Snažte se nevypadnout.
Key.English: Try not to fall off.
Key.Portuguese: Tentem não cair.
Key.Chinesesimp: 可别摔下来。
Key.Japanese: 落っこちるなよ。
Key.Turkish: Düşmemeye çalışın.

Container.name: 40_Landed
Container.situation: the helicopter lands at camp rogain

Key.Original: Thanks for flying. Please disembark in an orderly fashion.
Key.Chinese: 感謝您的搭乘。請依序下機。
Key.French: Merci de votre fidélité. Veuillez débarquer dans le calme.
Key.Spanish: Gracias por volar con nosotros. Por favor, desembarquen de manera ordenada.
Key.Italian: Grazie per aver volato con noi. Ora scendete in modo ordinato.
Key.Polish: Dziękuję za lot. Proszę zachować porządek podczas opuszczania pokładu.
Key.Russian: Спасибо за полет. Пожалуйста, выходите организованно.
Key.German: Danke fürs Mitfliegen. Bitte geordnet aussteigen.
Key.Czech: Díky, že jste letěli s námi. Vystupujte prosím spořádaně.
Key.English: Thanks for flying. Please disembark in an orderly fashion.
Key.Portuguese: Obrigado pelo voo. Desembarquem ordenadamente.
Key.Korean: 이용해주셔서 감사합니다. 내릴 때 질서를 지켜 주십시오.
Key.Chinesesimp: 多谢乘机。请有序下飞机。
Key.Japanese: ご搭乗に感謝します。降りる時は順序をお守りください。
Key.Turkish: Uçuş için teşekkürler. Lütfen düzenli bir şekilde boşaltın.

Container.name: 35_Lock_Down
Container.participants: EPA B Bravo Lead;EPA B Intro CO;
Container.situation: player sees a truck leaving camp rogain

Key.Original: I thought the roads were closed?
Key.Chinese: 我以為道路被封鎖了？
Key.French: Je croyais que les routes étaient fermées ?
Key.Spanish: Creía que las carreteras estaban cerradas...
Key.Italian: Pensavo che le strade fossero chiuse.
Key.Polish: Myślałem, że drogi są zamknięte.
Key.Russian: А дороги разве не закрыты?
Key.German: Ich dachte, die Straßen wären gesperrt?
Key.Czech: Myslel jsem, že silnice jsou uzavřené.
Key.English: I thought the roads were closed?
Key.Portuguese: As estradas não estavam fechadas?
Key.Chinesesimp: 路不是被封了吗？
Key.Japanese: 道路は封鎖されてると思っていたが？
Key.Turkish: Yolların kapalı olduğunu sanıyordum?

Key.Original: Why's there a truck leaving Rogain?
Key.Chinese: 怎麼有卡車從 Rogain 離開？
Key.French: Pourquoi il y a un camion qui part de Rogain ?
Key.Spanish: ¿Qué hace un camión saliendo de Rogain?
Key.Italian: Perché c'è un camion che si allontana da Rogain?
Key.Polish: Dlaczego ciężarówka wyjeżdża z Rogain?
Key.Russian: Почему из Рогейна выезжает грузовик?
Key.German: Warum verlässt da ein LKW Rogain?
Key.Czech: Proč posílají náklaďák ven z Rogainu?
Key.English: Why's there a truck leaving Rogain?
Key.Portuguese: Por que tem um caminhão saindo de Rogain?
Key.Korean: 그럼 왜 로게인에서 트럭이 나오고 있는 겁니까?
Key.Chinesesimp: 为什么有辆卡车离开 Rogain？
Key.Japanese: なぜトラックがロゲインから出て行くんだ？
Key.Turkish: Neden Rogain'den ayrılan bir kamyon var?

Key.Original: They are.
Key.Chinese: 是啊。
Key.French: Toujours.
Key.Spanish: Así es.
Key.Italian: Lo sono.
Key.Polish: Bo są.
Key.Russian: Закрыты.
Key.German: Das sind sie.
Key.Czech: Taky že jo.
Key.English: They are.
Key.Portuguese: Estão, sim.
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊。
Key.Japanese: そうだな。
Key.Turkish: Kapalılar.

Key.Original: Good question. No idea. Maybe something important.
Key.Chinese: 好問題。不清楚。或許是什麼重要的勤務。
Key.French: Bonne question. Aucune idée. C'est peut-être important.
Key.Spanish: Buena pregunta. Ni idea. Quizá sea algo importante.
Key.Italian: Bella domanda. Non lo so. Forse è qualcosa di importante.
Key.Polish: Dobre pytanie. Nie mam pojęcia. Może to coś ważnego.
Key.Russian: Хороший вопрос. Без понятия. Может, важное что-то.
Key.German: Gute Frage. Keine Ahnung. Vielleicht irgendwas Wichtiges.
Key.Czech: Správná otázka. Nemám páru. Možná něco důležitého.
Key.English: Good question. No idea. Maybe something important.
Key.Portuguese: Boa pergunta. Não faço ideia. Talvez seja algo importante.
Key.Korean: 좋은 질문이군. 나도 모르겠다. 뭐 중요한 거라도 실었나 보지.
Key.Chinesesimp: 好问题。不知道。也许有什么重要的事吧。
Key.Japanese: 良い質問だ。さっぱりわからん。多分何か重要なことだ。
Key.Turkish: Güzel soru. Hiçbir fikrim yok. Belki önemli bir şeydir.

Container.name: 30_Baldy
Container.participants: EPA B Intro CO;EPA B Bravo Lead;
Container.situation: player observes lz baldy

Key.Original: Nice. At this rate, we might even get out of here in, oh, 20 years...
Key.Chinese: 很好。照這速度，距離我們脫離這裡大概還要呃…20 年…
Key.French: Génial. À ce rythme, on sera encore là dans 20 ans...
Key.Spanish: Bien. A este paso, saldremos de aquí en... hmm, 20 años...
Key.Italian: Ottimo. A questo ritmo forse riusciremo ad andarcene… tra 20 anni!
Key.Polish: Świetnie. W tym tempie wyniesiemy się stąd za, hm, jakieś 20 lat...
Key.Russian: Здорово. Такими темпами мы отсюда выберемся... ну, лет через 20.
Key.German: Nett. Wenn das so weitergeht, kommen wir bald hier raus ... in 20 Jahren oder so ...
Key.Czech: Pěkně. Jestli to takhle půjde dál, tak se odsud za takových, no, dvacet let snad dostanem.
Key.English: Nice. At this rate, we might even get out of here in, oh, 20 years...
Key.Portuguese: Ótimo. Desse jeito, devemos conseguir sair daqui a 20 anos...
Key.Korean: 잘 됐네요. 이 속도면 한... 20년 후에나 나가겠습니다.
Key.Chinesesimp: 好啊。以这种速度，我们也许能在，嗯，20 年后离开这儿...
Key.Japanese: いいぞ。この調子だとここから出られるのは…ああ、20年後だな…。
Key.Turkish: Güzel. Bu hızla gidersek buradan çıkışımız 20 yıl sürer...

Key.Original: Yeah? Well they can respectfully go fuck themselves, sir.
Key.Chinese: 嗯？恕我直言，他們可以去死一死，長官。
Key.French: Bah ils ont qu'à aller gentiment se faire foutre, Sir.
Key.Spanish: ¿Sí? Pueden irse respetuosamente a tomar por culo, señor.
Key.Italian: Ah sì? Con tutto il rispetto, possono andare tutti al diavolo, signore.
Key.Polish: Tak? Cóż, w takim razie, z całym szacunkiem mogą się odpieprzyć, sir.
Key.Russian: Да? Вот пусть они, при всем уважении, идут в задницу, сэр.
Key.German: Ja? Dann können die mich aber mal gepflegt am Arsch lecken.
Key.Czech: Fakt? No, se vší úctou, ať se jdou vysrat, pane.
Key.English: Yeah? Well they can respectfully go fuck themselves, sir.
Key.Portuguese: É? Bem, senhor, eles que se danem, com todo o respeito.
Key.Korean: 그랬습니까? 그럼 그 자식들 죄다 나가 죽으라고 하십시오.
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯？那么他们可以自己见鬼去，长官。
Key.Japanese: ああ？まあ、どうぞお好きにってことでいいでしょう。
