Key.Turkish: Öyle mi? Arz ederim, o halde gidip kendilerini becerebilirler, komutanım.

Key.Original: I see LZ Baldy's packed up.
Key.Chinese: Baldy 降落區已經準備好了。
Key.French: La ZA Baldy a fait ses malles.
Key.Spanish: Veo que la zona de aterrizaje Baldy ha empaquetado.
Key.Italian: Vedo che la zona di atterraggio Baldy è piena.
Key.Polish: Widzę, że SL Baldy już spakowana.
Key.Russian: Вижу, ВПП "Балди" занята плотно.
Key.German: Wie ich sehe, hat LZ Baldy schon gepackt.
Key.Czech: Vypadá to, že LZ Baldy je sbalená.
Key.English: I see LZ Baldy's packed up.
Key.Portuguese: Vejo que a zona de pouso Baldy está bem movimentada.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我看到 Baldy 着陆区 已经收拾好了。
Key.Japanese: LZボールディはいっぱいだ。
Key.Turkish: Baldy İniş Bölgesi'nin paketlendiğini görüyorum.

Key.Original: We didn't butcher half our own population and I sure as hell didn't ask to be on their pissant island.
Key.Chinese: 殺死自己半數同胞的人又不是我們，而且我他娘的也不是自願來這個鳥不生蛋的小島。
Key.French: C'est pas nous qui avons massacré la moitié de leur effectif et je n'ai jamais demandé à occuper leur foutue île.
Key.Spanish: Nosotros no nos cargamos la mitad de nuestra propia población y, desde luego, nunca hemos pedido entrar en su isla de mala muerte.
Key.Italian: Non abbiamo massacrato la metà della nostra popolazione e io di certo non ho chiesto di essere sulla loro isola schifosa.
Key.Polish: To nie my wyrżnęliśmy połowę populacji i za cholerę nie prosiliśmy się o to, by znaleźć się na tej przeklętej wyspie.
Key.Russian: Мы не вырезали половину собственного населения, и уж точно мне на фиг не сдался их зачуханный остров.
Key.German: Wir haben nicht die Hälfte unserer Bevölkerung massakriert, und ich habe nicht darum gebeten, auf diese bepisste Insel zu kommen.
Key.Czech: My jsme nezmasakrovali půlku svojí populace a já se jich rozhodně kurva neprosil o dovolenou na tomhle pochcaným ostrově.
Key.English: We didn't butcher half our own population and I sure as hell didn't ask to be on their pissant island.
Key.Portuguese: Nós não massacramos metade da nossa própria população. E tenho certeza de que não pedi para estar nessa ilha maldita deles.
Key.Korean: 우리는 인구 절반을 학살한 적도 없고, 전 이 쓸모 없는 섬에 오고 싶지도 않았단 말입니다.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们没有屠杀我们自己一半的人口，我也相信我们没有要求到他们该死的岛上来。
Key.Japanese: 俺たちは自国民を半分殺したりはしてないし、連中のくだらん島にいさせてくれなんて頼んだわけじゃない。
Key.Turkish: Nüfusumuzun yarısını biz doğramadık ve onların dandik adasında olmayı da asla ben istemedim.

Key.Original: Greenbacks wouldn't take a stand for that, Lacey. They've had a stick up their ass about Baldy for weeks now.
Key.Chinese: Greenbacks 做事就是這樣拖拖拉拉，Lacey。Baldy 這件事情已經鬧了好幾週，搞得他們人仰馬翻。
Key.French: Pas si les Altos ont leur mot à dire. Baldy les fait royalement chier depuis des semaines.
Key.Spanish: Los Greenbacks no lo aceptarían, Lacey. Llevan semanas cabreados de la hostia por lo de Baldy.
Key.Italian: I Greenback non scenderebbero in campo per questo, Lacey. Sono settimane che pensano a Baldy.
Key.Polish: Lacey, Zielonych to nie obchodzi. Baldy denerwuje ich od wielu tygodni.
Key.Russian: Зеленым бы это не понравилось, Лэйси. У них насчет "Балди" сейчас правила строгие.
Key.German: Die Greenbacks würden das nicht mitmachen, Lacey. Sie sind wegen Baldy schon seit Wochen überempfindlich.
Key.Czech: Zelenáči by to nesnesli, Lacey. Kvůli LZ Baldy už prudili několik týdnů.
Key.English: Greenbacks wouldn't take a stand for that, Lacey. They've had a stick up their ass about Baldy for weeks now.
Key.Portuguese: Greenbacks não montariam resistência por causa disso, Lacey. Eles estão enfiados em Baldy há semanas.
Key.Korean: 그린백 놈들이 그 말 들으면 되게 싫어할 걸, 레이시? 그 자식들은 몇 주 동안 저기만 노리고 있었다고.
Key.Chinesesimp: Greenback 不会对那表态，Lacey。几周来 Baldy 让他们焦头烂额。
Key.Japanese: それでグリーンバックが行動を起こすってことはないだろう、レイシー。ここ何週間か、ボールディに関してはずいぶんおとなしかったからな。
Key.Turkish: Çaylaklar bunu kabul etmez, Lacey. Haftalardır Baldy için kin güdüyorlardı.

Key.Original: Well ain't that just half the problem.
Key.Chinese: 那還只是問題的一部分而已。
Key.French: C'est peut-être un peu ça, le problème.
Key.Spanish: Y eso es solo parte del problema.
Key.Italian: E non è forse metà del problema?
Key.Polish: To nawet nie jest połowa problemów.
Key.Russian: Да это, по ходу, половина всех проблем.
Key.German: Das ist nicht mal das halbe Problem.
Key.Czech: No to není ani půlka toho problému.
Key.English: Well ain't that just half the problem.
Key.Portuguese: Bem, isso não é nem metade do problema.
Key.Chinesesimp: 问题不止于此。
Key.Japanese: まあ、それが半分問題じゃないか。
Key.Turkish: Bu, sorunun sadece ilk yarısı.

Container.name: 25_Mike26
Container.participants: EPA B Intro CO;EPA B Bravo Lead;
Container.situation: player observes air station mike-26

Key.Original: Mike-26 sure looks quiet.
Key.Chinese: Mike-26 沒什麼動靜。
Key.French: Ça a l'air calme vers Mike-26.
Key.Spanish: Mike-26 parece bastante tranquilo.
Key.Italian: Mike-26 sembra tranquillo.
Key.Polish: Mike-26 wygląda spokojnie.
Key.Russian: Что-то на Майк-26 совсем тихо.
Key.German: Mike-26 ist so ruhig.
Key.Czech: Mike-26 vypadá nějak potichu.
Key.English: Mike-26 sure looks quiet.
Key.Portuguese: Mike-26 parece estar bem tranquilo.
Key.Chinesesimp: Mike-26 看上去挺安静。
Key.Japanese: マイク-26は静かだ。
Key.Turkish: Mike-26 kesinlikle sakin görünüyor.

Key.Original: Just us lucky few left doing the monkey work, huh?
Key.Chinese: 現在就找我們這幾隻幸運活下來的小貓做雜事，對吧？
Key.French: Tous, sauf une poignée d'irréductibles ?
Key.Spanish: Solo quedamos nosotros, los afortunados, para hacer todo el trabajo.
Key.Italian: Solo noi fortunati dobbiamo fare il lavoro pesante, eh?
Key.Polish: Tylko my, szczęśliwcy, musimy zarabiać na życie, co?
Key.Russian: Вот свезло-то нам - будем тут теперь фигней заниматься.
Key.German: Jetzt machen nur noch wir paar Idioten die Drecksarbeit, was?
Key.Czech: Takže tenhle opruz zůstal na nás několika šťastlivcích, co?
Key.English: Just us lucky few left doing the monkey work, huh?
Key.Portuguese: Só sobraram alguns pingados fazendo o trabalho sujo, não é?
Key.Korean: 그럼 남은 우리는 계속 이런 뻘짓이나 하는 겁니까?
Key.Chinesesimp: 只有我们几个幸运的人留下来干讨厌的活儿，呃？
Key.Japanese: 俺たちラッキーな連中だけが、サルでもできる仕事をするために残ってるのか？
Key.Turkish: Demek sadece birkaçımız ayak işi yapmaktan kurtulduk, öyle mi?

Key.Original: I'd rather be the hell off this rock, sir.
Key.Chinese: 我寧願快點脫離這座小島，長官。
Key.French: Je préférerais être ailleurs que sur ce caillou, Sir.
Key.Spanish: Yo preferiría largarme de esta roca, señor.
Key.Italian: Preferirei essere ben lontano da questa roccia, signore.
Key.Polish: Wolałbym być teraz w piekle niż na tej wyspie, sir.
Key.Russian: Мне лишь бы свалить с этого острова, сэр.
Key.German: Ich wäre lieber woanders, Sir.
Key.Czech: Raději bych už z tohohle kusu šutru jel do hajzlu, pane.
Key.English: I'd rather be the hell off this rock, sir.
Key.Portuguese: Preferia estar bem longe daqui, senhor.
Key.Korean: 그보다는 이 바위 덩어리에서 나가고 싶습니다.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我宁可离开这块石头，长官。
Key.Japanese: こんな島、とっとと出たいんですがね。
Key.Turkish: Bu kayadan gitmeyi yeğlerim, komutanım.

Key.Original: Yeah. Most of the guys have shipped out already.
Key.Chinese: 嗯。大多數的弟兄們已經被送出小島了。
Key.French: La plupart des gars sont déjà partis.
Key.Spanish: Sí. La mayoría de los chicos ya se han ido.
Key.Italian: Già, molti dei ragazzi sono già sbarcati.
Key.Polish: Tak. Większość naszych już się stąd wyniosła.
Key.Russian: Да. Ребята почти все уже отчалили.
Key.German: Ja. Die meisten Jungs sind schon weg.
Key.Czech: Jasně. Většina chlapů už to tady zabalila.
Key.English: Yeah. Most of the guys have shipped out already.
Key.Portuguese: É. A maior parte de vocês já saiu.
Key.Korean: 그래. 병력 대부분은 이미 떠났으니 당연하겠지.
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯。大多数人已经坐船离开了。
Key.Japanese: ああ。ほとんどの連中はすでに船で外に出た。
Key.Turkish: Evet. Adamların çoğu zaten çekip gitti.

Key.Original: You'd rather be on a boat in the Pacific, Sergeant?
Key.Chinese: 難道你寧願駕船漂流在太平洋，中士？
Key.French: Vous préféreriez être en mer dans le Pacifique, Sergent ?
Key.Spanish: ¿Preferiría estar en un bote por el Pacífico?
Key.Italian: Preferiresti essere su una barca nel Pacifico, sergente.
Key.Polish: Wolałbyś być teraz na łodzi, na Pacyfiku, sierżancie?
Key.Russian: А вам бы лучше на яхте в Тихом океане, сержант?
Key.German: Wären Sie lieber auf einem Boot im Pazifik, Sergeant?
Key.Czech: Byl byste raději na lodi někde v Tichém oceánu, seržante?
Key.English: You'd rather be on a boat in the Pacific, Sergeant?
Key.Portuguese: Você preferiria estar em um barco no Pacífico, Sargento?
Key.Korean: 태평양에 떠있는 배에 타고 싶다는 거냐, 병장?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你宁可在太平洋的一艘船上吗，中士？
Key.Japanese: 太平洋でボートに揺られていた方がいいだろう、軍曹？
Key.Turkish: Pasifik'e giden bir botta olmayı tercih etmez misin, Çavuş?

Container.name: 230_In_Forest
Container.situation: player and co reach the forest

Key.Original: We're alive but, Jesus, for how long?
Key.Chinese: 我是還活著但、天啊，能有多久？
Key.French: On est en vie... mais encore combien de temps ?
Key.Spanish: Estamos vivos, pero, Dios, ¿por cuánto tiempo?
Key.Italian: Siamo vivi, ma per quanto ancora?
Key.Polish: Na razie żyjemy, ale Jezu, jak długo?
Key.Russian: Мы живы, боже мой - но надолго ли?
Key.German: Wir sind am Leben, aber wie lange noch?
Key.Czech: Jsme naživu, ale, Ježíši, na jak dlouho ještě?
Key.English: We're alive but, Jesus, for how long?
Key.Portuguese: Minha nossa... Ainda estamos vivos, mas por quanto tempo?
Key.Korean: 일단 살았다만, 얼마나 버틸 수 있을까?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们还活着，可是天知道还能活多久？
Key.Japanese: 俺たちは生きてる、でも、畜生、どれくらいの間だ？
Key.Turkish: Tanrım, hayattayız ama ne kadar süreliğine?

Container.name: 225_Near_Forest
Container.situation: player and co approach the forest

Key.Original: Come on, there's the forest!
Key.Chinese: 走吧，森林就在前方！
Key.French: Voilà la forêt !
Key.Spanish: ¡Vamos, ahí está el bosque!
Key.Italian: Avanti, ecco la foresta!
Key.Polish: Szybko, tam jest las!
Key.Russian: Сюда, здесь лес!
Key.German: Los, da ist der Wald!
Key.Czech: Pohni, támhle je ten les!
Key.English: Come on, there's the forest!
Key.Portuguese: Vamos lá, a floresta está adiante!
Key.Chinesesimp: 来吧，森林在那！
Key.Japanese: 来い、森がある！
Key.Turkish: Haydi, orman şurada!

Container.name: 220_Find_Shelter
Container.participants: EPA B Intro CO;EPA B Player;
Container.situation: player's co comes up with a new plan

Key.Original: We need to get out of the open. Now.
Key.Chinese: 我們一定要離開開放區域。就是現在。
Key.French: Il faut qu'on quitte la zone dégagée. Et vite.
Key.Spanish: Tenemos que salir del campo abierto. Ya.
Key.Italian: Dobbiamo metterci al riparo. Ora.
Key.Polish: Musimy opuścić otwarty teren. Szybko.
Key.Russian: Надо уходить с открытого места. Срочно.
Key.German: Wir müssen weg vom freien Gelände. Jetzt.
Key.Czech: Musíme se dostat pryč z otevřeného prostranství. Okamžitě.
Key.English: We need to get out of the open. Now.
Key.Portuguese: Precisamos procurar uma área fechada. Agora.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们得离开开阔地。就现在。
Key.Japanese: 開けた場所から脱出しないと。今すぐに。
Key.Turkish: Açık alandan uzaklaşmalıyız. Hemen.

Key.Original: Rogain's down. Kamino's fucked ... it's only bad news back where we came from.
Key.Chinese: Rogain 被敵方佔領了。Kamino 完了。從頭到尾沒有一個是好消息。
Key.French: Rogain est HS. Kamino est foutue... Impossible de faire machine arrière.
Key.Spanish: Rogain ha caído. Kamino está jodido... Aunque solo es una mala noticia allí de donde venimos.
Key.Italian: Rogain à andata, Kamino è nei casini… arrivano solo brutte notizie dal luogo da cui arriviamo.
Key.Polish: Rogain zajęte. Kamino przerąbane ... przynosimy tylko złe wieści.
Key.Russian: Рогейн накрылся, Камино вообще хана - там, откуда мы пришли, ничего хорошего.
Key.German: Rogain ist erledigt. Kamino ist im Arsch ... wo wir herkommen, gibt's nur schlechte Nachrichten.
Key.Czech: S Rogainem je konec. Kamino je v prdeli... nemáme nic než špatný zprávy.
Key.English: Rogain's down. Kamino's fucked ... it's only bad news back where we came from.
Key.Portuguese: Rogain já era. Kamino está ferrado. Só trouxemos más notícias.
Key.Korean: 로게인은 당했고, 카미노도 망했고... 우리가 있던 곳은 전부 나쁜 소식만 들려오는군.
Key.Chinesesimp: Rogain 已覆没。Kamino 被毁...我们来的地方只有坏消息。
Key.Japanese: ロゲインが陥落した。カミノはめちゃくちゃだ…俺たちが来た道には悪いニュースばかり転がってるな。
Key.Turkish: Rogain düştü. Kamino da düştü. Geldiğimiz yerden sadece kötü haber var.

Key.Original: We've got to head south - there's a forest just over the hill.
Key.Chinese: 我們必須向南走，山丘後頭有個森林。
Key.French: Il faut qu'on aille au sud. Il y a une forêt de l'autre côté de la colline.
Key.Spanish: Debemos ir al sur. Hay un bosque al otro lado de la colina.
Key.Italian: Dobbiamo dirigerci a sud, c'è una foresta oltre la collina.
Key.Polish: Musimy się udać na południe - tam jest las, zaraz za wzgórzem.
Key.Russian: Надо идти на юг - там за холмом есть лес.
Key.German: Wir müssen Richtung Süden - direkt hinter dem Hügel liegt ein Wald.
Key.Czech: Musíme se vydat na jih - kousek za tím kopcem je les.
Key.English: We've got to head south - there's a forest just over the hill.
Key.Portuguese: Precisamos seguir para o sul. Há uma floresta do outro lado do monte.
Key.Korean: 남쪽으로 가자. 언덕만 넘으면 그쪽에 숲이 있어.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们往南前进 - 就在山那边有片森林。
Key.Japanese: 南に向かわなくては。丘の向こうに森がある。
Key.Turkish: Güneye gitmeliyiz - tepenin ardında bir orman var.

Key.Original: If you've got any better ideas, feel free to share! Let's go!
Key.Chinese: 你若有更好的主意就說出來！走吧！
Key.French: Si vous avez une meilleure idée, je vous écoute ! En avant !
Key.Spanish: Si tienen alguna idea mejor ¡soy todo oídos! ¡Adelante!
Key.Italian: Se hai idee migliori, non esitare a condividerle! Andiamo!
Key.Polish: Jeśli masz lepszy pomysł, to chętnie posłucham! Ruszamy!
Key.Russian: Есть идеи получше? Так поделитесь! Пошли!
Key.German: Falls Sie eine bessere Idee haben, nur zu! Gehen wir!
Key.Czech: Jestli máte nějaký lepší nápad, sem s ním! Jdeme!
Key.English: If you've got any better ideas, feel free to share! Let's go!
Key.Portuguese: Se tiver alguma ideia melhor, é só falar. Vamos!
Key.Korean: 더 좋은 생각있으면 언제든 말해! 가자!
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果你们有更好的主意，欢迎分享！我们走吧！
Key.Japanese: もっといい考えがあれば遠慮なく言ってくれ！行くぞ！
Key.Turkish: Daha iyi bir fikri olan varsa paylaşsın! Haydi gidelim!

Key.Original: A forest? Are you serious?
Key.Chinese: 森林？你認真的？
Key.French: Une forêt ? Sérieux ?
Key.Spanish: ¿Un bosque? ¿En serio?
Key.Italian: Una foresta? Dici sul serio?
Key.Polish: Las? Poważnie?
Key.Russian: Лес? Вы серьезно?
Key.German: Ein Wald? Im Ernst?
Key.Czech: Les? To myslíte vážně?
Key.English: A forest? Are you serious?
Key.Portuguese: Uma floresta? Tem certeza?
Key.Chinesesimp: 森林？你是说真的吗？
Key.Japanese: 森？本気か？
Key.Turkish: Orman mı? Ciddi misin?

Container.name: 215_Now_What
Container.participants: EPA B Player;EPA B Intro CO;
Container.situation: player asks co what to do now

Key.Original: Shit, I don't know - we're out of options!
Key.Chinese: 靠，我哪知，我們沒別條路了！
Key.French: J'en sais foutre rien ! On n'a plus trop le choix !
Key.Spanish: Mierda, no sé... ¡No quedan opciones!
Key.Italian: Accidenti, non lo so. Non abbiamo altra scelta!
Key.Polish: Cholera, nie wiem - nie mamy innej opcji!
Key.Russian: Черт, да не знаю я. Нет у нас вариантов!
Key.German: Scheiße, ich weiß es nicht - uns gehen die Optionen aus!
Key.Czech: Nevím, do prdele, nemáme na vybranou!
Key.English: Shit, I don't know - we're out of options!
Key.Portuguese: Merda, não sei. Não temos escolha!
Key.Korean: 제기랄, 나도 몰라. 더 이상 방법이 없어!
Key.Chinesesimp: 见鬼，我不知道 - 我们走投无路了！
Key.Japanese: クソッ、知るか。打つ手なしだ！
Key.Turkish: Kahretsin, bilmiyorum - pek seçeneğimiz yok!

Key.Original: Now what, sir?!
Key.Chinese: 現在又怎樣了，長官！？
Key.French: On fait quoi maintenant, Sir ?
Key.Spanish: ¡¿Y ahora qué, señor?!
Key.Italian: E ora, signore?
Key.Polish: Co teraz, sir?!
Key.Russian: Что теперь, сэр?!
Key.German: Was jetzt, Sir?!
Key.Czech: Co teď, pane?!
Key.English: Now what, sir?!
Key.Portuguese: E agora, senhor?!
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在怎么办，长官？！
Key.Japanese: 次は何です！？
Key.Turkish: Şimdi ne var, komutanım?!

Container.name: 210_Check_In
Container.situation: player's co tries to raise the evac helicopter

Key.Original: Echo! Do you copy? Echo!?
Key.Chinese: Echo！你收到沒？Echo！?
Key.French: Echo ! Vous me recevez ? Echo ?
Key.Spanish: ¡Echo! ¿Me reciben? ¡¿Echo?!
Key.Italian: Echo! Mi ricevi? Echo?!
Key.Polish: Echo! Słyszysz? Echo!?
Key.Russian: Эхо! Как слышите? Эхо?!
Key.German: Echo! Hören Sie mich? Echo!?
Key.Czech: Echo! Slyšíte mě? Echo!?
Key.English: Echo! Do you copy? Echo!?
Key.Portuguese: Eco! Você me copia? Eco!?
Key.Chinesesimp: Echo！你收到了吗？Echo！？
Key.Japanese: エコー！聞こえるか？エコー！？
Key.Turkish: Echo! Duyuyor musun? Echo!?

Container.name: 20_Maxwell
Container.participants: EPA B Bravo Lead;EPA B Intro CO;
Container.situation: player sees helicopter at camp maxwell

Key.Original: Hey, check out Maxwell - there's a helo - didn't we finish with that place already?
Key.Chinese: 喂，你看 Maxwell 那邊，有架直升機。我們不是剛才清光那邊嗎？
Key.French: Hé, mais il y a un hélico à Maxwell. On n'avait pas déjà évacué la zone ?
Key.Spanish: Eh, miren Maxwell... Hay un heli... ¿No habíamos acabado ya con ese lugar?
Key.Italian: Ehi, guardate Maxwell. C'è un elicottero. Non avevamo finito con quel posto.
Key.Polish: Hej, sprawdźcie Maxwell - jest tam śmigłowiec - myślałem, że już skończyliśmy z tym miejscem?
Key.Russian: Эй, смотрите на Максвелл - там вертушка. Мы же, вроде, с ним уже закончили?
Key.German: Hey, in Maxwell ist ein Helikopter - waren wir mit dem Camp nicht schon durch?
Key.Czech: Hej, mrkni na Maxwell - je tam vrtulník - neskončili jsme tam už náhodou?
Key.English: Hey, check out Maxwell - there's a helo - didn't we finish with that place already?
Key.Portuguese: Ei, dê uma olhada em Maxwell. Tem um helicóptero lá. Já não havíamos dado conta de tudo?
Key.Korean: 어라? 맥스웰에 헬기가 있습니다. 저기 일은 다 끝난 거 아니었습니까?
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗨，查看 Maxwell 的情况- 有架直升机 - 我们在那地方的事还没完吗？
Key.Japanese: おい、マクスウェルを見ろ。ヘリだ。あそこはもう片づいたんじゃないのか？
Key.Turkish: Hey, Maxwell'e bak - bir helikopter var - orayla işimiz bitmemiş miydi?

Key.Original: Guess not.
Key.Chinese: 看來沒有。
Key.French: Faut croire que non.
Key.Spanish: Parece que no.
Key.Italian: Evidentemente no.
Key.Polish: Chyba jednak nie.
Key.Russian: Видимо, нет.
Key.German: Wohl nicht.
Key.Czech: Asi ne.
Key.English: Guess not.
Key.Portuguese: Pelo visto, não.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我猜没有。
Key.Japanese: そうだな。
Key.Turkish: Sanırım bitmemiş.

Key.Original: Then again, command doesn't really seem to know or particularly care what's going on. Part of me can't really blame them.
Key.Chinese: 總之，指揮官看來不清楚、也不在意到底發生什麼事。我也知道這件事不能全怪他們。
Key.French: Cela dit, le PC n'a pas l'air au courant de ce qui se trame. Dans un sens, je ne peux pas leur en vouloir.
Key.Spanish: Aunque el mando no parece saber muy bien lo que sucede, y tampoco demuestra mucho interés. En parte, no puedo culparlos.
Key.Italian: D'altro canto, il comando sembra non sapere realmente cosa accada, o forse non gli importa. Parte di me non riesce a dargli tutta la colpa.
Key.Polish: Dowództwo chyba nie wie albo mu nie zależy na tym, co się tu dzieje. Jakaś część mnie wcale się mu nie dziwi.
Key.Russian: Опять же, командование вряд ли знает или хочет знать, что тут творится. И я его даже где-то понимаю.
Key.German: Aber das Oberkommando weiß ohnehin nicht, was vorgeht - und ist auch nicht daran interessiert. Ich kann's ihnen nicht mal verübeln.
Key.Czech: Na druhou stranu, nemyslím, že velení ví, co se to tu děje, nebo že je to nějak zvlášť zajímá. A částečně jim to ani nemám za zlé.
Key.English: Then again, command doesn't really seem to know or particularly care what's going on. Part of me can't really blame them.
Key.Portuguese: Parece que o comando não sabe ou não se importa muito com o que está acontecendo. Até que não os culpo muito.
Key.Korean: 어쩌면 사령부가 상황 파악 못 하고 있거나, 신경을 안 쓰고 있는 거겠지. 사령부 탓만 할 수도 없는 일이잖냐.
Key.Chinesesimp: 那么，指挥官看来又一次不知道或不特别在意发生的事情。我有点儿并不真的责怪他们。
Key.Japanese: それでも、司令部は何が起きているか知らないか、特に気にしていないんだろう。責める気になれない自分もいるぜ。
Key.Turkish: Üstelik, komutanlar olanları bilmiyor ya da özellikle sallamıyor gibi görünüyor. Aslına bakarsan onları suçlayamıyorum.

Container.name: 205_Heli_Dead
Container.situation: the evac helicopter gets destroyed

Key.Original: Fuck!
Key.Chinese: 操！
Key.French: Putain !
Key.Spanish: ¡Joder!
Key.Italian: Maledizione!
Key.Polish: Cholera!
Key.Russian: Черт!
Key.German: Scheiße!
Key.Czech: Kurva!
Key.English: Fuck!
Key.Portuguese: Merda!
Key.Chinesesimp: 糟糕！
Key.Japanese: クソッ！
Key.Turkish: Lan!

Container.name: 200_Bomb_Inbound
Container.situation: player's co tries to warn the evac helicopter

Key.Original: Echo, fastmover vectoring on your position! Get out of there!
Key.Chinese: Echo，噴射戰鬥機朝你那邊飛去了！快離開那裡！
Key.French: Echo, le chasseur se dirige vers vous ! Foutez le camp !
Key.Spanish: ¡Echo, un rápido se dirige a su posición! ¡Salgan de ahí!
Key.Italian: Echo, mezzo veloce in arrivo alla tua posizione! Vattene da lì!
Key.Polish: Echo, odrzutowiec kieruje się na twoją pozycję! Wynoś się stamtąd!
Key.Russian: Эхо, на вас идет самолет! Уходите оттуда!
Key.German: Echo, Kampfjäger nähert sich Ihrer Position! Weg da!
Key.Czech: Echo, jde po tobě stíhač! Vypadni odtamtud!
Key.English: Echo, fastmover vectoring on your position! Get out of there!
Key.Portuguese: Eco, jato se aproximando da sua posição! Saia daí!
Key.Korean: 에코, 고속이동체가 그쪽 위치로 간다! 거기서 빠져 나와!
Key.Chinesesimp: Echo，战斗机正朝你的位置飞去！离开那儿！
Key.Japanese: エコー、戦闘機がそちらに向かっている！逃げるんだ！
Key.Turkish: Echo, hızlı ilerleyen sana doğru yöneldi! Oradan çıkın!

Container.name: 195_Bomber_Spotted
Container.situation: player's co spots the bomber

Key.Original: Shit!
Key.Chinese: 可惡！
Key.French: Merde !
Key.Spanish: ¡Mierda!
Key.Italian: Accidenti!
Key.Polish: Cholera!
Key.Russian: Черт!
Key.German: Scheiße!
Key.Czech: Do prdele!
Key.English: Shit!
Key.Portuguese: Merda!
Key.Chinesesimp: 见鬼！
Key.Japanese: クソッ！
Key.Turkish: Lanet!

Container.name: 190_Fly_Over
Container.situation: evac helicopter gets buzzed by an enemy plane

Key.Original: Echo to all units, we just got buzzed by a fastmover. Expedite! Out.
Key.Chinese: Echo 呼叫所有單位，敵方噴射戰鬥機正快速逼近我們。加速！結束通話。
Key.French: Echo à toutes les unités, on vient de se faire accrocher par un chasseur. Activez ! Terminé.
Key.Spanish: Echo a todas las unidades, nos ha zumbado un rápido. ¡Deprisa! Corto.
Key.Italian: Echo a tutte le unità, siamo appena stati sorvolati da un mezzo veloce. Andatevene! Chiudo.
Key.Polish: Echo do wszystkich jednostek. Właśnie przeleciał nad nami samolot. Szybko! Bez odbioru.
Key.Russian: Эхо - всем отрядам, нас засек самолет. Поспешите! Конец связи.
Key.German: Echo an alle Einheiten, wir wurden gerade von einem Kampfjäger überflogen. Beeilung! Out.
Key.Czech: Echo všem jednotkám, právě na nás zaútočil stíhač. Pohněte kostrou! Konec.
Key.English: Echo to all units, we just got buzzed by a fastmover. Expedite! Out.
Key.Portuguese: Eco para todas as unidades. Um jato acabou de passar por aqui. Não percam tempo! Desligo.
Key.Korean: 에코가 전 병력에게, 방금 고속이동체가 스쳐갔다. 서둘러라! 이상.
Key.Chinesesimp: Echo 呼叫所有单元，我们刚被一架战斗机轰炸。快点！完毕！
Key.Japanese: エコーより全部隊へ。戦闘機による威嚇飛行を受けた。急げ！以上。
Key.Turkish: Echo'dan tüm birliklere, bir hızlı ilerleyen az önce yanımızdan geçti. Acele edin! Tamam.

Container.name: 185_Request_Evac
Container.participants: EPA B Evac Helicopter;EPA B Intro CO;
Container.situation: player's co requests a ride

Key.Original: Echo to all units in the Rogain area. We're setting up an evac point at LZ Baldy. Over.
Key.Chinese: Echo 呼叫 Rogain 地區的所有單位。我們在 Baldy 降落區設好撤退點了。完畢。
Key.French: Echo à toutes les unités de la zone Rogain. Nous organisons une évacuation à la ZA Baldy. À vous.
Key.Spanish: Echo a todas las unidades en la zona Rogain. Estamos preparando un punto de evacuación en la zona de aterrizaje Baldy. Cambio.
Key.Italian: Echo a tutte le unità nell'area di Rogain. Stiamo organizzando un punto di evacuazione alla zona di atterraggio Baldy. Passo.
Key.Polish: Echo do wszystkich jednostek w obszarze Rogain. Przygotowujemy punkt ewakuacyjny w SL Baldy. Odbiór.
Key.Russian: Эхо - всем отрядам в районе Рогейна. Мы встаем у точки эвакуации на ВПП "Балди". Прием.
Key.German: Echo an alle Einheiten im Rogain-Gebiet. Wir richten bei LZ Baldy einen Evakuierungspunkt ein. Over.
Key.Czech: Echo všem jednotkám v oblasti Rogainu. Zřizujeme evakuační bod na LZ Baldy. Příjem.
Key.English: Echo to all units in the Rogain area. We're setting up an evac point at LZ Baldy. Over.
Key.Portuguese: Eco para todas as unidades em Rogain. Estamos preparando um ponto de evacuação na zona de pouso Baldy. Câmbio.
Key.Korean: 에코가 로게인 지역 전 병력에게, 볼디 착륙지대에 대피지점을 구축하겠다, 이상.
Key.Chinesesimp: Echo 呼叫 Rogain 地区的所有单元。我们正在 Baldy 着陆区 设立一个疏散点。完毕，请回复。
Key.Japanese: エコーよりロゲイン・エリアの全部隊へ。LZボールディに救援ポイントを設置している。どうぞ。
Key.Turkish: Echo'dan Rogain bölgesindeki tüm birliklere. Baldy İniş Bölgesi'nde bir tahliye noktası oluşturuyoruz. Tamam.

Key.Original: Affirmative. We'll hold, but we can't stall forever. Over.
Key.Chinese: 肯定。我們在這裡等你們來，但等不了太久。完畢。
Key.French: Affirmatif. On peut attendre, mais pas éternellement. À vous.
Key.Spanish: Afirmativo. Resistiremos, pero no podremos aguantar eternamente. Cambio.
Key.Italian: Affermativo. Ma non possiamo restare in stallo per sempre. Passo.
Key.Polish: Zrozumiałem. Zaczekamy, ale nie możemy robić tego dłużej. Odbiór.
Key.Russian: Вас понял. Продержимся - но долго вряд ли получится. Прием.
Key.German: Bestätige. Wir halten die Stellung, aber das wird nicht ewig gehen. Over.
Key.Czech: Potvrzuji. Počkáme, ale nemůžeme se tu udržet věčně. Příjem.
Key.English: Affirmative. We'll hold, but we can't stall forever. Over.
Key.Portuguese: Afirmativo. Vamos manter a posição, mas não dá para segurar para sempre. Câmbio.
Key.Korean: 들었다. 대기는 하겠지만 오래는 못 기다린다, 이상.
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。我们在坚守，可是我们没法拖太久。完毕，请回复。
Key.Japanese: 了解。待機するが、永遠とはいかないぞ。どうぞ。
Key.Turkish: Olumlu. Duracağız ancak sonsuza kadar dayanamayız. Tamam.

Key.Original: Echo, this Staff Sargent Adams - we're en route! It's just the two of us, part of a detachment from Rogain. We're moving out from Point X-ray now. How copy?
Key.Chinese: Echo，我是 Adams 上士，我們在路上！我們就兩個人，是 Rogain 其中一個分隊。我們現在從 X-ray 點過去。你收到嗎？
Key.French: Echo, ici le sergent chef Adams, on vous rejoint ! On fait partie d'un détachement de Rogain, mais on n'est que deux. On s'apprête à quitter le point X-ray. Vous me recevez ?
Key.Spanish: Echo, al habla el sargento Adams. ¡Estamos en camino! Somos solo dos, parte de un destacamento de Rogain. Estamos saliendo el punto X-Ray. ¿Me reciben?
Key.Italian: Echo, qui è il sergente capo Adams, siamo in arrivo. Siamo solo noi due, parte di un distaccamento di Rogain. Stiamo uscendo dal Point X-ray ora. Mi ricevi?
Key.Polish: Echo, tu sierżant sztabowy Adams - jesteśmy w drodze! Jest nas tylko dwóch, część oddziału z Rogain. Ruszamy z Punktu X-ray. Odbiór?
Key.Russian: Эхо, говорит штаб-сержант Адамс. Мы в пути! Нас всего двое, мы из отряда с Рогейна. Идем из точки Иксрей. Как поняли?
Key.German: Echo, hier Staff Sargent Adams - wir sind unterwegs! Wir sind nur zu zweit und gehören zu einer Abteilung aus Rogain. Wir ziehen jetzt von Point X-Ray los. Haben Sie verstanden?
Key.Czech: Echo, tady seržant Adams, jsme na cestě! Jsme jen dva, část oddílu z Rogainu. Právě opouštíme bod X-ray. Jak mě slyšíte?
Key.English: Echo, this Staff Sargent Adams - we're en route! It's just the two of us, part of a detachment from Rogain. We're moving out from Point X-ray now. How copy?
Key.Portuguese: Eco, aqui é o Sargento Operacional Adams. Estamos a caminho! Somos só nós dois, parte de um destacamento de Rogain. Estamos saindo do ponto X-ray agora. Copiou?
Key.Korean: 에코, 여기는 애덤스 하사. 지금 가겠다! 로게인에서 파견된 분견대의 일부, 두 명이다. 현재 엑스레이 지점에서 이동 중. 들었는가?
Key.Chinesesimp: Echo，我是 Adams 上士- 我们在路上！我们只有两个人，是从 Rogain 派出的分遣队的一部分。我们正在离开 X-ray 据点。收到了吗？
Key.Japanese: エコー、こちらアダムス曹長。今向かっている！2人だけだ。ロゲインの派遣隊の一部だ。ポイント・エックスレイから移動中。いいか？
Key.Turkish: Echo, Başçavuş Adams konuşuyor - yoldayız! Sadece ikimiz varız, Rogain'den gelen bir müfrezenin parçası. Şimdi X-ray Noktası'ndan dışarı çıkıyoruz. Anlaşıldı mı?

Key.Original: You're a Godsend, Echo! Don't worry, we'll be there! Out!
Key.Chinese: 來得正是時候，Echo！別擔心，我們會過去！結束通話！
Key.French: Vous êtes notre sauveur, Echo ! Ne vous en faites pas, on sera là sous peu ! Terminé !
Key.Spanish: ¡Nos viene como agua de mayo, Echo! ¡No se preocupen, allá vamos! ¡Corto!
Key.Italian: Sei un dono del cielo, Echo! Non preoccuparti, ci saremo! Passo!
Key.Polish: Echo, zsyłają was niebiosa! Spokojnie, będziemy tam! Bez odbioru!
Key.Russian: Эхо, да вы нам Богом посланы! Не волнуйтесь, мы там будем. Конец связи!
Key.German: Sie sind ein Geschenk Gottes, Echo! Keine Soge, wir werden da sein! Out!
Key.Czech: Jste dar z nebes, Echo! Nebojte, budeme tam! Konec!
Key.English: You're a Godsend, Echo! Don't worry, we'll be there! Out!
Key.Portuguese: Vocês caíram do céu, Eco! Não se preocupe. Logo estaremos aí! Desligo!
Key.Korean: 정말 죽다 살았다, 에코! 걱정 마라. 꼭 가겠다! 이상!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你是上天派来的礼物，Echo！别担心，我们会到那的！完毕！
Key.Japanese: 神の恵みだ、エコー！心配するな。すぐ行く！以上！
Key.Turkish: Hızır gibi yetiştin, Echo! Endişelenme, orada olacağız. Tamam!

Container.name: 185_Evac_Spotted
Container.situation: player's co hears a helictopers

Key.Original: Wait, I hear a chopper.
Key.Chinese: 等等，我聽見直升機的聲音。
Key.French: Attendez, j'entends un hélico.
Key.Spanish: Alto, oigo un helicóptero...
Key.Italian: Un momento, sento un elicottero.
Key.Polish: Zaraz, słyszę śmigłowiec.
Key.Russian: Стоп, я вертушку слышу.
Key.German: Moment, ich höre einen Helikopter.
Key.Czech: Počkat, slyším vrtulník.
Key.English: Wait, I hear a chopper.
Key.Portuguese: Espere aí. Estou ouvindo um helicóptero.
Key.Chinesesimp: 等等，我听到直升机的声音。
Key.Japanese: 待て。ヘリの音だ。
Key.Turkish: Bekle, bir chopper sesi duyuyorum.

Container.name: 183_Evac_Confirmed
Container.situation: player's co hears a helictopers

Key.Original: It's one of ours!
Key.Chinese: 是我們的人！
Key.French: Il est des nôtres !
Key.Spanish: ¡Es uno de los nuestros!
Key.Italian: È uno dei nostri!
Key.Polish: To jeden z naszych!
Key.Russian: Это наша!
Key.German: Es ist einer von uns!
Key.Czech: To je jeden z našich!
Key.English: It's one of ours!
Key.Portuguese: É um dos nossos!
Key.Chinesesimp: 它是我们的！
Key.Japanese: 仲間のヘリだ！
Key.Turkish: Bizimkilerden biri.

Container.name: 180_At_AA
Container.situation: player and co reach the aa site

Key.Original: Damn.
Key.Chinese: 可惡。
Key.French: Merde...
Key.Spanish: Mierda.
Key.Italian: Dannazione.
Key.Polish: Cholera.
Key.Russian: Черт.
Key.German: Verdammt!
Key.Czech: Sakra.
Key.English: Damn.
Key.Portuguese: Droga.
Key.Chinesesimp: 见鬼。
Key.Japanese: クソッ。
Key.Turkish: Lanet olsun.

Container.name: 175_Bad_Sign
Container.situation: player and co kill enemy forces at the aa site

Key.Original: Well, that's not exactly a good sign.
Key.Chinese: 嘖，這可不是好兆頭。
Key.French: Ça, c'est pas franchement bon signe.
Key.Spanish: Eso no es una buena señal, exactamente.
Key.Italian: Non è esattamente un buon segno.
Key.Polish: Cóż, to raczej nie najlepszy znak.
Key.Russian: Да, это явно не к добру.
Key.German: Das ist nicht gerade ein gutes Zeichen.
Key.Czech: No, to není zrovna dobré znamení.
Key.English: Well, that's not exactly a good sign.
Key.Portuguese: Esse não é um sinal dos bons.
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，那算不上是个好兆头。
Key.Japanese: 良い兆候とは言いがたいな。
Key.Turkish: Pekâlâ, bu tam olarak iyi bir işaret değil.

Container.name: 170_Over_Camp
Container.participants: EPA B Player;EPA B Intro CO;
Container.situation: player and co spot camp rogain

Key.Original: Let's hope X-ray's had better luck. Move it.
Key.Chinese: 希望 X-ray 點的狀況好一些。前進。
Key.French: Espérons que X-ray s'en sort mieux. On avance.
Key.Spanish: Esperemos que X-Ray haya tenido más suerte. Muévase.
Key.Italian: Speriamo che X-ray abbia avuto più fortuna. Andiamo.
Key.Polish: Miejmy nadzieję, że w X-ray mieli więcej szczęścia. Naprzód.
Key.Russian: Будем надеяться, что Иксрею повезло больше. Пошли.
Key.German: Hoffentlich hatte X-Ray mehr Glück. Los!
Key.Czech: Doufejme, že X-ray měl víc štěstí. Hoďte sebou.
Key.English: Let's hope X-ray's had better luck. Move it.
Key.Portuguese: Tomara que a sorte do pessoal no ponto X-ray seja melhor. Mexam-se.
Key.Chinesesimp: 希望 X-ray 的运气能好点。移动它。
Key.Japanese: エックスレイにはツキがあったことを祈ろう。急げ。
Key.Turkish: Umarım X-ray daha şanslıdır. Onu ilerlet.

Key.Original: Jesus. Rogain's taken a beating.
Key.Chinese: 天啊。Rogain 遭遇攻擊。
Key.French: Bon Dieu. Rogain a bien morflé.
Key.Spanish: Dios. Rogain ha sufrido bastante.
Key.Italian: Rogain ha subito un duro colpo.
Key.Polish: Jezu. Rogain nieźle oberwało.
Key.Russian: Боже мой. Рогейну сильно досталось.
Key.German: Oh, Mann ... Rogain hat ganz schön einstecken müssen.
Key.Czech: Ježíši. Rogain dostal pěkně na prdel.
Key.English: Jesus. Rogain's taken a beating.
Key.Portuguese: Minha nossa. Rogain está sendo estraçalhado.
Key.Chinesesimp: 天哪。Rogain 受到了攻击。
Key.Japanese: なんてこった。ロゲインはひどい状態だ。
Key.Turkish: Tanrım. Rogain yenilgiye uğradı.

Container.name: 165_AA
Container.participants: EPA B Player;EPA B Intro CO;
Container.situation: player's co decides to check the aa site instead

Key.Original: Stay focused. Point X-ray's just over the hill.
Key.Chinese: 別分心。翻過山丘就到 X-ray 點了。
Key.French: Restons concentrés. Le point X-ray est de l'autre côté de cette colline.
Key.Spanish: Céntrense. El punto X-Ray está tras esa colina.
Key.Italian: Mantenete la concentrazione. Il Point X-ray è al di là della collina.
Key.Polish: Skupcie się. Punkt X-ray jest tuż za tym wzgórzem.
Key.Russian: Глядите в оба. Точка Иксрей за этим холмом.
Key.German: Bleiben Sie konzentriert. Point X-Ray ist direkt jenseits dieses Hügels.
Key.Czech: Zůstaň ve střehu. Bod X-ray je přímo za tímhle kopcem.
Key.English: Stay focused. Point X-ray's just over the hill.
Key.Portuguese: Fiquem atentos. O ponto X-ray é logo depois do monte.
Key.Korean: 정신 차려. 언덕만 넘으면 엑스레이 지점이야.
Key.Chinesesimp: 集中精神。X-ray 据点就在山那边。
Key.Japanese: 気を抜くな。ポイント・エックスレイはこの丘のすぐ先だ。
Key.Turkish: Dikkatli ol. X-ray Noktası hemen tepenin ardında.

Key.Original: Our best bet is to RV with them and take it from there.
Key.Chinese: 最好的狀況是跟他們會合，之後再做打算。
Key.French: Le mieux est de les rejoindre et voir ce qui en ressort.
Key.Spanish: Nuestra mejor opción es reunirnos con ellos y seguir desde ahí.
Key.Italian: La cosa migliore da fare è incontrarli e poi procedere.
Key.Polish: Naszą najlepszą szansą jest spotkanie się z nimi i ruszenie dalej razem.
Key.Russian: Лучший вариант - встретиться с ними и дальше там действовать самим.
Key.German: Ein Treffen mit ihnen ist unsere beste Chance, und dann sehen wir weiter.
Key.Czech: Nejlepší pro nás bude, když se s nimi setkáme a vezmem to odtamtud společně.
Key.English: Our best bet is to RV with them and take it from there.
Key.Portuguese: Nossa melhor chance é encontrar com eles e seguir adiante.
Key.Korean: 그들과 합류해 같이 움직이는 게 최선이야.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们最好的选择是与他们会合，然后再作打算。
Key.Japanese: 最善の策は彼らと合流することだ。その後のことはその時考えるんだな。
Key.Turkish: En iyi seçeneğimiz onlarla buluşup oradan devam etmemiz.

Key.Original: Fuck! What do we do, sir?
Key.Chinese: 操！我們該怎麼做，長官？
Key.French: Merde ! On fait quoi, Sir ?
Key.Spanish: ¡Joder! ¿Qué hacemos, señor?
Key.Italian: Merda! Cosa facciamo, signore?
Key.Polish: Cholera! Co teraz, sir?
Key.Russian: Черт! Что делать будем, сэр?
Key.German: Scheiße! Was sollen wir machen, Sir?
Key.Czech: Do prdele! Co budeme dělat, pane?
Key.English: Fuck! What do we do, sir?
Key.Portuguese: Merda! O que devemos fazer, senhor?
Key.Chinesesimp: 糟糕！我们现在怎么办，长官？
Key.Japanese: クソッ！どうします？
Key.Turkish: Lan! Ne yapacağız, komutanım?

Container.name: 160_Evac
Container.participants: EPA B Logistics Officer;EPA B HQ;
Container.situation: hq orders all units to evacuate

Key.Original: That's a negative, Rogain.
Key.Chinese: 否定，Rogain。
Key.French: Négatif, Rogain.
Key.Spanish: Negativo, Rogain.
Key.Italian: Negativo, Rogain.
Key.Polish: Nie, Rogain.
Key.Russian: Никак нет, Рогейн.
Key.German: Negativ, Rogain.
Key.Czech: Zamítá se, Rogaine.
Key.English: That's a negative, Rogain.
Key.Portuguese: Negativo, Rogain.
Key.Chinesesimp: 回答是否定的，Rogain。
Key.Japanese: だめだ、ロゲイン。
Key.Turkish: Bu olumsuz, Rogain.

Key.Original: Broadway to all NATO forces on Stratis: Code Foxtrot. Code Foxtrot.
Key.Chinese: Broadway 呼叫所有在 Stratis 的 NATO 部隊：代號 Foxtrot。代號 Foxtrot。
Key.French: Broadway à toutes les forces de l'OTAN sur Stratis : code Foxtrot. Code Foxtrot.
Key.Spanish: Broadway a todas las fuerzas de la OTAN en Stratis: código Foxtrot. Código Foxtrot.
Key.Italian: Broadway a tutte le forze NATO su Stratis: codice Foxtrot. Codice Foxtrot.
Key.Polish: Broadway do wszystkich sił NATO stacjonujących na Stratis: kod Foxtrot. Kod Foxtrot.
Key.Russian: Бродвей всем силам НАТО на Стратисе: код Фокстрот. Повторяю, код Фокстрот.
Key.German: Broadway an alle NATO-Truppen auf Stratis: Code Foxtrot. Code Foxtrot.
Key.Czech: Broadway všem jednotkám NATO na Stratisu: Kód Foxtrot. Kód Foxtrot.
Key.English: Broadway to all NATO forces on Stratis: Code Foxtrot. Code Foxtrot.
Key.Portuguese: Transmissão para todas as forças da OTAN em Stratis: Código Foxtrot. Código Foxtrot.
Key.Korean: 브로드웨이가 스트라티스의 전 NATO 병력에게, 코드 폭스트롯 발령. 코드 폭스트롯을 발령한다.
Key.Chinesesimp: Broadway 呼叫 Stratis 的所有北约部队：代号 Foxtrot。代号 Foxtrot。
Key.Japanese: ブロードウェイよりストラティスの全NATO部隊へ。コード・フォックストロット。コード・フォックストロット。
Key.Turkish: Broadway'den Stratis'teki tüm NATO kuvvetlerine: Foxtrot Kodu. Foxtrot Kodu.

Key.Original: Rogain to Broadway! We're under heavy assault! Send backup! Over!
Key.Chinese: Rogain 呼叫 Broadway！我們被重炮轟炸！請求支援！完畢！
Key.French: Rogain à Broadway, nous sommes sous le feu ! Envoyez des renforts ! À vous !
Key.Spanish: ¡Rogain a Broadway! ¡Sufrimos un asalto pesado! ¡Envíen refuerzos! ¡Cambio!
Key.Italian: Rogain a Broadway! Siamo sotto assedio pesante! Inviate rinforzi! Passo!
Key.Polish: Rogain do Broadway! Zostaliśmy zaatakowani! Przyślijcie wsparcie! Odbiór!
Key.Russian: Бродвей, я Рогейн! Мы атакованы крупными силами врага! Вышлите подкрепление! Прием!
Key.German: Rogain an Broadway! Wir liegen unter schwerem Beschuss! Benötigen Verstärkung! Over!
Key.Czech: Rogain pro Broadway! Jsme pod těžkou palbou! Žádáme o posily! Příjem!
Key.English: Rogain to Broadway! We're under heavy assault! Send backup! Over!
Key.Portuguese: Rogain para Broadway! Estamos sob ataque pesado! Envie reforços! Câmbio!
Key.Korean: 로게인이 브로드웨이에게! 적의 거센 공격을 받고 있다! 지원을 보내달라! 이상!
Key.Chinesesimp: Rogain 呼叫 Broadway！我们受到猛烈攻击！派遣支援！完毕，请回复！
Key.Japanese: ロゲインよりブロードウェイ！激しい攻撃を受けている！応援を頼む！どうぞ！
Key.Turkish: Rogain'den Broadway'e! Ağır saldırı altındayız! Destek gönderin! Tamam!

Key.Original: AAF forces have overwhelmed the airfield and Air Station Mike-26. We're pulling back.
Key.Chinese: AAF 部隊強行進入飛行場與 Mike-26 航空站。進行撤退。
Key.French: L'AAF a envahi la base aérienne et le point Mike-26. Nous battons en retraite.
Key.Spanish: Las fuerzas de la AAF han arrasado el aeródromo y la estación aérea Mike-26. Nos retiramos.
Key.Italian: Le forze AAF hanno preso possesso del campo aereo e della stazione aerea Mike-26. Ci ritiriamo.
Key.Polish: Siły AAF przejęły kontrolę nad lotniskiem i stacją Mike-26. Wycofujemy się.
Key.Russian: Силы AAF с большим численным перевесом захватили аэродром и авиабазу Майк-26. Мы отступаем.
Key.German: AAF-Kräfte haben das Flugfeld und Flugstation Mike-26 überwältigt. Wir ziehen uns zurück.
Key.Czech: Jednotky AAF přemohly obranu letiště a stanice Mike-26. Stahujeme se.
Key.English: AAF forces have overwhelmed the airfield and Air Station Mike-26. We're pulling back.
Key.Portuguese: As tropas da AAF sobrepujaram o campo de pouso e a estação aérea Mike-26. Vamos recuar.
Key.Korean: AAF군이 비행장과 마이크 둘여섯 레이더기지를 제압했다. 후퇴하겠다.
Key.Chinesesimp: AAF 军队占领了机场和 Mike-26 航空站。我们正在撤退。
Key.Japanese: AAF部隊が飛行場および航空基地マイク-26を制圧した。我々は退却中。
Key.Turkish: AAF kuvvetleri, hava sahasını ve Hava İstasyonu Mike-26'yı ele geçirdi. Geri çekiliyoruz.

Key.Original: Try to get -
Key.Chinese: 試著去－
Key.French: Essayez de rejoindre...
Key.Spanish: Intente llegar...
Key.Italian: Cerca di…
Key.Polish: Spróbuj -
Key.Russian: Постарайтесь...
Key.German: Versuchen Sie ...
Key.Czech: Snažte se dostat-
Key.English: Try to get -
Key.Portuguese: Tente...
Key.Chinesesimp: 设法获取 -
Key.Japanese: 至急…
Key.Turkish: Şunu deneyin -

Container.name: 15_Roads
Container.participants: EPA B Bravo Lead;EPA B Intro CO;
Container.situation: player asks why the roads are locked

Key.Original: What's the deal with the roads? Why the lockdown?
Key.Chinese: 道路怎麼了？為什麼封鎖？
Key.French: C'est quoi le topo ? Pourquoi les routes sont interdites ?
Key.Spanish: ¿Qué pasa con las carreteras? ¿Por qué el cierre?
Key.Italian: Cosa succede alle strade? Perché sono bloccate?
Key.Polish: O co chodzi z drogami? Dlaczego są zamknięte?
Key.Russian: Что там с дорогами? Почему перекрыты?
Key.German: Was ist mit den Straßen? Weshalb die Sperrung?
Key.Czech: Co mají znamenat ty silnice? Na co uzavírka?
Key.English: What's the deal with the roads? Why the lockdown?
Key.Portuguese: Qual é o problema das estradas? Por que estão bloqueadas?
Key.Chinesesimp: 路是怎么回事？为什么封锁了？
Key.Japanese: 道路はどうしたんだ？なぜ閉鎖されてる？
Key.Turkish: Yollarla ilgili sorun ne? Neden kapalı?

Key.Original: You'd think the Greenbacks were actually competent or something.
Key.Chinese: 還以為 Greenback 終於能自立自強了呢。
Key.French: Moi qui croyais que les Altos étaient un minimum compétents.
Key.Spanish: Yo imaginaba que los Greenbacks eran por lo menos competentes.
Key.Italian: Pensavo che i Greenback avessero un minimo di competenza.
Key.Polish: Mogłoby się wydawać, że Zieloni naprawdę potrafią myśleć.
Key.Russian: От зеленых как-то ожидаешь компетентности, что ли.
Key.German: Haben Sie die Greenbacks tatsächlich für kompetent oder so was gehalten?
Key.Czech: Člověk by si myslel, že Zelenáči budou aspoň vědět, co dělají.
Key.English: You'd think the Greenbacks were actually competent or something.
Key.Portuguese: E só de pensar que a gente pensava que os Greenbacks chegavam a ser competentes.
Key.Korean: 설마 하사님은 그린백 놈들이 실제로는 유능하다고 생각하십니까?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你会觉得 Greenback 确实能干还是怎样。
Key.Japanese: グリーンバックは実際優秀だと思うだろうな。
Key.Turkish: Gören de Çaylaklar gerçekten işinin ehli sanır.

Key.Original: Someone forgot to tell the AAF commander we'd be decommissioning the airbase.
Key.Chinese: 沒人跟 AAF 指揮官說，我們要廢了這個飛行場嗎？
Key.French: Quelqu'un a oublié d'avertir le commandant de l'AAF que la base aérienne allait être démantelée.
Key.Spanish: Alguien se olvidó de decirle al comandante de la AAF que íbamos a jubilar la base aérea.
Key.Italian: Qualcuno ha dimenticato di dire al comandante AAF che avremmo decommissionato la base aerea.
Key.Polish: Ktoś zapomniał powiedzieć dowódcy AAF, że chcemy zlikwidować bazę lotniczą.
Key.Russian: Кто-то забыл сказать командиру AAF, что мы будем расформировывать авиабазу.
Key.German: Jemand hat vergessen, dem AAF-Kommandanten zu sagen, dass wir den Luftwaffenstützpunkt auflösen.
Key.Czech: Někdo zapomněl dát vědět veliteli AAF, že budem vyřazovat leteckou základnu z provozu.
Key.English: Someone forgot to tell the AAF commander we'd be decommissioning the airbase.
Key.Portuguese: Alguém se esqueceu de contar ao comandante da AAF que estávamos desativando a base aérea.
Key.Korean: 우리가 공군기지도 해체할 거라고 AAF 사령관한테 얘기하는 걸 까먹었나 봐.
Key.Chinesesimp: 有人忘了告诉 AAF 指挥官，我们停止使用航空站了。
Key.Japanese: 我々が空軍基地を閉鎖することを、AAFの指揮官に伝え忘れた奴がいるな。
Key.Turkish: Birileri AAF komutanına hava üssünü zaten kullanımdan kaldıracağımızı söylemeyi unutmuş.

Key.Original: He's throwing some kind of hissy fit over there right now. It's a mess.
Key.Chinese: 我看到他在那邊暴跳如雷。真是一團糟。
Key.French: Il est en train de nous piquer sa crise. C'est pas joli à voir.
Key.Spanish: Por ahí anda ahora, parece que está sufriendo alguna clase de ataque. Es un lío.
Key.Italian: Sta facendo un casino proprio adesso. È il caos più totale.
Key.Polish: Strasznie się o to wścieka. Jest niezły bałagan.
Key.Russian: Теперь он тут очень сильно сердится. Как говорится, пошла жара.
Key.German: Er hat dort jetzt gerade einen Wutanfall. Ein Chaos ...
Key.Czech: Zrovna teď se tam kvůli tomu vzteká. Hrozný bordel.
Key.English: He's throwing some kind of hissy fit over there right now. It's a mess.
Key.Portuguese: Ele está dando faniquito por lá agora. Que vergonha.
Key.Korean: 그래서 엉뚱한 곳에다 화풀이나 하고 있는 거야. 그냥 개판이지.
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在他正在那儿大发脾气呢。真是一团糟。
Key.Japanese: 今頃あっちでかんしゃくを起こしてるだろう。修羅場だな。
Key.Turkish: Şu anda orada sinir krizi geçiriyor. Berbat durumda.

Key.Original: I wouldn't go that far.
Key.Chinese: 我可不會那樣想。
Key.French: Houlà, c'est beaucoup dire.
Key.Spanish: Yo no llegaría a tanto.
Key.Italian: Non andrei così lontano.
Key.Polish: To chyba lekka przesada.
Key.Russian: Я бы так далеко не заходил.
Key.German: So weit würde ich nicht gehen.
Key.Czech: To bych zase neřekl.
Key.English: I wouldn't go that far.
Key.Portuguese: Eu não chegaria a esse ponto.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我还不至于那么说。
Key.Japanese: そりゃ言い過ぎだ。
Key.Turkish: Ben olsam o kadar ileri gitmezdim.

Container.name: 155_Contacts
Container.situation: player's co reports the contacts

Key.Original: Rogain, we've just had a run in with Greenback forces in the forest to your south. Over.
Key.Chinese: Rogain，我們剛在你南方的森林碰上 Greenback 部隊。完畢。
Key.French: Rogain, on vient de rencontrer les forces altos dans la forêt au sud. À vous.
Key.Spanish: Rogain, acabamos de vérnoslas con fuerzas Greenback en los bosques al sur de su posición. Cambio.
Key.Italian: Rogain, abbiamo appena incontrato le forze Greenback nella foresta a sud. Passo.
Key.Polish: Rogain, przed chwilą natrafiliśmy na siły Zielonych w lesie na południe od was. Odbiór.
Key.Russian: Рогейн, мы только что наткнулись в лесу к югу от вас на войска зеленых. Прием.
Key.German: Rogain, wir hatten gerade einen Zusammenstoß mit den Greenbacks in dem Wald südlich von Ihnen. Over.
Key.Czech: Rogaine, právě jsme v lese jižně od vás narazili na jednotku Zelenáčů. Příjem.
Key.English: Rogain, we've just had a run in with Greenback forces in the forest to your south. Over.
Key.Portuguese: Rogain, acabamos de ter um confronto com as forças de Greenback na floresta ao seu sul. Câmbio.
Key.Korean: 로게인, 귀소측 남쪽 숲에서 방금 그린백 병력과 조우했다. 이상.
Key.Chinesesimp: Rogain，我们刚在你南边的森林里与 Greenback 军队干了一架。完毕，请回复。
Key.Japanese: ロゲイン、そちらの南の森でグリーンバックの部隊とやり合ったところだ。どうぞ。
Key.Turkish: Rogain, güneyindeki ormanda Çaylak kuvvetleriyle atıştık. Tamam.

Key.Original: Camp Rogain, do you read? Over.
Key.Chinese: Rogain 營地，收到訊息嗎？完畢。
Key.French: Camp Rogain, vous me recevez ? À vous.
Key.Spanish: Camp Rogain, ¿me reciben? Cambio.
Key.Italian: Camp Rogain, ricevete? Passo.
Key.Polish: Camp Rogain, czy mnie słyszycie? Odbiór.
Key.Russian: Лагерь Рогейн, как слышите? Прием.
Key.German: Camp Rogain, hören Sie mich? Over.
Key.Czech: Rogaine, slyšíte mě? Příjem.
Key.English: Camp Rogain, do you read? Over.
Key.Portuguese: Acampamento Rogain, você está recebendo? Câmbio.
Key.Chinesesimp: Rogain 营地，你收到了吗？完毕，请回复。
Key.Japanese: キャンプ・ロゲイン、聞こえるか？どうぞ。
Key.Turkish: Rogain Kampı, duyuyor musunuz? Tamam.

Container.name: 150_Safer
Container.participants: EPA B Player;EPA B Intro CO;
Container.situation: player acknowledges the situation, again

Key.Original: Tell me about it! Let's just get back to Rogain.
Key.Chinese: 告訴我什麼情形！我們還是回 Rogain 去。
Key.French: Oui, bon. On n'a qu'à rentrer à Rogain.
Key.Spanish: Cuéntame acerca de ti. Volvamos a Rogain y ya está.
Key.Italian: Non mi dire niente! Torniamo a Rogain.
Key.Polish: Co ty nie powiesz! Lepiej wracajmy do Rogain.
Key.Russian: И не говорите! Давайте возвращаться в Рогейн.
Key.German: Fragen Sie mich mal! Wir sollten einfach nach Rogain zurückgehen.
Key.Czech: Mi povídejte! Dostaňme se hlavně zpátky do Rogainu.
Key.English: Tell me about it! Let's just get back to Rogain.
Key.Portuguese: Nem me fale! Vamos voltar logo a Rogain.
Key.Korean: 나라고 이럴 줄 알았겠냐?! 그냥 로게인으로 돌아가기나 하자고.
Key.Chinesesimp: 汇报情况！我们还是回 Rogain 去吧。
Key.Japanese: わかってるさ！ロゲインに戻ろう。
Key.Turkish: Anlat bana! Rogain'e geri dönelim.

Key.Original: What was that you said about it being safer on foot?!
Key.Chinese: 你不是說步行比較安全？
Key.French: Vous disiez que ce serait moins risqué à pied ?
Key.Spanish: ¡¿Qué es lo que dijo de que a pie se viajaba más seguro?!
Key.Italian: Non avevi detto che saremmo stati più al sicuro a piedi?
Key.Polish: Podobno na piechotę miało być bezpieczniej?!
Key.Russian: Что вы там говорили насчет "пешком безопаснее"?!
Key.German: Wie war das, von wegen "zu Fuß ist es sicherer"?
Key.Czech: Cože jste to říkal o tom, že pěšky to bude bezpečnější?!
Key.English: What was that you said about it being safer on foot?!
Key.Portuguese: O que foi que você disse sobre ir a pé ser mais seguro?!
Key.Korean: 걷는 게 더 안전할 거라더니 이게 뭐가 안전합니까?!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你说步行比较安全是什么意思？！
Key.Japanese: 徒歩の方が安全だって話、何て言ってた？
Key.Turkish: Yaya olarak daha güvenli olmakla ilgili söylediğin şey neydi?!

Container.name: 145_FUBAR
Container.participants: EPA B Player;EPA B Intro CO;
Container.situation: player acknowledges the situation

Key.Original: I don't know what the hell's going on right now.
Key.Chinese: 我他娘的現在什麼都不知道了。
Key.French: Je n'ai plus aucune idée de ce qui se passe.
Key.Spanish: Ahora mismo, no sé que demonios está pasando.
Key.Italian: Non so che diavolo stia succedendo.
Key.Polish: Nie mam bladego pojęcia, co się dzieje, do cholery.
Key.Russian: Я понятия не имею, что сейчас такое творится.
Key.German: Ich weiß nicht, was zum Teufel hier gerade abgeht.
Key.Czech: Nemám kurva ani tucha, co se to tu děje.
Key.English: I don't know what the hell's going on right now.
Key.Portuguese: Não faço ideia do que está acontecendo agora.
Key.Korean: 지금 뭐가 어떻게 돌아가는 건지 나도 몰라.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不知道现在到底发生了什么。
Key.Japanese: 今何が起こっているかはわからない。
Key.Turkish: Şu anda neler döndüğünü bilmiyorum.

Key.Original: Just stay alert. Get set for contact.
Key.Chinese: 總之保持警戒。做好交戰準備。
Key.French: Allez, on se concentre. Préparez-vous au contact !
Key.Spanish: Estén alerta. Listos para el contacto.
Key.Italian: Stai all'erta. Preparati al contatto.
Key.Polish: Zachować czujność. Przygotować się na kontakt.
Key.Russian: Главное, будьте начеку. Приготовьтесь к бою.
Key.German: Bleiben Sie wachsam. Und bereit machen für Kontakt.
Key.Czech: Měj oči na stopkách. Připrav se na kontakt.
Key.English: Just stay alert. Get set for contact.
Key.Portuguese: Fiquem em alerta. Preparem-se para o contato.
Key.Chinesesimp: 保持警惕就好。为交火做好准备。
Key.Japanese: 油断するな。敵に備えろ。
Key.Turkish: Tetikte ol. Temas için hazırlan.

Key.Original: What the literal fuck - are you kidding me?
Key.Chinese: 幹，你他娘的在耍我？
Key.French: Putain mais dites-moi que je rêve !
Key.Spanish: Qué coño... ¿Es una coña?
Key.Italian: Ma che diavolo… mi prendi per i fondelli?
Key.Polish: Co do jasnej cholery - żartujesz sobie?
Key.Russian: Какого, собственно, хрена? Вы шутите?
Key.German: Was zum Teufel ... soll das ein Witz sein?
Key.Czech: Co to má do prdele - děláte si srandu?
Key.English: What the literal fuck - are you kidding me?
Key.Portuguese: Mas que merda é essa? Está de brincadeira?
Key.Chinesesimp: 真是活见鬼 - 你在和我开玩笑吧？
Key.Japanese: 何だって？ウソだろ？
Key.Turkish: Ne saçmalıyorsun - benimle dalga mı geçiyorsun?

Container.name: 140_Enemies
Container.situation: hq acknowledges that the aaf are hostile

Key.Original: Copy that, Kamino. Dispatching reinforcements. Just hold on!
Key.Chinese: 收到，Kamino。援軍在路上了。撐住！
Key.French: Bien reçu, Kamino. Les renforts arrivent. Tenez bon !
Key.Spanish: Recibido, Kamino. Despachando refuerzos. ¡Un momento!
Key.Italian: Ricevuto, Kamino. Stiamo inviando i rinforzi, tenete duro!
Key.Polish: Przyjąłem, Kamino. Wysyłam wsparcie. Trzymajcie się!
Key.Russian: Вас понял, Камино. Отправляю подкрепления. Вы там держитесь!
Key.German: Verstanden, Kamino. Schicken Verstärkung. Halten Sie durch!
Key.Czech: Rozumím, Kamino. Posíláme posily. Vydržte!
Key.English: Copy that, Kamino. Dispatching reinforcements. Just hold on!
Key.Portuguese: Copiado, Kamino. Despachando reforços. Aguente firme!
Key.Korean: 알겠다, 카미노. 지원병력 파견한다. 조금만 버텨라!
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，Kamino。正在派遣增援部队。坚持住！
Key.Japanese: 了解、カミノ。援軍を送る。踏ん張るんだ！
Key.Turkish: Anlaşıldı, Kamino. Takviyeler sevk ediliyor. Bekle!

Key.Original: Broadway to all NATO forces on Stratis: Green on Blue, I say again, Green on Blue.
Key.Chinese: Broadway 呼叫所有在 Stratis 的 NATO 部隊：遭到友方攻擊，我重複，遭到友方攻擊。
Key.French: Broadway à toutes les forces de l'OTAN sur Stratis : Green on Blue, je répète, Green on Blue.
Key.Spanish: Broadway a todas las fuerzas de la OTAN en Stratis: Verde sobre azul, repito, Verde sobre azul.
Key.Italian: Broadway a tutte le forze NATO su Stratis: Green on Blue, ripeto Green on Blue.
Key.Polish: Broadway do wszystkich sił NATO stacjonujących na Stratis: zieloni na niebieskich, powtarzam, zieloni na niebieskich.
Key.Russian: Бродвей всем силам НАТО на Стратисе: атака нейтральных сил. Повторяю, атака нейтральных сил.
Key.German: Broadway an alle NATO-Truppen auf Stratis: Grün auf Blau, ich wiederhole, Grün auf Blau.
Key.Czech: Broadway všem jednotkám NATO na Stratisu: agrese ze strany aliančních jednotek, opakuji, agrese zelená-modrá.
Key.English: Broadway to all NATO forces on Stratis: Green on Blue, I say again, Green on Blue.
Key.Portuguese: Transmissão para todas as forças da OTAN em Stratis: Verde no azul. Repito. Verde no azul.
Key.Korean: 브로드웨이가 스트라티스의 전 NATO 병력에게, 녹군이 청군을 공격했다. 반복한다, 녹군이 청군을 공격했다.
Key.Chinesesimp: Broadway 呼叫 Stratis 的所有北约部队：Green 呼叫 Blue，我再说一次，Green 呼叫 Blue。
Key.Japanese: ブロードウェイよりストラティスの全NATO部隊へ。内部から攻撃、繰り返す、内部から攻撃。
Key.Turkish: Broadway'den Stratis'teki tüm NATO kuvvetlerine: Yeşilden Maviye, tekrar ediyorum, Yeşilden Maviye.

Key.Original: AAF forces considered hostile. Hold your ground! Out.
Key.Chinese: AAF 現在是我們的敵人。堅守岡位！結束通話。
Key.French: L'AAF est désormais hostile. Défendez votre position ! Terminé.
Key.Spanish: Fuerzas de la AAF consideradas hostiles. ¡Mantengan la posición! Corto.
Key.Italian: Forze AAF considerate ostili. Difendete la posizione. Chiudo.
Key.Polish: Siły AAF są od tej chwili uważane za wrogie. Utrzymać pozycję! Bez odbioru.
Key.Russian: Войска AAF считаются противником. Держите позицию! Конец связи.
Key.German: AAF-Kräfte gelten als Feinde. Halten Sie Ihre Stellung! Out.
Key.Czech: Považujte jednotky AAF za nepřátelské. Držte pozice! Konec.
Key.English: AAF forces considered hostile. Hold your ground! Out.
Key.Portuguese: As tropas da AAF são hostis. Mantenha sua posição! Desligo.
Key.Korean: AAF군은 적으로 간주하라. 위치를 사수하도록! 이상.
Key.Chinesesimp: AAF 军队是敌对部队。守住阵地！完毕。
Key.Japanese: AAF部隊は敵だ。その場を死守せよ！以上。
Key.Turkish: AAF kuvvetleri düşman kabul ediliyor. Yerini koru! Tamam.

Container.name: 137_WTF
Container.participants: EPA B Player;EPA B Intro CO;
Container.situation: player follows co

Key.Original: Not a clue. Sounds like a goddamn invasion.
Key.Chinese: 一點頭緒也沒有。聽起來跟侵略沒兩樣。
Key.French: Pas la moindre. Ça m'a tout l'air d'être une invasion.
Key.Spanish: Ni una sola pista. Un jarro de agua fría.
Key.Italian: Non ne ho idea. Sembrerebbe un'invasione, accidenti.
Key.Polish: Nie mam pojęcia. To mi wygląda na przeklętą inwazję.
Key.Russian: Без понятия. Прямо, блин, вторжение какое-то.
Key.German: Keine Ahnung. Klingt nach einer verdammten Invasion.
Key.Czech: Nemám páru. Zní to jako zasraná invaze.
Key.English: Not a clue. Sounds like a goddamn invasion.
Key.Portuguese: Não tenho a mínima. Isso está com cara de invasão.
Key.Korean: 전혀 모르겠다. 빌어먹을 침공인 것 같기도 하고.
Key.Chinesesimp: 不清楚。看上去象是一次见鬼的入侵。
Key.Japanese: わからん。侵入されたようだな。
Key.Turkish: Hiçbir fikrim yok. Sanki lanet bir istila yapılıyor.

Key.Original: Just stay focused, Kerry. Eyes open.
Key.Chinese: 總之，保持專注，Kerry。眼觀四面。
Key.French: Restez concentré, Kerry. Et ouvrez l'œil.
Key.Spanish: Céntrense, Kerry. Abra los ojos.
Key.Italian: Resta concentrato Kerry. Occhi aperti.
Key.Polish: Skup się, Kerry. Trzymaj oczy szeroko otwarte.
Key.Russian: Вы, главное, не зевайте, Керри. Глядите в оба.
Key.German: Bleiben Sie einfach konzentriert, Kerry. Augen auf!
Key.Czech: Jen se soustřeď, Kerry. Měj oči otevřené.
Key.English: Just stay focused, Kerry. Eyes open.
Key.Portuguese: Mantenha o foco, Kerry. Olhos abertos.
Key.Korean: 그냥 정신이나 똑바로 차려, 케리. 경계 늦추지 마.
Key.Chinesesimp: 集中精神，Kerry。睁大眼睛。
Key.Japanese: 気を抜くなよ、ケリー。よく見てろ。
Key.Turkish: Dikkatli ol, Kerry. Gözünü dört aç.

Key.Original: Sir, you got any idea what's going on?
Key.Chinese: 長官，你知道發生什麼事嗎？
Key.French: Sir, vous avez une idée de ce qui se passe ?
Key.Spanish: Señor, ¿tiene alguna idea de lo que está pasando?
Key.Italian: Signora, sa cosa sta succedendo?
Key.Polish: Sir, czy ma pan pojęcie, co się dzieje?
Key.Russian: Сэр, как вы думаете, что происходит?
Key.German: Sir, wissen Sie, was hier vorgeht?
Key.Czech: Pane, máte ponětí, co se to tu děje?
Key.English: Sir, you got any idea what's going on?
Key.Portuguese: Senhor, faz alguma ideia do que está acontecendo?
Key.Korean: 하사님, 뭐가 어떻게 돌아가는 건지 아시겠습니까?
Key.Chinesesimp: 长官，你知道发生了什么事吗？
Key.Japanese: 何が起きているかご存じですか？
Key.Turkish: Komutanım, neler döndüğüne dair bir fikrin var mı?

Key.Original: Wait, CSAT?
Key.Chinese: 等等，CSAT？
Key.French: De qui ? CSAT ?
Key.Spanish: Un segundo, ¿CSAT?
Key.Italian: Un momento, CSAT?
Key.Polish: Zaraz, CSAT?
Key.Russian: Что? CSAT?
Key.German: Was, CSAT?
Key.Czech: Moment, CSAT?
Key.English: Wait, CSAT?
Key.Portuguese: Espere aí, CSAT?
Key.Chinesesimp: 等等，CSAT？
Key.Japanese: 待て、CSAT？
Key.Turkish: Bekle, CSAT mı?

Container.name: 135_On_Foot
Container.participants: EPA B Intro CO;EPA B Player;
Container.situation: player's co orders the player to follow him

Key.Original: Shit. Come on, Kerry! It'll be safer on foot.
Key.Chinese: 可惡。來吧，Kerry！步行比較安全。
Key.French: Merde. Allez, Kerry ! Ce sera moins risqué à pied.
Key.Spanish: Mierda. ¡Vamos, Kerry! Será más seguro a pie.
Key.Italian: Merda. Avanti Kerry! A piedi è più sicuro.
Key.Polish: Szlag. Chodź, Kerry! Na piechotę będzie bezpieczniej.
Key.Russian: Черт. Пошли, Керри! Пешком будет безопаснее.
Key.German: Scheiße. Kommen Sie, Kerry! Zu Fuß ist es sicherer.
Key.Czech: Kurva. Pohni, Kerry! Pěšky to bude bezpečnější.
Key.English: Shit. Come on, Kerry! It'll be safer on foot.
Key.Portuguese: Merda. Vamos lá, Kerry! Vai ser mais seguro a pé.
Key.Korean: 우라질. 서둘러, 케리! 걷는 게 더 안전하겠다.
Key.Chinesesimp: 见鬼。来吧，Kerry！步行更安全。
Key.Japanese: クソッ。行くぞ、ケリー！徒歩の方が安全だ。
Key.Turkish: Lanet. Haydi, Kerry! Yaya olarak daha güvenli olur.

Key.Original: Right behind you, sir.
Key.Chinese: 我緊跟著你，長官。
Key.French: Je vous suis, Sir.
Key.Spanish: Le sigo, señor.
Key.Italian: Dietro di lei, signore.
Key.Polish: Tuż za panem, sir.
Key.Russian: Иду, сэр.
Key.German: Ich bin direkt hinter Ihnen, Sir.
Key.Czech: Hned za vámi, pane.
Key.English: Right behind you, sir.
Key.Portuguese: Estou logo atrás do senhor.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我跟着你，长官。
Key.Japanese: すぐ行きます。
Key.Turkish: Arkandayım, komutanım.

Container.name: 130_Planes
Container.situation: player's co spots the plane

Key.Original: What the fuck is going on?
Key.Chinese: 這是什麼狀況！？
Key.French: Putain, qu'est-ce qui se passe ?
Key.Spanish: ¿Qué coño está pasando?
Key.Italian: Che diavolo sta succedendo?
Key.Polish: Co się do cholery dzieje?
Key.Russian: Что за хрень тут такая творится?
Key.German: Was zum Teufel ist hier los?
Key.Czech: Co se to tu kurva děje?
Key.English: What the fuck is going on?
Key.Portuguese: O que diabos está acontecendo?
Key.Chinesesimp: 这到底是怎么回事？
Key.Japanese: 一体何が起きてるんだ？
Key.Turkish: Burada ne haltlar dönüyor?

Container.name: 128_Ambient_2
Container.participants: EPA B Xray CO;EPA B HQ;
Container.situation: ambient chatter of attack

Key.Original: Go ahead, X-ray. Over.
Key.Chinese: 說吧，X-ray。完畢。
Key.French: Transmettez, X-ray. À vous.
Key.Spanish: Adelante, X-Ray. Cambio.
Key.Italian: Procedi X-ray. Passo.
Key.Polish: Mówcie, X-ray. Odbiór.
Key.Russian: Слушаю вас, Иксрей. Прием.
Key.German: Sprechen Sie, X-Ray. Over.
Key.Czech: Mluvte, X-rayi. Příjem.
Key.English: Go ahead, X-ray. Over.
Key.Portuguese: Siga em frente, X-ray. Câmbio.
Key.Chinesesimp: 请讲，X-ray。完毕，请回复。
Key.Japanese: 続けろ、エックスレイ。どうぞ。
Key.Turkish: Devam et, X-ray. Tamam.

Key.Original: Broadway, this Point X-Ray, message, over.
Key.Chinese: Broadway，這是 X-Ray 點，有訊息，完畢。
Key.French: Broadway, ici Point X-Ray, message, à vous.
Key.Spanish: Broadway, aquí Punto X-Ray, mensaje, cambio.
Key.Italian: Broadway, qui Point X-ray, passo.
Key.Polish: Broadway, tu Punkt X-Ray, wiadomość, odbiór.
Key.Russian: Бродвей, я Точка Иксрей. Есть сообщение. Прием.
Key.German: Broadway, hier ist Point X-Ray, Nachricht, over.
Key.Czech: Broadwayi, tady bod X-ray, máme zprávu, příjem.
Key.English: Broadway, this Point X-Ray, message, over.
Key.Portuguese: Broadway, aqui é Ponto X-ray. Mensagem. Câmbio.
Key.Korean: 브로드웨이, 여기는 엑스레이 지점. 전달사항이 있다, 이상.
Key.Chinesesimp: Broadway，这是 X-Ray 据点，报告消息，完毕，请回复。
Key.Japanese: ブロードウェイ、こちらポイント・エックスレイ。メッセージを。どうぞ。
Key.Turkish: Broadway, X-Ray Noktası konuşuyor, mesaj var, tamam.

Key.Original: We've lost contact with Kamino - I say again - lost comms with Kamino.
Key.Chinese: 我們跟 Kamino 失去聯繫。我再說一次，與 Kamino 失去聯繫。
Key.French: Nous avons perdu tout contact avec Kamino. Je répète, plus aucune transmission avec Kamino.
Key.Spanish: Hemos perdido el contacto con Kamino. Repito, hemos perdido la comunicación con Kamino.
Key.Italian: Abbiamo perso il contatto con Kamino. Ripeto, comunicazioni interrotte con Kamino.
Key.Polish: Straciliśmy kontakt z Kamino - powtarzam - straciliśmy łączność z Kamino.
Key.Russian: Мы потеряли связь с Камино. Повторяю, потеряли связь с Камино.
Key.German: Wir haben den Kontakt mit Kamino verloren - ich weiderhole - Kontakt mit Kamino verloren.
Key.Czech: Ztratili jsme spojení s Kaminem - opakuji - ztracen kontakt s Kaminem.
Key.English: We've lost contact with Kamino - I say again - lost comms with Kamino.
Key.Portuguese: Perdemos contato com Kamino. Repito. Perdemos comunicações com Kamino.
Key.Korean: 카미노와의 교신이 끊겼다. 반복한다, 카미노와의 교신이 두절됐다.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们失去了与 Kamino 的联系- 我再说一次 - 与 Kamino 的通讯中断。
Key.Japanese: カミノとの連絡が途絶えた。繰り返す。カミノとの通信が途絶えた。
Key.Turkish: Kamino ile teması kaybettik - tekrar ediyorum - Kamino ile iletişimi kaybettik.

Key.Original: Can you confirm? Over.
Key.Chinese: 你能確認嗎？完畢。
Key.French: Vous pouvez confirmer ? À vous.
Key.Spanish: ¿Pueden confirmarlo? Cambio.
Key.Italian: Puoi confermare? Passo.
Key.Polish: Czy możesz potwierdzić? Odbiór.
Key.Russian: Можете подтвердить? Прием.
Key.German: Bitte bestätigen. Over.
Key.Czech: Můžete to potvrdit? Příjem.
Key.English: Can you confirm? Over.
Key.Portuguese: Você confirma? Câmbio.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你能确认吗？完毕，请回复。
Key.Japanese: 確認できるか？どうぞ。
Key.Turkish: Onaylar mısın? Tamam.

Container.name: 127_Ambient_1
Container.participants: EPA B Evac Helicopter;EPA B HQ;
Container.situation: ambient chatter of attack

Key.Original: Situation unclear, Echo. Wait one.
Key.Chinese: 狀況不明，Echo。等等。
Key.French: C'est confus, Echo. Un instant.
Key.Spanish: La situación no está clara, Echo. Un minuto.
Key.Italian: Situazione poco chiara, Echo. Attendi.
Key.Polish: Sytuacja jest niejasna, Echo. Zaczekaj.
Key.Russian: Ситуация неясна, Эхо. Подождите.
Key.German: Situation unklar, Echo. Warten Sie kurz.
Key.Czech: Situace je nejasná, Echo. Vyčkejte.
Key.English: Situation unclear, Echo. Wait one.
Key.Portuguese: Situação incerta, Eco. Aguarde um.
Key.Chinesesimp: 情况不明，Echo。等一下。
Key.Japanese: 状況は不明だ、エコー。待て。
Key.Turkish: Durum anlaşılmadı, Echo. Bekle.

Key.Original: Echo, we see explosions at Kamino ... gunfire across the island...
Key.Chinese: Echo，我們剛看見 Kamino 爆炸，島上到處在交戰…
Key.French: Echo, nous voyons des explosions vers Kamino... Ça canarde dans toute l'île...
Key.Spanish: Echo, vemos explosiones en Kamino. Armas de fuego en toda la isla...
Key.Italian: Echo, vediamo esplosioni a Kamino… fuoco su tutta l'isola…
Key.Polish: Echo, widzimy wybuchy w Kamino ... strzały na wyspie...
Key.Russian: Эхо, мы видим на Камино взрывы... По всему острову стрельба...
Key.German: Echo, wir sehen Explosionen in Kamino ... Schusswechsel auf der Insel ...
Key.Czech: Echo, na Kaminu jsou vidět exploze... palba po celém ostrově...
Key.English: Echo, we see explosions at Kamino ... gunfire across the island...
Key.Portuguese: Eco, estamos vendo explosões em Kamino... Há disparos por toda a ilha...
Key.Korean: 여기는 에코, 카미노에서 폭발이 관측된다... 섬 전역에 총성이 울려퍼지고 있다.
Key.Chinesesimp: Echo，我们看到 Kamino 发生了爆炸...响彻全岛的炮火声...
Key.Japanese: エコー、カミノで爆発だ…島中で砲撃が…。
Key.Turkish: Echo, Kamino'da patlamalar ve tüm adada silah ateşi görüyoruz...

Key.Original: Broadway, give me a report!
Key.Chinese: Broadway，向我回報！
Key.French: Broadway, on en est où ?
Key.Spanish: Broadway, ¿cuál es la situación?
Key.Italian: Broadway, qual è la situazione?
Key.Polish: Broadway, jak wygląda sytuacja?
Key.Russian: Бродвей, доложите обстановку.
Key.German: Broadway, wie ist die Situation?
Key.Czech: Broadwayi, jaká je situace?
Key.English: Broadway, give me a report!
Key.Portuguese: Broadway, qual é a situação?
Key.Chinesesimp: Broadway，报告情况！
Key.Japanese: ブロードウェイ、どんな状況だ？
Key.Turkish: Broadway, bana rapor ver.

Container.name: 125_Comply
Container.situation: player's co agrees to return

Key.Original: Understood, sir. Out.
Key.Chinese: 了解，長官。結束通話。
Key.French: Compris, Sir. Terminé.
Key.Spanish: Entendido, señor. Corto.
Key.Italian: Capito, signore. Chiudo.
Key.Polish: Zrozumiałem, sir. Bez odbioru.
Key.Russian: Понял, сэр. Конец связи.
Key.German: Verstanden, Sir. Out.
Key.Czech: Rozumím, pane. Konec.
Key.English: Understood, sir. Out.
Key.Portuguese: Entendido, senhor. Desligo.
Key.Chinesesimp: 明白，长官。完毕。
Key.Japanese: 了解。以上。
Key.Turkish: Anlaşıldı, komutanım. Tamam.

Container.name: 120_Range
Container.participants: EPA B Kamino Firing Range;EPA B Logistics Officer;EPA B Intro CO;EPA B HQ;
Container.situation: kamino firing range reports the attack

Key.Original: Kamino, Broadway - we read you - wait one!
Key.Chinese: Kamino，Broadway－我們收到了，等等！
Key.French: Kamino, Broadway. Nous vous recevons. Un instant !
Key.Spanish: Kamino, Broadway, los recibimos. ¡Un minuto!
Key.Italian: Kamino, Broadway, vi riceviamo. Attendete!
Key.Polish: Kamino, Broadway - słyszymy was - zaczekajcie!
Key.Russian: Камино, Бродвей, слышим вас. Сейчас!
Key.German: Kamino, Broadway - wir hören Sie - warten Sie kurz!
Key.Czech: Kamino, tady Broadway - slyšíme vás - vyčkejte!
Key.English: Kamino, Broadway - we read you - wait one!
Key.Portuguese: Kamino, Broadway, recebemos. Aguardem um!
Key.Korean: 카미노, 브로드웨이다. 무전은 들었다. 잠시 대기!
Key.Chinesesimp: Kamino，Broadway - 我们检测到你们 - 等一下！
Key.Japanese: カミノ、ブロードウェイ、聞こえるぞ。待て！
Key.Turkish: Kamino, Broadway - sizi duyuyoruz - bir bekleyin!

Key.Original: Copy, Rogain, but, what about Kamino? What the fuck is going on?
Key.Chinese: 收到，Rogain。但是 Kamino 怎麼辦？這是什麼狀況！？
Key.French: Reçu, Rogain. Mais... et Kamino ? Qu'est-ce qui se passe, bordel ?
Key.Spanish: Recibido, Rogain, pero ¿qué pasa con Kamino? ¿Qué coño está pasando?
Key.Italian: Ricevuto, Rogain. Ma che succede a Kamino? Che diamine sta succedendo?
Key.Polish: Przyjąłem, Rogain, ale co z Kamino? Co się do cholery dzieje?
Key.Russian: Вас понял, Рогейн. А что там с Камино? Что за хрень происходит?
Key.German: Verstanden, Rogain, aber was ist mit Kamino? Was zum Teufel ist hier los?
Key.Czech: Rozumím, Rogaine, ale co je s Kaminem? Co se to do prdele děje?
Key.English: Copy, Rogain, but, what about Kamino? What the fuck is going on?
Key.Portuguese: Copiado, Rogain. Mas e Kamino? O que diabos está acontecendo?
Key.Korean: 알겠다, 로게인. 하지만 카미노는 어쩌나? 젠장, 뭐가 어떻게 돌아가는 건가?
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，Rogain，不过 Kamino 怎样了？到底发生了什么事？
Key.Japanese: 了解、ロゲイン。しかし、カミノはどうした？一体何が起きてるんだ？
Key.Turkish: Anlaşıldı, Rogain, ama Kamino'ya ne olacak? Burada ne haltlar dönüyor?

Key.Original: Kamino to Broadway! Shots fired!
Key.Chinese: Kamino 呼叫 Broadway！敵襲！
Key.French: Kamino pour Broadway ! Coups de feu !
Key.Spanish: ¡Kamino a Broadway! ¡Disparos!
Key.Italian: Kamino a Broadway! Sparano!
Key.Polish: Kamino do Broadway! Strzały!
Key.Russian: Бродвей, я Камино! У нас стрельба!
Key.German: Kamino an Broadway! Hier fallen Schüsse!
Key.Czech: Kamino pro Broadway! Máme tu střelbu!
Key.English: Kamino to Broadway! Shots fired!
Key.Portuguese: Kamino para Broadway! Disparos!
Key.Chinesesimp: Kamino 呼叫 Broadway！开火了！
Key.Japanese: カミノよりブロードウェイ！砲撃だ！
Key.Turkish: Kamino'dan Broadway'e! Ateş edildi!

Key.Original: Requesting support! - Broadway, do you copy? Over!
Key.Chinese: 請求支援！－Broadway，你收到沒？完畢！
Key.French: Demandons appui ! Broadway, vous me recevez ? À vous !
Key.Spanish: ¡Solicitamos refuerzos! Broadway, ¿me reciben? ¡Cambio!
Key.Italian: Richiesta di supporto! Broadway, ricevete? Passo!
Key.Polish: Proszę o wsparcie! - Broadway, słyszycie nas? Odbiór!
Key.Russian: Прошу поддержки! Бродвей, как слышите? Прием!
Key.German: Erbitten Unterstützung! - Broadway, hören Sie mich? Over.
Key.Czech: Žádáme o podporu! - Broadwayi, slyšíte mě? Příjem!
Key.English: Requesting support! - Broadway, do you copy? Over!
Key.Portuguese: Solicitando apoio! Broadway, você me copia? Câmbio!
Key.Chinesesimp: 请求支援！ - Broadway，你收到了吗？完毕，请回复！
Key.Japanese: 支援を頼む！ブロードウェイ、聞こえるか？どうぞ！
Key.Turkish: Destek istiyorum! - Broadway, duyuyor musun? Tamam!

Key.Original: Adams, this is Rogain. Get your asses back here! Over.
Key.Chinese: Adams，這是 Rogain。全都給我滾回來！完畢。
Key.French: Adams, ici Rogain. Grouillez-vous de rappliquer ! À vous.
Key.Spanish: Adams, aquí Rogain. ¡Vuelvan aquí echando hostias! Cambio.
Key.Italian: Adams, qui è Rogain. Tornate subito qui! Passo.
Key.Polish: Adams, tu Rogain. Natychmiast tu wracajcie! Odbiór.
Key.Russian: Адамс, я Рогейн. Возвращайтесь сюда, быстро! Конец связи.
Key.German: Adams, hier ist Rogain. Schaffen Sie Ihre Ärsche hierher zurück! Over.
Key.Czech: Adamsi, tady Rogain. Pohněte prdelema, ať jste zpátky! Příjem.
Key.English: Adams, this is Rogain. Get your asses back here! Over.
Key.Portuguese: Adams, aqui é Rogain. Voltem logo para cá! Câmbio.
Key.Korean: 애덤스, 여기는 로게인. 당장 복귀하라! 이상.
Key.Chinesesimp: Adams，这里是 Rogain。快回这来！完毕，请回复。
Key.Japanese: アダムス、こちらロゲイン。ここへ戻れ！どうぞ。
Key.Turkish: Adams, Rogain konuşuyor. Buraya geri dönün! Tamam.

Key.Original: No buts, Staff Sergeant. That's an order. Out.
Key.Chinese: 沒有「但是」，上士。這是命令。結束通話。
Key.French: Pas de mais, Sergent-chef. C'est un ordre. Terminé.
Key.Spanish: Sin peros, sargento. Es una orden. Corto.
Key.Italian: Niente ma, sergente capo. È un ordine. Chiudo.
Key.Polish: Żadnych ale, sierżancie sztabowy. To rozkaz. Bez odbioru.
Key.Russian: Никаких "но", штаб-сержант. Это приказ. Конец связи.
Key.German: Kein Aber, Staff Sergeant. Das ist ein Befehl. Out.
Key.Czech: Žádné ale, seržante. To je rozkaz. Příjem.
Key.English: No buts, Staff Sergeant. That's an order. Out.
Key.Portuguese: Sem “mas”, Sargento Operacional. É uma ordem. Desligo.
Key.Korean: 하지만이고 나발이고 이건 명령이다, 하사. 이상.
Key.Chinesesimp: 没有什么可是，上士。那是命令。完毕。
Key.Japanese: つべこべ言うな、曹長。これは命令だ。以上。
Key.Turkish: Ama yok, Başçavuş. Bu bir emirdir. Tamam.

Container.name: 117_Request_Help
Container.situation: player's co demands help from kamino

Key.Original: Staff Sergeant Adams to Kamino, come in! Commander MacKinnon's down! Requesting urgent assistance! Over!
Key.Chinese: Adams 上士呼叫 Kamino，請回話！MacKinnon 指揮官倒地了！請求立即支援！完畢！
Key.French: Sergent-chef Adams pour Kamino, répondez ! Le commandant MacKinnon est à terre ! Demandons aide en urgence ! À vous !
Key.Spanish: Sargento Adams a Kamino, ¡adelante! ¡El comandante MacKinnon ha caído! ¡Solicitamos ayuda urgente! ¡Cambio!
Key.Italian: Sergente capo Adams a Kamino, avanti! Il comandate MacKinnon è stato abbattuto! Si richiede assistenza urgente! Passo!
Key.Polish: Sierżant sztabowy Adams do Kamino: zgłoście się! Dowódca MacKinnon trafiony! Proszę o natychmiastowe wsparcie! Odbiór!
Key.Russian: Камино, я штаб-сержант Адамс, ответьте! Коммандер Маккиннон ранен! Прошу срочной помощи! Прием!
Key.German: Staff Sergeant Adams an Kamino, bitte kommen! Kommandant MacKinnon ist am Boden! Erbitten dringend Unterstützung! Over.
Key.Czech: Seržant Adams pro Kamino, ozvěte se! Velitel MacKinnon to dostal! Žádáme okamžitou pomoc! Příjem!
Key.English: Staff Sergeant Adams to Kamino, come in! Commander MacKinnon's down! Requesting urgent assistance! Over!
Key.Portuguese: Sargento Operacional Adams para Kamino. Responda! O Comandante MacKinnon foi atingido! Solicitando assistência urgente! Câmbio!
Key.Korean: 애덤스 하사가 카미노에, 응답하라! 맥키넌 사령관이 당했다! 긴급지원 요청한다! 이상!
Key.Chinesesimp: Adams 上士呼叫 Kamino，接进！MacKinnon 指挥官中弹！请求紧急支援！完毕，请回复！
Key.Japanese: アダムス曹長よりカミノへ、応答せよ！マキノン中佐がやられた！至急救援を求む！どうぞ！
Key.Turkish: Başçavuş Adams'tan Kamino'ya, gel! Komutan MacKinnon düştü! Acil destek istiyoruz! Tamam!

Key.Original: Kamino, I say again, requesting urgent medical support at our position! Commander MacKinnon is down! Please respond!
Key.Chinese: Kamino，我重複，請立刻派醫療支援過來我們這裡！MacKinnon 指揮官倒地了！請回答！
Key.French: Kamino, je répète, nous avons besoin d'aide médicale en urgence sur notre position ! Le commandant MacKinnon est à terre ! Répondez !
Key.Spanish: ¡Kamino, repito, necesitamos ayuda médica urgente en nuestra posición! ¡El comandante MacKinnon ha caído! ¡Respondan, por favor!
Key.Italian: Kamino, ripeto, si richiede supporto medico urgente presso la nostra posizione! Il comandante MacKinnon è stato abbattuto! Rispondete!
Key.Polish: Kamino, powtarzam, proszę o natychmiastowe wsparcie medyczne! Dowódca MacKinnon jest ranny! Zgłoście się!
Key.Russian: Камино, повторяю, прошу срочной медицинской помощи на нашей позиции! Коммандер Маккиннон ранен! Пожалуйста, ответьте!
Key.German: Kamino, ich wiederhole, wir brauchen dringend medizinische Unterstützung an unserer Position! Kommandant MacKinnon ist am Boden! Bitte antworten Sie!
Key.Czech: Kamino, opakuji, žádáme okamžitou lékařskou pomoc na naši pozici! Dostali velitele MacKinnona! Odpovězte, prosím!
Key.English: Kamino, I say again, requesting urgent medical support at our position! Commander MacKinnon is down! Please respond!
Key.Portuguese: Kamino, repito. Solicitando apoio médico urgente na nossa posição! O Comandante MacKinnon foi atingido! Responda!
Key.Korean: 카미노, 반복한다. 현 위치로 긴급의료지원 요청한다! 맥키넌 사령관님이 당했다! 응답 좀 해!
Key.Chinesesimp: Kamino，我再说一次，我们的阵地请求紧急医疗援助！MacKinnon 指挥官中弹！请回复！
Key.Japanese: カミノ、繰り返す。至急こちらに医療支援を！マキノン中佐がやられた！応答してくれ！
Key.Turkish: Kamino, tekrar ediyorum, bulunduğumuz yere acil sıhhiye desteği istiyoruz! Komutan MacKinnon düştü! Lütfen yanıt verin!

Container.name: 115_Check
Container.situation: player's co checks on the commander

Key.Original: Fuck, he's not breathing! What the hell happened?
Key.Chinese: 操，他沒氣了！這是什麼狀況！？
Key.French: Putain, il ne respire plus ! Qu'est-ce qui s'est passé ?
Key.Spanish: ¡Hostia, no respira! ¿Qué demonios ha pasado?
Key.Italian: Merda, non respira! Che diavolo è successo?
Key.Polish: Cholera, on nie oddycha! Co się do cholery stało?
Key.Russian: Черт, он не дышит! Что случилось?
Key.German: Scheiße, er atmet nicht! Was zum Teufel ist passiert?
Key.Czech: Kurva, nedýchá! Co se tu sakra stalo?
Key.English: Fuck, he's not breathing! What the hell happened?
Key.Portuguese: Merda, ele não está respirando! O que diabos aconteceu?
Key.Korean: 우라질, 숨을 안 쉬잖아! 뭐가 어떻게 된 거야?
Key.Chinesesimp: 见鬼，他没有呼吸了！到底发生了什么？
Key.Japanese: クソッ、息をしていない！一体何が起こったんだ？
Key.Turkish: Kahretsin, nefes almıyor! Ne oldu?

Container.name: 110_Hazard
Container.situation: commander's truck spotted

Key.Original: Wait, is that MacKinnon?
Key.Chinese: 等等，那是 MacKinnon 嗎？
Key.French: Une seconde. C'est MacKinnon ?
Key.Spanish: Espere, ¿ese es MacKinnon?
Key.Italian: Un momento, ma è MacKinnon?
Key.Polish: Zaraz, czy to MacKinnon?
Key.Russian: Стоп, это Маккиннон?
Key.German: Moment, ist das MacKinnon?
Key.Czech: Počkat, není to MacKinnon?
Key.English: Wait, is that MacKinnon?
Key.Portuguese: Espere aí. Aquele é MacKinnon?
Key.Chinesesimp: 等等，那是 MacKinnon？
Key.Japanese: 待て、あれはマキノンか？
Key.Turkish: Bekle, bu MacKinnon mı?

Key.Original: Shit. Stop the truck, Kerry!
Key.Chinese: 可惡。停車，Kerry！
Key.French: Merde. Stop, Kerry !
Key.Spanish: Mierda. ¡Pare el camión, Kerry!
Key.Italian: Accidenti! Ferma il camion, Kerry!
Key.Polish: Szlag. Zatrzymaj się, Kerry!
Key.Russian: Черт. Керри, останови грузовик!
Key.German: Scheiße. Halten Sie den LKW an, Kerry!
Key.Czech: Do prdele. Zastav, Kerry!
Key.English: Shit. Stop the truck, Kerry!
Key.Portuguese: Merda. Parece o caminhão, Kerry!
Key.Chinesesimp: 糟糕。停住卡车，Kerry！
Key.Japanese: クソッ。トラックを止めろ、ケリー！
Key.Turkish: Lanet. Kamyonu durdur, Kerry!

Container.name: 10_All_In
Container.participants: EPA B Intro CO;EPA B November;
Container.situation: player's co tells helicopter pilot they're in

Key.Original: All right, we're set. Let's go.
Key.Chinese: 好，我們準備好了。走吧。
Key.French: OK ça marche. On est partis.
Key.Spanish: Muy bien, ya estamos. Vamos.
Key.Italian: Ok, ci siamo. Andiamo.
Key.Polish: Dobrze, wszystko gotowe. Ruszajmy.
Key.Russian: Так, все готово. Пойдем.
Key.German: Alles klar, wir sind so weit. Gehen wir.
Key.Czech: Fajn, hotovo. Jedem.
Key.English: All right, we're set. Let's go.
Key.Portuguese: Tudo certo, estamos prontos. Vamos.
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，问题解决了。我们走吧。
Key.Japanese: よし、準備完了だ。行こう。
Key.Turkish: Pekâlâ, hazırız. Haydi gidelim.

Key.Original: Copy that, November's away.
Key.Chinese: 收到，November 出發。
Key.French: Bien reçu, November est en route.
Key.Spanish: Recibido. Noviembre, corto.
Key.Italian: Ricevuto. November è via.
Key.Polish: Przyjąłem, November w drodze.
Key.Russian: Вас понял, Новембер выходит.
Key.German: Verstanden, November ist unterwegs.
Key.Czech: Rozumím, November vyráží.
Key.English: Copy that, November's away.
Key.Portuguese: Copiado. Novembro está a caminho.
Key.Chinesesimp: 明白，November 离开了。
Key.Japanese: 了解。ノベンバーは出発する。
Key.Turkish: Anlaşıldı, November gitti.

Container.name: 105_Left_Checkpoint
Container.situation: player left the checkpoint

Key.Original: Did you catch that one, Kerry? It's 'all clear?'. Oh, Sure, ok!
Key.Chinese: 你有聽見他說的嗎，Kerry？他是說「區域安全」？哦，好啊，沒問題！
Key.French: Vous avez entendu, Kerry ? « RàS » ? Bon ben tant mieux, hein !
Key.Spanish: ¿Ha cogido esa, Kerry? ¿Está todo claro? Oh, sin duda, ¡bien!
Key.Italian: Hai capito Kerry? Tutto a posto? Oh, certo, ok?
Key.Polish: Słyszałeś to, Kerry? 'Wszystko gra?'. Och, jasne, OK!
Key.Russian: Керри, ты последнюю фразу слышал? Что было? "Все чисто"? Ясно. Хорошо!
Key.German: Haben Sie das gehört, Kerry? "Alles klar." Ja, natürlich, sicher.
Key.Czech: Slyšel jsi to, Kerry? "Čisto.“ Ha? Jasně, fajn!
Key.English: Did you catch that one, Kerry? It's 'all clear?'. Oh, Sure, ok!
Key.Portuguese: Copiou bem, Kerry? Disse “tudo seguro?”. Ah, sim, OK!
Key.Korean: 방금 들었냐, 케리? 전부 이상 없다고? 아, 그렇지, 이상 없겠지!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你听到那句话了吗，Kerry？是“无危险”？哦，当然，好的！
Key.Japanese: 聞こえたか、ケリー？問題ないかって？ああ、もちろんだ、オーケー！
Key.Turkish: Bunu duydun mu, Kerry? "Anlaşıldı" mı? Ah, elbette, tamam!

Key.Original: I mean, Christ, give me a break. What a complete waste of time these people are.
Key.Chinese: 我是說，天啊，饒了我吧。跟這些人打交道真是有夠浪費時間。
Key.French: Non mais c'est vrai, c'est insupportable. On perd notre temps avec ces types.
Key.Spanish: Es que vamos, Dios mío, dame un respiro... Esta gente es una completa pérdida de tiempo.
Key.Italian: Cristo, datemi tregua. Questa gente è una manca di buoni a nulla.
Key.Polish: Chryste, dajcie spokój. Ci ludzie potrafią być beznadziejni.
Key.Russian: Господи, когда ж это все кончится. Что за бесполезный народ такой.
Key.German: Ich meine, hey, ich bin doch nicht blöd. Diese Leute sind doch komplette Zeitverschwendung.
Key.Czech: Proboha, ať se jdou vycpat. Ti lidi jsou naprostá ztráta času.
Key.English: I mean, Christ, give me a break. What a complete waste of time these people are.
Key.Portuguese: Minha nossa, me dê um tempo. Esse pessoal é uma perda de tempo.
Key.Korean: 그러니까, 젠장, 작작 좀 해라. 저 자식들 완전히 시간만 죽이고 있잖아.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的意思是，天哪，饶了我吧。这些人完全是在浪费时间。
Key.Japanese: と言うか、参ったぜ、勘弁してくれ。この連中はまったく時間の無駄だ。
Key.Turkish: Yani, Christ, bana bir izin ver. Bu insanlar tam bir zaman kaybı.

Key.Original: What's that saying about not getting laid in a whore house?
Key.Chinese: 不是有句話說，成事不足…
Key.French: Pas foutus de piner au bordel avec des biftons plein les poches.
Key.Spanish: ¿Qué dice eso acerca de pillar en un burdel?
Key.Italian: Cosa sta dicendo sul non finire a letto nemmeno in un bordello?
Key.Polish: Pamiętasz to powiedzenie, że żadna dziwka nie chciałaby za wszystkie skarby świata?
Key.Russian: Что там за поговорка про того, кому даже в борделе не дадут?
Key.German: Wie war doch gleich dieser Spruch, dass man's nie in einem Hurenhaus machen soll?
Key.Czech: Jak to bylo s tím, že nemáme píchat děvky v bordelu?
Key.English: What's that saying about not getting laid in a whore house?
Key.Portuguese: Como é aquele ditado sobre não comer pão e carne no mesmo lugar?
